eng3 Bi2-kok Tai5-oan5-lang5-kong-kiong7-su7-bu7-hoe7 e5 iau-chheng2，
beh-ti7 ji7-chap8-gou7-ho7 chian5-lai5 Bi2-kok Hoa5-hu2，
chhut-sek8 ti7 kok-ka ki3-chia2 khu7-lok8-pou7 ki2-heng5-e5，
「mai7-hiong3 Tai5-oan5 chin-siong3 ham ho5-kai2」 gian2-tho2-hoe7。
FAPA kin-a2-jit soan-pou3，
FAPA ham Formosa-ki-kim-hoe7，
i2-kip8 Tan5-bun5-seng5 ki3-liam7 ki-kim-hoe7、
Tai5-oan5 jin5-koan5 hiap8-hoe7，
kiong7-tong5 ti7 ji7-chap8-gou7-ho7，
ti7 Hoa5-hu2 kok-ka-ki3-chia2-khu7-lok8-pou7，
ki2-heng5 chit8-hang7 gian2-tho2-hoe7，
tho2-lun7 Tai5-oan5 tong-chian5 cheng5-si3。
gian2-tho2-hoe7 beh-hun teng2-e7 nng7-tiuN5。
teng2-poaN3-tiuN5 chu2-te5 ui5「chhiau-oat8 pi7-chhut-be7 e5 Formosa」；
e7-poaN3-tiuN5 chu2-te5 ui5「mai7-hiong3 Tai5-oan5-e5 chin-siong3 ham ho5-kai2」。
eng3-iau chham-ka chit-hang7 gian2-tho2-hoe7 e5 hak8-chia2 choan-ka，
pau-koat Cohen-Jerome、

ji7-chap8-gou7-ho7 Chhoa3-eng-bun5 chhin-chu7 ho7-tiau3 lian5-su7 au7，

ke7-chu2-thai3 e5 chham-ka Tai5-oan5-kau3-siu7-hiap8-hoe7 e5 ni5-hoe7，

chham-ka Tai5-oan5-kau3-siu7-hiap8-hoe7、

tong-tiong u7 chin-che7-lang5，
tui3 Bin5-chin3-tong2 seng-oan7 Tan5-chui2-piN2 e5 ban7-tun7-tun7 peng7-bo5-moa2-i3，

Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 cheng3-hu2 cheng5-ti7 kam3-thiaN bo5-kiam2-to3-ke ！
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5 po3-to7
u7 mui5-the2 po3-to7，
Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 cheng3-hu2 e5 kam3-thiaN bo5-kiam2-to3-ke，
Bin5-chin3-tong2-thoan5 lip8-ui2 thong3-phe，
Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 kun-pun2-si7 ti7 kah Tiong-kok-kiong7-san2-tong2 hak8-sip8，
chit-ma2 an3-sng3 beh iu5 Lip8-hoat-iN7 seng5-lip8 tiau-cha-ui2-oan5-hoe7，
liau2-kai2 si7-m7-si7 u7 long7-khoan5，
Ong5-heng7-lam5 chi2-tioh8 po3-to7-siong7，
pun3-ki-toa7 e5 piau-te5 「Ma2-chiuN7-jim7，
kam3-thiaN bo5-kiam2-to3-ke」 e5 ji7-gan2，
phoe-pheng5 Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 cheng3-hu2 e5 khiong2-pou3 thong2-ti7，
chit-phiN bun5 po3-to7 si7 iu5 cheng5-ti7 tan-ui7 koaN-oan5 piak-khang，
sin-chiap-jim7 Kun-cheng5-kiok8 tian7-sin3-ki-sut8-sek chu2-jim7 e5 lang5，
kun-jin5 「thiaN-leng7-heng5-su7」ko3-seng3，
tui3 teng2-si kau-tai7 bo5-the-si3，
ti3-su2 koe3-khi3 chit8-ni5，
kam3-thiaN cheng5-po3 sou3-liang7「bo5-kiam2-to3-ke」 。
siau-sit-chit8-chhut，
jin5-sim-hong5-hong5，
u7 lip8-ui2 sim7-chi3 tit8-chiap chhoe7-tioh8 Ong5-chheng-hong，

Ong5-chheng-hong teng5-chheng，

e7-eng7-be7-eng7 hou7 lip8-hoat-ui2-oan5 an-sim，

ui7 ka3 chhit-hoe3 cha-bou2-kiaN2 sit-ti3 lau7-pe7 teng5-thau5-oh8
Chu7-iu5 si5-po3 ki3-chia2 Ho5-giok8-hoa5 Tai5-pak-koan7 po3-to7
tan-chhin pa-pa Beh8-sian-seN （hoa3-mia5），
chan-keng-si7 ti-beng5 chiuN7-chhi7 tian7-ki kong-si phin2-koan2 kang-teng5-su，
saN-chap8-saN-hoe3 tut8-jian5 tiong3-hong kai2-pian3-liau2 seN3-mia7，
lak8-ni5-lai5，
i tui3 sit-ti3 kau3 ban7-ban7 he-hok8 gu2-gian5 leng5-lek8，
ku7-ni5 po3-mia5 kok-sio2 pou2-hau7，
hi-bong7 chit-tiam2-chit-tiam2-a2 e5 hak8-sip8
e7-sai2 ka3 kin-ni5 chhit-hoe3 e5 cha-bou2-kiaN2 kong-kho3、sia2-ji7，
chiong-lai5 iau2-e7 tiong5-hoe5 khang-khoe3-tiuN5。
tai7-hak8 pit-giap8-au7，
chan-keng iong2-iu2 hou7-lang5 him-soan7 e5 thau5-lou7，
chit8-tiuN5-piN7 hou7 Beh8-sian-seN kui-leng5，
i he5-ek8 kong2，
nng7-chheng-khong3-saN ni5-toe2 tiong3-hong-au7，
oan5-choan5 sit-khi3 ki3-ek、gu2-gian5 leng5-lek8，
chiaN3-chhiu2、chiaN3-kha heng5-tong7 put-pian7，
peh、kau2-kou2-goeh8 au7，
ban7-ban7 e7 ki3-tioh8 lang5、kiaN5-lou7，
sin-the2 e5 put-pian7，
ka-siong7 gu2-gian5 iau2-bo5-hoat oan5-cheng2 piau2-tat8，
i sim-koaN-geng5 e5 siuN7-koe3 hong3-khi3 seN3-mia7，
「chin-khi3，Siong7-te3 ui7-siaN2-mih8 beh-an2-ne？」
phi5-khi3 pok8-so3 ai3-me7-lang5，
lu2-peng5-iu2、chhu3-lai7-lang5 long2-pi7 me7-chau2-ah，
lian5 lu2-peng5-iu2 lau5-loh8-lai5 ui5-it cha-bou2-kiaN2，
iah8 tiaN7-pi7 me7-khau3。
cho3-hoe2 chiau3-kou3 i choe7-ni5 e5 lu2-peng5-iu2，
li5-khui in hu7-lu2，
Beh8-sian-seN chhut-iN7-au7 ham cha-bou2-kiaN2 cho3-hoe2，

「goa2 bo5-khak-teng7 ka-ki7-e5 seN-mia7 tng5-te2，
tan7 chong2-ai3 hou7 gin2-a2 iong2-iu2 bi2-ho2-e5 ki3-ek。」

u7-chit8-cho7 thih-phiaN2 so3-ti5，
kin-a2-jit8 tiong-tau3 hoat-seng hoe2-sio，
iN7-hong it-tou7 keng2-kai3。
Ko-hiong5-chhi7-cheng3-hu2 siau-hong5-kiok8，
phai3-chhut siau-hong5-chhia ham jin5-oan5 kau3-tiuN5 chhiuN2-kiu3，
hoe2-si3 chap8-goa7-hun-cheng au7 tioh8-pi7 phah-hoa，
bo5 jin5-oan5 siong-bong5。
chit-khi2 hoe2-sio chhng3-khi2 long5-ian，
so3-ti5 ui7-ti7 peN7-iN7 au7-bin7-e5 thih-phiaN2-chhu3 lai7，
m7-si7 peN7-iN7 chu2-the2，
iN7-hong it-tou7 keng2-kai3，
chun2-pi7 sou-khai piN7-hoan7。
siau-hong5-kiok8 piau2-si7，
chit8-cho7 so3-ti5 si7 peN7-iN7-e5 lah-sap-chui2-chhu2-li2 siat-pi7 ，
gi5-su7 un7-choan2 siuN-sio soah chheng3-ian tioh8-hoe2-sio。

tai7-iok chap8-goa7-hun-cheng tioh8 phah-hoa hoe2-si3，
chheng-li2 hoe2-tiuN5 si5 bo5-khoaN3-tioh8 jin5-oan5 siong-bong5。
siau-hong5-kiok8 chi2-chhut，

Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
Tai5-oan5 e5 koan-kong，
m7-na7 Tiong-kok koan-kong-kheh chit-te3 chhi7-tiuN5 soe-thoe3，
to-lian5 Jit8-pun2 lai5 Tai5-oan5-e5 iu5-kheh，
kin7-lai5 oan-na2-u7 kiam2-chio2-e5 cheng5-heng5，
ui7-tioh8 piaN3-jin5-khi3，
Koan-kong-kiok8 chi2-ho2 chhut-ki5-chiau，
iau-chheng2 Jit8-pun2-e5 khong-tiong-sio2-chia2 chou-thoan5 lai5 Tai5-oan5 chhit-tho5，
hi-bong7 chioh-tioh bi2-lu2 chhoa7-thau5 iu5 Tai5-oan5-e5 hong-sek，
khip-in2 Jit8-pun2 siau3-lian5 li2-seng3 chok8-kun5，
bok8-piau bok8-chian5 teng3-ti7 gou7-chheng-lang5，
hi-bong7 e7-lai5 Tai5-oan5 chhong3-cho7 it-tiam2-lak8-ek seng-li2。
chhiuN2-kiu3 kheh-ka keng3-ji7-teng5 pah-ui7 hiong-chhin khiu-soh poaN-chhu3
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
Pin5-tang-koan7 e5 Ban7-loan5-hiong，
u7-chit8-cho7 nng7-pah-goa7-ni5 lek8-su2，
kheh-ka-e5 kian3-tiok8 keng3-ji7-teng5，
goan5-pun2 bin7-lim5 thiah-ti5 mia7-un7，
tong-toe7 chhoan-bin5 bou7-khoan2-chong5-chiN5
chong2-sng3 pang keng3-ji7-teng5 chhoe7-tioh8 sin-chhu3，
kin-a2-jit Ban7-loan5-hiong chu7-chip8-liau2 nng7-saN-pah-ui7 chhoan-bin5，
tak8-ke hap8-lek8 khiu-soh，
chiong keng3-ji7-teng5 poaN-kau3 sin-chhu3，
po2-chun5 kheh-ka-bun5-hoa3 chu-san2。
cha-bou2-eN-a2 cho-pang3-sak toa7-lau5-lai7 kui-seng-khu kng-liu-liu
Bin5-si7 sin-bun5 po3-to7
Tai5-pak-chhi7 keng2-hong thau3-cha2 si5-tiam2，
chiap-hek8 bin5-chiong3 po3-an3，
ti7 Tiong-san-pak-lou7-ji7-toaN7 chit8-tong3 toa7-lau5-lai7，
hoat-hian7 chit8-mia5 chiah chhut-si3 chit8-kou3-goeh8-toa7 e5 cha-bou2-eN-a2，
pi7-chng-ti7 chhiu2-the5-te7-a2-lai7，
kui-seng-khu kng-liu-liu，
gi5-su7 cho-lang5 pang3-sak。
chit-mia5 cho-pang3-sak-e5 cha-bou2-eN-a2，
pi7 chu7-hou7 hoat-hian7-si5，
kui-seng-khu teng2-e7 bo5-chheng7 jim7-ho5-saN，
pi7-chng-ti7 chhiu2-the5-te7-a2 lai7-bin7，
tan3-ti7 saN-lau5 hang7-lou7-e5 pun3-so3-thang2 piN-a2，
keng2-hong chiap-hek8 po3-an3-au7 koaN2-kau3 hian7-tiuN5 ，
kin2-kip chiong chit-mia5 cha-bou2-eN-a2 sang3-ong2 Ma2-kai-peN7-iN7，
ho2-kai-chai3 cha-bou2-eN-a2 sin-the2 chong7-hong2 liong5-ho2，
keng2-hong chiong-tiau3-oat8 toa7-lau5 kam3-si7 liok8-iaN2-toa3，
lai5-chau2-chhoe7 chit-mia5 cha-bou2-eN-a2-e5 chhin-lang5。
chit8-pah-khong3-saN-hoe3 thoan5-kau2-su7 soan-kau3 iong2-seng
chu7-iu5-si5-po3 ki3-chia2 Tan5-keng2-bin5、Chhoa3-pek-leng5 chong-hap8-po3-to7
thoan5-kau2-su7-kip chin-choe7，
tan7 「lau7-tiang5-siu7-kip thoan5-kau2-su7」，
choan5-kok kho2-leng5 kan-na7 Ng5-hau3-han3 chit8-lang5。
Tai5-pak-chhi7 Pak-tau5-khu e5 Eng2-him-li2，
chit8-pah-khong3-saN-hoe3 lau7-tiang5-siu7 Ng5-hau3-han3，
sin-the2 iong2-khian3、hiN7-khang-lai7 bak8-chiu-kim，
e7 chu7-li2 seng-oah8 khia7-khi2、lu2-heng5 un7-tong7、
im2-sit8 bo5-khi7-chhui3 …，
kau2-chap8-lak8-hoe3 hit-ni5，
iau2-ham siau3-lian5 kau3-iu2 khi3 Siu3-kou-loan5-khe ko3-chun5；
hun-au7 chhiaN5-u7 hau7-seN-nng7-e5 cha-bou2-kiaN2 chit8-e5，
si3-chap8-hoe3 kui-ke sin3-hong7 Ia-sou-Ki-tok，
hui-siong5 khian5-seng5，
chiong seng3-keng 「lang5 cheng3-e5 si7-siaN2-mih，
siu-e5 to-si7-siaN2-mih」 cho3-ka-hun3，
lau7-phoaN7 kui2-ni5-cheng5 bong5-Chu2-un-tiau3，
i tng5-ni5 toa3-ti7 Hoa-lian5 chhi7-tiau3-hoe7。
Ng5-hau3-han3 kong2，
kiaN2-sun u7-e5-ti7 Tai5-pak，
u7-e5-ti7 Bi2-kok，
i ti7 Hoa-lian5 u7 kau3-iu2 poe5-phoaN7，
tak8-kang thau3-cha2 ham「oah8-lek8 tau3-tin7-e5」 ki5-to2、
thak8-seng3-keng、chu7-hoe7 oah8-tang7，
jit8-chi2 peng5-cheng7-iah-chhiong-sit8。
「Sin5 lau5-goa2 ti7-te7-chiuN7，
goa2 to-ai3 ui7 Sin5 cho3-tai7-chi3。」
Ng5-hau3-han3 kiN3-lang5 to thoan5-pou3 hok-im，
che7-hoe2-chhia lai5-hoe5 Tai5-pak ham Hoa-lian5 tou5-tiong，
e7 tui3-tioh8 keh-piah-ui7 seng5-kheh thoan5-kau3，
choe7-pai2 kau3-kok-goa7 thoan5-kau3，
choan5-kiu5 tiuN2-lo2 tong5-kang tek8-hoe7，
pun2-goeh8-chhoe ti7 Hui-lut8-pin ku2-heng5，
i kap kok-kok kau3-iu2 kau-liu5，
pi7-o-lo2-cho3 「lau7-tiang5-siu7-kip thoan5-kau2-su7」。
「kam2-sia7 Chu2-e5-un-tian2！」
Ng5-hau3-han3 toa7-han3-kiaN2 Ng5-sin piau2-si7，
lau7-pe7 pah-hoe3-ko-leng5 iau2 oah8-lek8 chhiong-phai3、
lau7-to3-khong-kian7，
「chiah8-Chu2、lim-Chu2、hiang2-siu7-Chu2，
kho2-leng5 si7 lau7-pe7 e5 iong2-seng tiong5-siu7 pi3-hng」，
oan-na2-ham lau7-pe7 cho3-kun-jin5，
u7 thoan3-lian7 the2-leng5 ham ge7-lek8，
peng5-siang5 po2-chhi5 un7-tong7，
u7 bit8-chhiat-koan-he7。
「Ng5-lau7-a-peh cheng-sin5-kiau-kiah8，
chhiuN7 Tai5-pak it-khong3-it-toa7-lau5 in2-lang5-chu3-bok8，
goa2 ho7-i-cho3『it-khong3-it lau7-a-peh』。」
Eng2-him-li2 kan3-su7 Ng5-bi2-tin kong2，
teng2-jit8 i sang3 Tiong5-iong5 keng3-lo2 le2-kim ham kim-chhiu2-chi2，
i him-jian5 siu-loh8-lai5，
toe3-boe2-chiu7 tui3 i soan-kau3 oa2 ji7-chap8-hun-cheng，
「chin-poe7-hok8 i-e5 su-lou7 chheng-chho2，
siaN-im chheng-song2」；
Pak-tau5-khu-tiuN2 Li2-bi2-le7 ka7 lau7-tiang5-siu7 a-peh-e5 chhio3-khoe-tai7，
kio3-cho3 「Pak-tau5-chi-po2」。
tong5-oh8 chok-giat8 phoah-sio-chui2 kok-sio2-seng thng3-siong
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5 po3-to7
hak8-hau7-e5 lim-chui2-ki，
si7 ui7-tioh8 hou7 hak8-seng lim-chui2 hong-pian7，
m7-koh Sin-tek chit8-sou2 sio2-hak8，
soah-in-ui7 hak8-seng chhiu2-chian7，
iong7 sio-chui2 phoah tong5-oh8，
cho7-seng5 chit8-mia5 si3-ni5-kip-e5 hak8-seng saN-tou7-thng3-siong，
bok8-cheng5 hau7-hong tu2-ti7，
tiau-cha tau3-te2 si7-siaN2 jia2-e5-su7？
ti7 ji7-chap8-ho7 e7-pou，
Sin-tek Bin5-hu3-kok-sio2 chit8-mia5 si3-ni5-kip hak8-tong5，
chau2-pian7-sou2-si5 keng-koe3 oah8-tang7-tiong-sim e5 lim-chui2-ki piN-a2，
gu7-tioh8 tong5-oh8 phoah-sio-chui2 thng3-siong，
iu5-u5 lim-chui2-ki sio-chui2 un-tou7 koan5-kau3 chit8-pah-tou7，
cho7-seng5 cha-pou-tong5-oh8 e5 e7-hoai5 saN-tou7-thng3-siong，
pi7 kin2-kip-sang3-i。
hak8-seng-ka-tiuN2 khi3-toa7-toa7-e5 po3-keng2 chhu2-li2，
hau7-hong oan-na2 kin2-kip-tiau3-khai hoe7-gi7，
chau2-chhoe7 bok8-kek hak8-seng，
chai-iaN2 chok-giat8-e5 hak8-seng chheng7-gu5-a2-khou3，
choan-kang tui3-hau7-lai7 chheng7 gu5-a2-khou3-e5 hak8-seng sun5-bun7，
m7-koh iu5-goan5 bo5-kiat-ko2，
hau7-hong tui3-ka-tiuN2 seng5-lok8，
ti5-liau2 boeh-tui3 siu7-siong hak8-seng chin3-heng5 hu3-to7，
oan-na2-e7 tiau-cha tau3-te2-si7 toh-ui7 hak8-seng jia2-su7，
tek-khak hou7-chit8-e5 kau-thai7，
tong5-si5 tui3-hau7-lai7 sou2-u7 hak8-seng chai3-kau3-iok8，
pi7-bian2 lui7-su7 i3-goa7 hoat-seng。
Kok-kong-kheh-un7 hui5-hiam2 ka3-su2 jih8-chhiu2-ki bo5-giah8-thau5
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
chit8-piN khui-chhia iau2-chit8-piN kha3-heng5-tong7-tian7-oe7，
hui5-hiam2 ka3-su2 chin-e5 m7-si7-khoan2！
Kok-kong kheh-un7 e5 su-ki pi7 bang7-iu2 that-piak，
kin-ni5 goeh8-chap8-tiong，
khui-chhia iau2 kha3-tian7-oe7，
to-an2-ne chit8-lou7 tui3 Tai5-pak-koan7 khui-kau3 Tai5-tiong，
koe3-teng5 tong-tiong，
u7 kui-chap8-biau2-cheng bo5-giah8-thau5，
chit-ui7 ka3-su2 kai2-sek，
i chi2-si7 khoaN3-siaN2 phah-lai5 to-sui5 chhih8-tiau7，
m7-si7 ti7 phah-kan2-sin3，
put-ko3 Kok-kong-kheh-un7 piau2-si7，
i2-keng tiau3-oat8 ka3-su2 thong-lian5-ki3-lok8，
bo5-pai5-tu5 ki3-toa7-ko3 ah tit8-chiap-thai5-thau5！
Seng5-tai7 bo5-lang5-hui-ki sia2-ha7 A3-chiu lou7-cham7-pi
Bin5-si7 sin-bun5 Lim5-Chun3-Beng5 Tai5-lam5-chhi7 po3-to7
Seng5-kong-tai7-hak8 geng2-hoat bo5-lang5-hui-ki e5 ki-sut8，
seng5-kong te3-cho7 pah-kong-li2 hui-hang5-e5 ki3-lok8，
pian3-seng5 A3-chiu siong7-choat8-teng2-e5 bo5-lang5-hui-hang5 ki-sut8 thoan5-tui7，
chit-pai2 bo5-lang5-hui-ki la7-poe-ho7，
tui3 Tai5-lam5-koan7 Chhit-kou2 chhut-hoat，
poe-kau3 PheN5-ou5 au7 koh to2-poe，
koe3-teng5-tiong u7 sou3-chap8 kong-li2 e5 hang5-theng5，
long2-si7 hui-ki chu7-chu2-hui-heng5，
sia2-ha7-liau2 sin-e5 lou7-cham7-pi。
chit-chiah bo5-lang5-hui-ki la7-poe-ho7，
ki-sin-ha7 e5 liap-iaN2 chou-kiaN7，
ki3-lok8-liau2 hui-heng5 koe3-teng5-tiong，
toe7-bin7 eng2-siong7-e5 it-ki2-it-tong7。
ti7 kin-ni5 si5-goeh8-chhoe bun7-se3-e5 la7-poe-ho7，
si7 chin3-cheng5 Thian-go5-ho7 bo5-lang5-hui-ki e5 kai2-liong5-pan2，
hang5-theng5 tui3 chap8-lak8 kong-li2，
toa7-hok the5-seng-kau3 chit8-pah-kong-li2 i2-siong7，
ji5-chhiaN2 ti7 hui-hang5 koe3-teng5-tiong，
u7 saN-hun-chi-it e5 hang5-theng5，
chhiau-chhut-liau2 toe7-bin7 khong3-che3-cham7 e5 kam3-khong3 hoan7-ui5，
oan5-choan5-si7 bo5-lang5-chhau-chok chu7-chu2 hui-heng5-e5 chong7-thai3，
la7-poe-ho7 tu5-liau2 hui-heng5-he7-thong2，
iau2-u7 oe7-chheN-to7-hang5、
ki-chai3-tian7-nau2 ham iau5-khong3，
i2-kip8 liap-iaN2 chou-kiaN7 teng2-teng2-e5 siat-pi7，
e7-eng7-ka7 khong-phah-e5 eng2-siong7 kip8-si5 thoan5-hoe5 toe7-bin7-cham7，
bi7-lai5-e5 eng3-iong7 siong-tong kong2-hoat，
tu5-liau2 kun-su7 goa7，
ti7 kiu3-chai、tiau-cha、

ham toe7-bin7 bok8-piau-but8 tui-chong，
i2-kip8 eng2-siong7 hoe5-thoan5 teng2-teng2-e5 leng5-lek8，
cheng3-sit8 i-e5 seng3-leng5 i2-keng-si7 choan5-A3-chiu te7-it，
koh-si7 hou7-lang5 giong2-bong7 khim-poe7-e5 Tai5-oan5-chi-kng。

peh-goeh8 chap8-kau2-ho7 kong-pou3 nng7-chheng-khong3-kau2-ni5，
sin-bun5-chu7-iu5 e5 chi2-piau，

to-beh kong-pou3 kau2-goeh8 sit-giap8-lut8 ah，
jin5-lek8-gin5-hang5 u7-kou2 kau2-goeh8 sit-giap8-lut8，
e7-ti7 pah-hun-chi lak8-tiam2-khong3-gou7 cho2-iu7，

i2-keng bo5-seN3-mia7 iaN2-chiah，
keng2-hong giau5-gi5，

hoat-seng hoe2-chhia chau2-sio-long3 e5 tiong7-tai7 kau-thong su7-kou3，

nng7-liat8 hoe2-chhia tng-si5 long2-tu2 khai-ong2 siu2-tou " New Delhi "，

kho2-leng5 bo5-hoat-hian7 keng2-ko3 phiau-chi3，
ah-si7 tong3-chhia be7-hu3，
kiat-ko2 i2 ko-sok chhiong-tng7 ti7-thau5-cheng5 theng5-sai2-e5 hoe2-chhia。
bak8-kek-chia2 piau2-si7，
chin-choe7 che7-chhia-e5-lang5 long2-pi7 phau-chhut chhia-goa7，
in-chhu2 iah siu7-siong。

phah-ke2-kiu5-an3 ah lak8-lang5 ji7-chap8-peh-ho7 iok-tam5 Cho5-gim2-hui
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5 po3-to7
kiam2-tiau cheng-pan7 chit-giap8-pang7-kiu5 chhiam-kiau2-an3，
pau-koat cheng5-kiu5-oan5 Chng-hong5-liong7、Ng5-chun3-tiong，
i2-kip8 goa7-ho7 hou7-lu3-a2 e5 chou2-thau5 Chhoa3-cheng3-gi5 teng2 lak8-lang5，
choan5-pou7 siu-ah kim3-kian3，
ji7-chap8-chhit-ho7 e5-pou，
si7 iok-tam5 Cho5-gim2-hui La-new cheng5-pou7-chhiu2 Tan5-chiau-eng2，
soa3-loh8-lai5 tioh8-si7 ji7-chap8-peh-ho7，
boeh-iok-tam5 Cho5-gim2-hui、

bok8-cheng5 in oan-na2-i2-keng pi7-han7-che3 chhut-keng2。
cheng5-chit-pang7-kiu5-oan5 Ng5-chun3-tiong，
iau2-u7 kai2-mia5-cho3 Chng-iu7-lim5 e5 Chng-hong5-liong7，
in-ui7 bak-tioh8 phah-ke2-kiu5 chit-an3，
pi7-khau3-siong7 chhiu2-khau3，
aN3-thau5 tiam7-tiam7-bo5-oe7，
kiam2-tiau ti7 chong2-koan3-kun-sai3 kiat-sok keh-kang，
toa7-tong7-chok sou-sek kiu5-tui7-sok-sia3、kiu5-oan5-khia7-ke，
iok-tam5 chap8-si3-lang5 kau3-an3，
ki5-tiong cho-siu-ah-e5，
pau-koat Chng-hong5-liong7、Ng5-chun3-tiong，
goa7-ho7 hou7-lu3-a2 e5 chou2-thau5 Chhoa3-cheng3-gi5，
ham chhiam-kiau2-cham7 e5 Ng5-jin5-gi7、
I5-chek-pin、TiuN-chong-kiat8，
leng7-goa7 gou7-lang5 eng7 gou7-ban7-kho3 kau-po2，
han7-che3 chhut-keng2，
iah saN-mia5 cheng3-jin5 tek-hoe5。

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5 po3-to7
Pang-kio5-te7-kiam2-su2 toa7-kui-bou5 sou-sek chit-pang7 chhiam-kiau2-an3，
chit-pai2 kiu5-oan5 jin5-sou3 bak-tioh8 siong7-che7-e5 HiaN-ti7-ChhiuN7-tui7，
chiam-tui3 Pang-kio5-te7-kiam2-su2 e5 hoat-gian5，
ji7-chap8-chhit-ho7 hoat-piau2 kong-khai-phe piau2-si7。
cheng-pan7 hoan7-choe7，
i5-hou7 chit-giap8-pang7-kiu5 khoan5-keng2 si7 kiam2-cha-koaN e5 chit-chek，
goan2 li2-kai2 peng7 chun-tiong7，

oe7-chah-phi3-siuN3 e5 kong2「Tiong-hoa5-chit-pang7 khi3-liau2-liau2-ah」？

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5 Li2-gak8-hoa5、Liau7-gim2-hiong5 Ko-hiong5-chhi7 po3-to7

ti7 Cho2-iaN5 e5 ku7-pou7-lok8 lai7，
bok8-cheng5 iau3 po2-liu5-liau2 chit8-pah-goa7-keng e5 kou2-chhu3，

hou7 Ko-hiong5-chhi7 leng2-sian Dubai teng2 ki5-thaN7 siaN5-chhi7，
chiaN5-choe3 Kok-ka-toe7-li2-pin5-to7 「chhiau-kip-siaN5-chhi7」 he7-liat8-chiat-bok8，

Kok-ka-toe7-li2-pin5-to7 「Chhiau-kip-siaN5-chhi7」 he7-liat8，
i2-keng po3-to7-koe3 Pa-le5、Lun5-tun、Niu2-iok、
Seng3-Po2-lo5 teng2 choan5-kiu5 ti-mia5-e5 toa7-tou-hoe7，
in2-chhoa7 choan5-kiu5-koan-chiong3 bi5-khoaN3 Chhiau-kip-siaN5-chhi7 lai7-pou7，
i5-he7 thong-sun7 un7-chok-e5 ki-chhou2-kian3-siat，
i2-kip8 sou2-bin7-lim5-e5 thiau-chian3。
i tui3 nng7-chheng-khong3-gou7-ni5 khi2，
chiaN5-cho3 siang-tong siu7-hoan-geng5-e5 he7-liat8 chiat-bok8。
chhiam-iok-gi5-sek cha2-khi2 ti7 Ko-hiong5-chhi7 Kim-tian2-chiu2-tiam3 ki2-heng5，
iu5 chhi7-tiuN2 Tan5-kiok ham Kok-ka-toe7-li2-pin5-to7 chu-chhim-chong2-chhai5 Jonathan Ellis kiong7-tong5 chhiam-iok。

Lai7-ou5-soaN3 thong-chhia-au7 hong-pho7-put-toan7，

e7-soan2-tek8 Bombardier he7-thong2 si7 kun-hoe2-siong tui3-tiong-khiu2-koan-he7，

eh8-sio2 chhia-siuN，put-toan7 chhut-pau，
tong-chhou an-choaN2 soan2-tek8 he7-thong2-e5，

gi7-oan5 kong2 kun-hoe2-siong to-si7 Lai5-hok-kong-si，

iau2-u7 F-chap8-lak8 e5 siau-siu5。

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5 Tai5-tiong-po3-to7
Tai5-tiong-koan7 jin5-khau2 siong7-choe7-e5 Tai7-li2-chhi7，
u7-chit8-e5 Lai7-sin-hong5-hun-chhi7-a2，
tak8-kang e5-pou saN-si3-tiam2 koe3-au7，
it-tit8-kau3 am3-thau5-a2-si5 chong2-si7 kap8-kap8-kio3，
chhi7-a2-lai7 kheh-moa2 be2-mih8-a2 jin5-tiau5，
chin7-koan2 chit-ma2 seng-sian chhiau-chhi7、
pian7-li7-siong-tiam3 chit8-si3-ke3，
m7-koh in-ui7 i-e5 hoe3-sek chiau5-chng5，
ke3-siau3-siok8，
koh-u7 be7-chio2 cho3-pian7-e5 sek8-chhai3-png7，
in-chhu2 it-tit8-u7 be7-chio2 si2-tiong-e5 kheh-goan5。
jit8-thau5 tng-loh8-soaN，
Tai7-li2 e5 Lai7-sin hong5-hun-chhi7-a2，
chiah-tu2-beh lau7-jiat8-khi2-lai5，
lau7-jiat8 hoa7-hoa7-kun2-e5 be2-be7-siaN，
giu2-kin7 taN3-a2-hoan3 kap lang5-kheh e5 ku7-li7，
iong7-e5、chiah8-e5 long2-kang7-khoan2，
thau5-ke khiau2-lai7-e5 to-hoat khip-in2-chu3-i3，
iu5-kim-e5 hahN-ah ho2-be7-khoan2 hau7-ko2，

iau3-ai3 boan2-chiok li2-e5 chhui3-lou7，
iah-tu5-liau2 sek8-chhai3-png7，
chia-e5 hai2-sian m7-na7 pi2-ke3-siau3，
iau3-tioh8 pi2-sin-sian。
tng2-chit8-e5-oat khoaN3-tioh8 bin5-chiong3 khia7-pai2-tng5-lo3-lo3，
chit-taN3 u7 chha2-mi7、
chha2-bi2-hu kap iu5-png7 chai7-li2-soan2-tek8，
chhui3-ta-ah chia-u7 chhiong-boan2 hoai5-liam7-chu-bi7 e5 tau7-leng，
tham-chiah8-e5 iau2-e7-eng7 chiah8-khoaN3-mai7，
kang7-khoan2 chhiang5-chhiang5-kun2 e5 sian-bah-pau。
chin7-koan2 pian7-li7-siong-tiam3 kap toa7-be7-tiuN5，
the5-kiong chin-choe7 jit8-siong5-sou2-su，

siok8-ke3-hang5-khong thui-chhut pah-ban7-e5 bian2-hui3 ki-ui7
Chu7-iu5-Si5-Po3 Tai5-pak-po3-to7
siok8-ke3-hang5-khong koh-thui chhiok-siau-oah8-tang7 khip-in2 lang5-kheh！
A3-chiu-hang5-khong ti7 chap8-it-goeh8 chap8-ho7 soan-pou3，
the5-kiong chit8-pah-ban7-e5 kio3-cho3 bian2-hui3-e5 cho7-ui7，
kin-a2-jit khi2 khai-hong3-i7-tiaN7
Tai5-pak-poe-Ban7-kok kou-choa7，
chi2-iau3 chi-hu3 ki-tiuN5-soe3 saN-pah-saN-chap8-kho3 chiu-e7-sai2。
A3-chiu hang5-khong piau2-si7，
chit-si7 iu2-su2-i2-lai5 siong7-toa7-e5 bian2-hui3-chhiok-siau，
oah8-tang7 tui3 chap8-it-ho7 thau3-cha2 leng5-si5-khi2 tian2-khui，
sek-chhut chit8-pah-ban7-e5 bian2-hui3-cho7-ui7，
pian3-kip8、Tai5-oan5、Tiong-kok、Thai3-kok teng2 chhit-chap8-e5 hang5-tiam2，
chong2-ke3 chhiau-koe3 ji7-chap8-e5 kok-ka，
kap chit8-pah-saN-chap8-tiau5 hang5-soaN3 sek-iong7，
chap8-it-ho7 kau3 chap8-gou7-ho7 khai-hong3 bang7-lou7-teng7-be2，
ki-phio3 u7 su2-iong7-e5-ki5-han7，
kau3 me5-ni5 gou7-goeh8-chhoe-it kau3 chap8-goeh8-saN-chap8-ho7 chi2。
put-ko3 che7 siok8-ke3-hang5-khong e5 thok-un7-heng5-li2，
eng7-chhan、lim-im2-liau7 long2-ai3 giah8-goa7-hu3-hui3。
am7-kui-soaN3-hong-po7 gou7-jin7-si7 kam2-mou7 hiam2-bo5-mia7
Chu7-Iu5-Si5-Po3 ki3-chia2 Ho5-giok8-hoa5 Tai5-pak po3-to7
li2-e7-thang siong2-siong7-bou3？
sin-the2 chhiuN7 chi2-e7-sai2 khui si5-sok chit8-pah-kong-li2 e5 chhia，
soah-tut8-jian5 eng7 nng7-pah-gou7-chap8-kong-li2 si5-siok8 po7-chhiong，
ti3-su2 leng5-kiaN7 choan5-pou7 siau-mou5 po3-siau，
sin-the2 khi3-koan chit8-bak8-nih chhiuN7 peng-pai7-ju5-soaN-to2！
「am7-kui-soaN3 hong-po7」tioh8-si7 an2-ne-e5 cheng3-thau5，
e7-sai2 kheng-i7 toat8-chau2 chit8-e5-lang5-e7 seng3-beng7。
Tai5-pak-koan7 Tiong-ho5-chhi7 Lau5-sio2-chia2，
u7 am7-kui-soaN3-khong3-chin3 iah-put-chu7-ti，
chap8-goeh8 in-ui7 kam2-mou7-au7 gau5-chhoan2 chiu7-i，
mng5-chin2 chit8-si5-a2 piN3-chiaN5 kip-chin2，
toa3-chin3 ka-hou7-peN7-pang5 au7 to ham7-loh8-hun-be5，
mui2-hun-cheng sim-thiau3 kau3 nng7-pah-e7，
te2-te2-kui2-hun-cheng chi-lai7 to-chhut-hian7 sim-kham7-kheh8，

ke3-teng5-chhia su-ki kap am3-tng2-lai5-e5 lu2-chu2，
ai3-se3-ji7 ka-ki7-an-choan5！
toa7-Tai5-pak kap Tai5-tiong-te7-khu，

seng-be5-hun au7-se2-kiap chai5-but8！

kok-jin5 ni5-su2-iong7-liong7 te7-it-e5 ai3-khun3-ioh8 " Stilnox "

Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5

kin-a2-jit sio-lian5-soa3-sio，
thui-phah Sia7-tiong2-teng5 e5 Tek-pak-hun-kiok8-tiuN2 Li2-bou5-ong7，

hou7-tak8-ke khoaN3-hian7-hian7，
tioh8-si7-beh tho2-chit8-e5-kong-to7。

Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
Lai7-ou5-chiat8-un7 koh-hoat-seng tiong7-tai7-i3-goa7！
cha2-khi2 peh-tiam2-saN-chap8-saN-hun，
chiat8-un7 phian-ho7 it-khong3-it kap it-khong3-chhit ho7 liat8-chhia，
ti7 Lai7-ou5-ki-chhiuN2 tiau3-tou7-si5，
keng2-jian5 chhut-hian7 tui3-long3-i3-goa7，

beh chin7-sok chhiuN2-siu，

" Be7-eng7-bo5-li2 " toa7-iann5 Te3-lip8-jim2 phau7-hoe5 si3-cho7 Kim-be2

lai5-khoan3 kin-ni5 e5 Kim-be2-chiong2 ，
choh8-jit8 ji7-chap8-peh-ho7 am3-si5 seng7-tai7 chin3-heng5 ，

si7 Te3-lip8-jim2 chip-to7 e5 " Be7-eng7 bo5 li2 " ，
chit8-khun3 theh8-loh8 si3-hang7 toa7-chiong2 。

iau3 it-tou7 ti7-bu2-tai5-teng2 lau5-ha7 lam5-ji5-bak8-sai2 。

hi-bong7 kang3-ke7 pi-kiok8 hoat-seng-e5 ki-lut8。
Kim-be2-chiong2 choe3-ka-iaN2-phiN3 「 Be7-eng7-bo5-li2 」 cho7-tam5-hoe7，
kun-ki3 thong2-ke3，
Tai5-oan5 chu7-sat-jin5-khau2 pi2-lut8，
phou2-phian3-ui7 lau7-hoe3-lang5 ham tang7-cheng3-chia2，
Chu7-sat-hong5-ti7 hak8-hoe7 tek8-piat8 tiau3-khai chit8-tiuN5 cho7-tam5-hoe7，
soan-to7 hong5-ti7 koan-liam7，
chap8-ji7-goeh8-it-ho7 si7 se3-kai3-Ai3-chu-peN7-jit8，
soan2-ti7 chit-kang thui-kong2 chu7-sat-hong5-ti7-koan-liam7，
oan-na2-si7 ui7-tioh8 pang-chou7 khah-choe7 Ai3-chu-peN7-hoan7-chia2，
eng3-kai iong2-i5 bin7-tui3 chit8-peN7，
mai3-kheng-i7 hong3-khi3 seN3-mia7，
chhut-sek8 cho7-tam5-hoe7-e5 i-kai3 ham hak8-kai3-jin5-su7，
chhiu2-li2 theh8-tioh8 chu7-sat-hong5-ti7-tou5-khah，
put-toan7-tiong5-sin 「Chit8-bun7 Ji7-eng3 SaN-choan2-kai3」 khau2-ho7，
hi-bong7 thau3-koe3-oah8-tang7 e7-sai2 pang-chou7 khah-choe7-lang5，
iong2-i5-bin7-tui3 seN3-mia7-e5 choan2-chiat。
thoan5-thong2-san2-giap8 hoan2 ECFA It-ji7-it khong3 hoe2-toa7
Bin5-si7 sin-bun5-po3-to7
Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 ham Tiong-kok chhiam ECFA si3-chai7-pit-heng5，
i2-keng pi7-jin7-tiaN7 e7-siu7-tioh8 chhiong-kek-e5 thoan5-thong2-san2-giap8，
kau3-chit-ma2 Ma2-Eng-Kiu2，
m7-na7 ti5-ti5 the5-be7-chhut siong-koan chhou3-si，
iau2-phian-cho7 thoan5-thong2 kong-long5-san2-giap8 chi-chhi5 ECFA e5 ke2-siong7，
in-chhu2 giap8-chia2 i2-keng koat-teng7，
chap8-ji7-goeh8-chap8-ho7 beh-chiuN7-pak kau3 heng5-cheng3-iN7 hoat-chhut hau2-kio3。
in ka7 sak-khu3，
pi2-ju7-cho3 Ma2-Eng-Kiu2-cheng3-hu2 e5 ECFA phoe3-tho3，
phoe7-phou、lai7-saN、hoe-chng e5-a2-giap8 teng2，
chap8-kui2-e5 thoan5-thong2-san2-giap8，
tui3 Ma2-Eng-Kiu2-cheng3-hu2 hoat-chhut khong3-gi7。
in jim7-ui5，
Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 ui7-tioh8-chhiam ECFA tui3-jin5-bin5 chiaN3-hou2-lang5
iu5-ki5-si7 thoan5-thong2-san2-giap8 kin-pun2 oah8-be7-loh8-khi3，
oan5-kang tan2-leh sit-giap8。
ECFA tui3 thoan5-thong2-san2-giap8-e5 chhiong-kek，
chit8-ni5-lai5 put-toan7 hiong3 cheng3-hu2 hoan2-eng3，
m7-kuh Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 long2-bo5 chek-kek8-hoe5-eng3，
in-chhu2 in koat-teng7 chap8-ji7-goeh8-chap8-ho7 Se3-kai3-jin5-koan5-jit8，
chi3-chio2 gou7-pah-mia5 giap8-chia2 beh-chiuN7-pak，
chiuN7-ke-thau5 kap Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 cheng3-hu2 ai3-chit8-e5 thang-eng7-e5「phoe3-tho3 chho3-si」。
thau3-thiN-chhu3 gi5-su7 ga2-suh goa7-lau7 khui jiat8-chui2-khi3 jia2-ho7
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
Ko-hiong5-chhi7 am3-si5 kiaN-thoan5 khi3-phok8，
chit8-tong3 saN-lau5-thau3-thiN-chhu3 thoan5-chhut pok8-cha3-siaN，
toe3-boe2 ji7-lau5 khai-si2 chheng3-ian，
keng2-siau-jin5-oan5 koaN2-kau3-hian7 koan3-kiu3，
bo5-kau3-poaN3-tiam2-cheng to-chiong hoe2-si3-phah-hoa，
toa3-ti7 chhu3-lai7 chit8-tui3 cheng5-phoaN7，
lam5-hong pho7-tioh8 lu2-peng5-iu2 to5-kau3 goa7-thau5 hoah-kiu3-lang5，
li2-chu2 tang7-siong iau2-ti7-kip-kiu3，
kin-ki3 keng2-siau chhou-pou7-gian2-phoaN3，
it-lau5-e5 ga2-suh-thang2 gi5-su7 lau3-khi3，
tong-si5 hit-mia5 li2-chu2 phah-khui jiat8-chui2-khi3 au7，
tu2-beh se2-sin-khu kiat-ko2 cho7-seng5-i3-goa7。
「chek-si5-siang7-pan」 hoah-tong3 Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 koh-bo5-seng5-sin3？
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5 po3-to7
Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 ui7-tioh8 kiu3-sit-giap8，
thui-chhut 「chek-si5-siang7-pan」ke3-oe7，
m7-koh chit8-ui7 bin5-chiong3 tui3 mui5-the2 tau5-sou3，
kong2-i-kau3 Hun5-Ka-Lam5-khu chiu7-giap8-hok8-bu7-tiong-sim eng3-teng，
goan5-pun2 liah8-chun2 saN-kang-au7 to-e7 kong-pou3 lok8-chhu2-mia5-toaN，
bo5-siuN7-kau3 soah-kan-ta siu-tioh8 choa2-chit8-tiuN，
chit8-hong tin-lang5 hoe3-sak-e5 to7-khiam-khe2-si7，
chhoe7-thau5-lou7 tit-koh-phah-bo5 e5 sim-cheng5，
sit8-chai7 chin-phaiN2 hou7-lang5-chiap-siu7。
ku7-ni5 e5 chap8-goeh8，
Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 thui-chhut 「chek-si5-siang7-pan」ke3-oe7，
tng-si5 Lo5-ui2-hoe7 chin-chhiaN-iaN7 tiau3-khai ki3-chia2-hoe7，
khi3-giap8 iau2 toa7-tiuN5-bin7-tin-lang5，
ju5-kim soah-thoan5-chhut 「chek-si5-siang7-pan」 hoah-tong3-e5 siau-sit，
chit8-ui7 bin5-chiong3 tau5-sou3，
chap8-ji7-goeh8 ji7-chap8-si3-ho7 kau3 Hun5-Ka-Lam5-khu chiu7-giap8-hok8-bu7-tiong-sim eng3-teng，
pi7-ko3-ti saN-kang-au7 to-e7 kong-pou3 lok8-chhu2-mia5-toaN，
bo5-siuN7-kau3 chiu7-giap8-tiong-sim soah-eng7 i7-soan3 tu2-tioh8 tong3-kiat cho3-li2-iu5，
kia3-chhut tin-lang5 hoe3-sak-e5 to7-khiam-khe2-si7，
tau5-sou3 bin5-chiong3 chit-gi5 kin-pun2 bo5-seng5-sin3。
Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 tak8-kang ka7 kiu3-sit-giap8 koa3-chhui3-piN，
chit-ma2 Hun5-Ka-Lam5-khu chiu7-giap8 tiong-sim，
soah-thoan5-chhut i7-soan3 put-chiok-e5 bun7-te5，
Lo5-ui2-hoe7 kong2 boeh soa2-eng7 ki5-thaN7 keng-hui3 lai5-eng3-kip，
put-ko3 chit-khoan2 oe2-pian7-sou2 pou2-chau3-kha e5 chok-hoat，
si7-m7-si7 chin-e5 seng5-sim ai3-kai2-koat sit-giap8-bun7-te5，
bin5-chiong3 sim-lai7 iau2-u7 chiok choe7 gi5-bun7。
cheng3-chhek hai7-lang5 thai5-lang5-khi3-si koaiN nng7-ni5 chap8-lak8-ni5 au7 koh-hoan7
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
chit-pai2 lou7-tiong chheng3-sat li2-iu2-e5 seN3-Gou5 hiong-chhiu2，
chap8-lak8-ni5-cheng5 sat-hai7 li2-iu2 au7 khi3-si，
chiah koaiN-liau2 nng7-ni5-goa7 to-e7-sai2 chhut-gak8，
ui7-siaN2-mih8 thai5-lang5 chiah-koaiN-nng7-ni5，
si7-in-ui7 Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 ti7-tam-jim7 Hoat-bu7-pou7-tiuN2 ki5-kan，
kian-chhi5 beh-ka7 ka2-sek-mng5-kam7 kai2-pian3，
tui3-goan5-pun2-e5 ji7-hun-chi-it kai2-ui5 saN-hun-chi-it，
tong-si5 goa7-kai3 chit-gi5 ka2-sek mng5-kam7 kang3-ke7，
kin-pun2 bo5-pan7-hoat hou7 hoan7-choe7-e5 thiat-te2 kai2-thau5-oaN7-bin7，
m7-ku2 tong-si5-e5 Ma2-Eng-Kiu2 soah chip-si2-koat，
kin-a2-jit thai5-lang5 e5 pi-kiok8 chiah-e5 teng5-poaN。
u7-sin-lang5 chu3-ek8-biau5 gin2-a2 bo5-sim-thiau3
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
kok-lai7 kiaN-thoan5 chit8-mia5 u7-sin-lang5，
gi5-su7 in-ui7 cheng3-chu H1N1 ek8-biau5，
san2-seng put-liong5-hoan2-eng3！
chit-ui7 si3-chap8-it-hoe3 chun2-ma-ma，
u7-sin te7-saN-chap8-peh-le2-pai3 tit-beh-kau3-goeh8，
ti7 chap8-it-goeh8 ji7-chap8-chhit-ho7 cheng3-chu H1N1 ek8-biau5，
chap8-ji7-goeh8 ji7-ho7 san2-kiam2-si5，
hoat-hian7 gin2-a2 i2-keng bo5-sim-thiau3，
chi2-ho2 ti7 saN-ho7 e5 am3-si5 chin3-heng5 in2-san2。
sui-jian5 Chit8-peN7-koan2-li2-kiok8 seng5-lip8 gui5-ki-sio2-chou chin3-heng5-liau2-kai2，
iu5-goan5 kian-chhi5 cheng3-chu-chok-giap8 m7-bian2 chiam7-theng5！

m7-na7 Tai5-oan5-phai3-e5 tin7-iann5 ai3-hap8-chok，

oan-na2 an3-sng3 eng7-ka-ki7-e5 heng5-tong7，
khong3-gi7 Tiong-kok-ou-sim-hoe3，
bin7-tui3-ti7 Kang-piann2-khun ham Tan5-Hun5-Lim5 e5 hoe7-ki5-kan，
Tai5-oan5-phai3 beh-ki2-heng5-e5 kok-chiong2 iu5-heng5，
Go5-tun-gi7 kong2 ai3-u7-tou7-liong7。
tai7-hak-seng pian3-chong chio Go5-tun-gi7 pian7-lun7 ECFA
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5 po3-to7
Tai5-oan5-tai7-hak8 、 Tai5-pak-kho-ki-tai7-hak8 ham Su-hoan7-tai7-hak8 ，
chit-sann-e5 hak8-hau7-e5 hak8-seng-hoe7 ，
iau-chhiann2 Go5-tun-gi7 pian7-lun7 ECFA cheng3-chhek ，
put-ko3 ， soah-gu7-tioh ku7-choat8 。
tai7-hak hak8-seng-hoe7 tai7-piau2 chap8-lak8-ho7 cha2-khi2 ，
pian3-chong lai5-kau3 heng5-cheng3-inn7 mng5-khau2 khong3-gi7 。
in ti3-tioh8 seng3-tan3-bo7-a2 ，
chah-tioh8 toa7-ang5-boeh8-a2 ，
hi-bong7 Go5-tun-gi7 e7-thang-cho3 Seng3-tan3-lau7-lang5 ，
chhin-chu7 hu3-iok ham hak-seng pian7-lun7 。
hak-seng oan-na2 chit-gi5 ，
na7-chun2 pau-koat Go5-tun-gi7 kang7-khoan2 bu2-be7-chheng-chho2 ECFA ，
koh-be2 kiau2-soe3-e5 lin5-bin5 an2-choann2 an-sim ？
tai7-hak-seng-in ti3-tioh8 seng3-tan3-bo7-a2 ，
lai5-kau3 heng5-cheng3-inn7 mng5-khau2 ，
kam2-kong2 tho2 seng3-tan3-le2-but8 tho2-kau3 heng5-cheng3-inn7 lai5-ah ？
put-ko3 ， in-be2 ai3-e5 le2-but8 chin-bo5-kang7-khoan2 ，
tioh8-si7 hi-bong7 Go5-tun-gi7 cho3 seng3-tan3-lau7-lang5 ，
kap hak-seng-in ho2-ho2-a2-kong2 ECFA si7-siann2-mih ！
put-ko3 thiann-tioh8 Go5-tun-gi7 e5 hoe5-eng3 ，
i ka-ki7 oan-na2 bo5-chheng-chho2 ECFA ，
sou2-i2 oan2-ki7 chhut-sek8 。
hak-seng thiann-tioh8 liau2-au7 to3-khau ，
Go5-tun-gi7 kam2-si7 kiann-ah ？
Go5-tun-gi7 kek-tong7 hoan2-pok ，
kiong5-tiau7 ka-ki7 m7-si7 kiann-chian3 nng2-kha-he5 ，
soah-koh-kong2 i-si7 ai3-tui3 Lip8-hoat-inn7 hu7-chek 。
m7-kuh Go5-tun-gi7 m7-tang3 be7-ki3-ah ，

ti7 Sin-tek Tek-pak-te7-khu，

iang5-tai5-e5 chhai2-kng-tau3，

Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
kai-kong2 keng2-ki3-hoan3-san3？
iau3-si7 sin-seng-tai7 keng2-chhat-in long2 siunn-sin-tiau5？
koh-u7 keng2-chhat hip-ka-ki7 lo7-siang3 jia2-cheng-gi7，
chit-hoe5-si7 chit8-mia5 cha-pou-oan5-keng2，
i siang-tong chu7-ho5-u5 ka-ki7 heng-kham2-e5 peh-te3-kun-bah，
m7-na7 tai7-hong thng3-kng-kng chiann3-bin7 jip8-kiann3-thau5，
iau3-chiong siong3-phinn3 po-chiunn7 blog，
chhin-chhiunn7 chip-hoat heng5-siong7-e5 oan5-keng2 lou7 senn-sit8-khi3 hip-ka-ki7，

iau2-u7 lu2-keng2 ti7 tit8-pan-tai5 oe7-chng，
cheng-pan7-e5 an3-kiann7 sia2-ti7 blog，
siap8-hiam5 siap8-lau7-an3-cheng5，

kin-pun2-si7 iu5-chau2 hoat-lut8-kinn5-a2。

Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
tian7-si7-hi3-kek8 chin3-jip8 choe3-ko-tiau5 kai-toann7，
tan7 siang7-sin chit8-chip8 kiok8-cheng5，
soah-in-ui7 hi3-kek8-lai7 i-hou7-jin5-oan5 chit8-ku3：
'''' tit8-he7-hiat-chhin be7-sai2 su-hoeh '''' e5 khau2-peh8，
in2-hoat bang7-lou7-siong7 bang7-iu2 jiat8-liat8-tho2-lun7！
chin-choe7 bang7-iu2 tui3 an2-ne-e5 kong2-hoat，
hun-hun kam2-kak honn3-ki5，
jim7-ui5 u7-siann2-mih8 put-kho2-e5？
keng-koe3-hiong3 choan-giap8 i-seng kiu5-cheng3，
chit-chiah-hoat-hian7 goan5-lai5 cheng3-keng-e5，
pou7-hun7 chhin-chu2-kan-e5 hiat-ek8 u7-ham5 sio-kang5 ki-in，
su-hoeh-heng5-ui5 khiong2-kiann ti3-su2 sio-pai5-thek，
siang7-giam5-tiong7 chiang3-e7 ti3-si2！

thong-siong5 tui3 jin5-the2 bo5-hai7，
tan7-iau2-si7 bo5-an-choann2-ho2，

Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
i-kai3 phok8-hoat su2-siong7 siong7-toa7 kian3-siau3-tai7，
cheng5 Su2-lip8 Ke-lang5-penn7-inn7 senn3-Iunn5 i-seng、
cheng5 Tho5-hng5 I5-jin5-penn7-inn7 senn3-loa7 i-seng，
i2-kip8 cheng5 Hun5-lim5 Thian-chu2-kau3 Na7-sek-penn7-inn7 senn3-Gou5 i-seng sann-lang5，

cho3 chit8-toa7-tui bo5-pit-iau3 e5 ti7-liau5，
pau-ham5 the3 si3-mia5 hu7-lu2 chin3-heng5 leng-pang5 chhiat-tu5，

pang3-ian-hoe2 khong3-gi7 si-koa jiu5-seng3 chhiunn3-siann

ke3-siok8 si-tann2 te7-ji7-che7！

Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5

ek8-khu ti7 ku7-li5 Siu2-ni2 si3-chap8-gou7 kong-li2-e5 Pho7-chhoan te7-khu，

kiam2-hong ui7-tioh8 sin7-tiong7 koat-tiann7 khai-koan-giam7-si，
cha-beng5 lam5-hai5-e5 iu2-koan si2-in，
tui3 ka-siok8 lai5-kong2，
sim-cheng5 koh-khah-e5 tim5-tang7，

iau2 sio-hui2 ka-ki7 ka-hng5，
kau3-tann chit8-ke-khau2 u7-chhu3-boe7-tit-kui，
iau2-tioh8 chou-chhu3-toa3，

chin-e5-si7 pah-poann-bo5-nai7。

kau3-to7 bin5-chiong3 peng5-si5 eng3-koan-sim hong-thai toa7-chui2-hou7 sin3-sit，

kiong5-beh-ka7 chit8-chan5-lau5-koan5，

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
ui7-tioh8 hou7 Giok8-san e7 hiu-iong2 senn-thoann3，
Giok8-san-kok-ka-kong-hng5 koan2-li2-chhu3 tui3 it-goeh8 sann-chap8-it-ho7 khai-si2，
chiam7-si5 bo5-khai-hong3 bin5-chiong3 teng-soann，
ai3-tan2-kau3 sann-goeh8 lak8-ho7 ki2-heng5-oan5 khai-san gi5-sek-au7，
chiah-e5 teng5-sin chiunn7-soann，
leng7-goa7 kin-ni5 u7 chit8-pah-goa7-ui7 chi3-kang hiap8-chou7 cheng7-soann-oah8-tang7，
long2-chong2 khioh-liau2 sann-pah sann-chap8-kong-kin e5 pun3-so3 loh8-soann，
soan-si7 gi5-sek liau2-au7，
cheng3-sek-ui7 Giok8-san cheng7-soann-oah8-tang7 khi2-kou2，
khai-si2 ui5-ki5 chit8-ko3-goa7-goeh8-e5 hong-soann，
iau2-chhiann2-lai5 Chau-chok8 chin3-heng5 ki5-hok，
goan5-chu7-bin5 koa-siann koainn5-ong7 、 liau5-liang7，
hou7-lang5 thiann-liau2 jim2-be7-tiau5 kam2-tong7。
oah8-tang7-hian7-tiunn5 iau2-khng3-leh chit8-lok koh-chit8-lok pun3-so3，
choan5-si7 chit8-pah-goa7-ui7 chi3-kang chiunn7-soann khioh-lai5-e5，
chin-choe7-e5 pun3-so3，
long2-si7 bo5-kong-tek-sim-e5 soann-iu2 soa3-chhiu2 loan7-kiat，
chhau2-pho7-lai7、pou7-to7-siong7 long2-khoann3-e7-tioh8，
siong7-li5-phou2-e5-si7，
keng3-jian5-lian5 mou5-than2 long2-u7-lang5 kiat-ti7 soann-teng2。
thou5-chhoah-lau5 hong5-chai phai3-choan-oan5 ham hou7-liong3-thang2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5 Hun5-lim5-koan7 po3-to7
Kang-tng5-chhoan e5 khang-khoe3 si7，
Long5-ui2-hoe7 Chui2-thou2-po2-chhi5-kiok8 e5 thou5-chhoah-lau5 hong5-chai-choan-oan5，
chu2-iau3-e5 khang-khoe3 tioh8-si7 koan-chhek thou5-chhoah-lau5，
hui5-hiam2-si5 lip8-khek pang-bang5 thiat-li5 chhoan-bin5，
choan5-Tai5-oan5 u7-chiok-choe7 chiam5-chai7 hui5-hiam2 khe-lau5，
long2-u7 phok8-hoat thou5-chhoah-lau5 gui5-ki-e5 hui5-hiam2-seng3，
iah thiat-li5-e5 piau-chun2，
tioh8-si7 lai5-chu7 chit-chit8-e5 hou7-liong3-thang2，
khng3-ti7 moe2-e5 chiam5-chai7 khe-lau5 hu3-kin7，
tng toa7-hou7 lai5-kau3，

to-pian3-seng5 thou5-chhoah-lau5 ang5-sek-keng2-kai3 e5 chham-kho2。
keng-che3 ap-lek8 sio-iok hu3-hong5-choan5 kiann2 sin-bong5 pe7 tok8-hoat8
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
Tai5-pak-koan7 Sin-chng chit8-mia5 senn3-iunn5 cha-pou，
in-ui7 khang-khoe3 tng5-ki5 bo5-un2-teng7，
ka-siong7 chek-khiam3 nng7-kou3-goeh8 chhu3-chou，
keng-che3 kan-khun3 hu3-be7-chhut-chinn5，
chhu3-thau5-ke iau-kiu5-i poann-chhut，
ti7 chau2-thau5-bo5-lou7 chi-ha7，
i keng2-jian5 kap chiu7-thok8 kok-tiong-e5 hau7-senn iok-ho2，
cho3-hoe2 kiann5-te2-lou7 chu7-sat。
bo5-siunn7-tioh8 keh-kang thau3-cha2-chhenn2-lai5，
hoat-hian7 hau7-senn sin-te2 nge7-khok-khok si2-bong5，
ka-ki7 soah-to5-koe3 si2-kiap。

Eng-kok Tai5-oan5-gin2-a2 Lan5-Tai7-pit8 koe3-sin po3-to7
Chu7-Iu5-Si5-Po3 ki3-chia2 Ngo5-ui5-kiong Chiong-hoa3-po3-to7
tui3-se3-han3 chu7-chheng 「 Tai5-oan5-gin2-a2 」，
Eng-kok-chek8 Tai5-oan5-Ki-tok-tiunn2-lo2-kau3-hoe7 Chiong-hoa3-Ki-tok-kau3-penn7-inn7 eng5-u7-inn7-tiunn2 Lan5-Tai7-pit8，
teng2-jit8-ti7 Eng-kok-Lun5-tun koe3-sin，
hiang2-siu7 kau2-chap8-lak8-hoe3。
i-ti7 si5-se3-cheng5，
sia2-loh8 「 Tai5-oan5」 nng7-ji7，
mi5-liu5-chi-che3，
eng7-Tai5-gi2 kong2-chhut 「ai3-chiau3-kou3 kan-khou2-lang5」，
chiann5-choe3 siang7-boe2-e5-ui5-gian5。
Lan5-Tai7-pit8 si7 Chiong-hoa3-Ki-tok-kau3-penn7-inn7 chhong3-pan7-jin5 Lan5-Tai7-pit8 chi-chu2，
it-kiu2-it-su3-ni5 ti7 Chiong-hoa3-chhi7 chhut-si3，
ham Tai5-oan5-gin2-a2 kang7-khoan2，
ai3 khoann3 pou3-te7-hi3 、
tek-chhan5-inn teng2 gin2-a2-mih8，
chong2-si7 thng3-chhiah-kha chhit-tho5，
「goa2-seng-oh8 e7-kong2 Tai5-gi2 ， Eng-gi2 si7-au7-lai5 chiah-oh8-e5 。」
i-tiann7-tiann7 eng7-lian2-tng2 Tai5-gi2 kai3-siau7 ka-ki7 ：
「goa2-si7 Eng-kok-chek8-Tai5-oan5-lang5」 ah 「goa2-si7 Tai5-oan5-gin2-a2 」。

kin-ni5-chhoe Ka-gi7-koan7 Lok8-chhau2-hiong hoat-seng jin5-ke-chhu3 he2-sio，
sio-si2 chit8-mia5 lak8-hoe3 cha-pou-kiann2-a2，

koat-tiann7 khai-koan-giam7-si，
kiat-ko2 hoat-hian7 cha-pou-kiann2-a2 the2-lai7 gi5-su7-u7 chiu2-cheng hoan2-eng3，
ka-siok8-e5 thui-chhek-si7，
kiann2-a2 thau-thau-a2 lim-liau2 peng-siunn-lai7-e5 chiu2-cheng-im2-liau7，

hong-pong3 teng2-kip chhia-hoa-e5 Tai5-pak-It-khong3-it-kang2-mih8-tiong-sim，

thoe3-chhut kha-kiu5-toann5 leng7-chhong3 su7-giap8 Tiong-tian5-eng-siu7 u7-chit8-tho3
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
cheng5 a3-chiu kha-kiu5-sian-sinn Tiong-tian5-eng-siu7，
chham-ka-koe3 O3-un7、 se3-kai3-poe，
thang-kong2-si7 Jit8-pun2-pan2 e5 kha-kiu5 kim-tong5
i-ti7 ji7-chap8-kau2-hoe3 he-ni5 soan-pou3-thoe3-hiu，
tan7 su7-giap8 choe3-khah-toa7，
tau5-chu 、sia2-chheh 、phah-kong2-ko3、
long2-u7 boe7-bai2-e5 siu-jip8，
choe3-kun7-iau2 tai7-gian5 ti-beng5 lai7-khou3 phah-kong2-ko3，
hoa3-sin chiann5-choe3 seng3-kam2-ngou2-siong7。
kok-tiong-seng hoan2-hau7 theh8 kho3-pun2 tian7-tong7-mng5 giap thau5 toa7-hau2-kiu3-mia7
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
Biau5-lek8-koan7 Au7-lang5-kok-tiong，
hoat-seng chit8-khi2 hak8-seng-e5 thau5，
pi7-hau7-mng5 giap-tiau5-e5 chhenn-kiann-su7-kiann7，
goan5-lai5 chit-mia5 kok-it cha-pou-hak8-seng，
u7-mih8-kiann7 boe7-ki3-theh8，
chhiong-tng2 hak8-hau7-e5 si5-chun7，
hau7-mng5 i2-keng-beh koainn-khi2-lai5，
i-tong-si5 nge7-chong5，
chiah-e7 hoat-seng i3-goa7。
chap8-lak8-hoe3 oan7-kau-moe7 ka-jip8 choe3-tho3 cha3-chai5 chhiau-koe3 sou3-pah-ban7
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
chheng-siau3-lian5 koan-liam7 chhut bun7-toe5！
Sin-tek chit8-mia5 chap8-lak8-hoe3 e5 senn3-Tan5 siau3-lu2，
u7 choe7-pai2 oan7-kau keng-giam7，
u7 chit8-kang i chiunn7-bang7-lou7 hoat-hian7，
u7-lang5 teng-kiu5 choe3-tho3 lu2-chu2-kak，
jim7-ui5-pi2 oan7-kau khah-ho2-than3 iah-ka-jip8；
tui3-ku7-ni5 lak8-goeh8-khi2，
senn3-Tan5 siau3-lu2 ka-jip8-e5 cha3-phian3-chip8-thoan5，
eng7 oan7-kau-hong-sek siat-kiok8 choe3-tho3 chi3-chio2 lak8-pai2，
cha3-chai5 chhiau-koe3 sou3-pah-ban7-kho3。
chap8-gou7-hoe3 bi2-siau3-lu2 pian3 toa7-chi2-thau5-a2 siap8 chheng3-kek hoan3-tok8 cho-liah8
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
Tai5-tiong-keng2-hong pho3-hek8 chit8-e5 po7-lek8-tho2-siau3-chip8-thoan5，
hek-jian5 hoat-hian7 chit-e5 chip8-thoan5-e5 toa7-chi2-thau5-a2，
si7-chit8-mia5 chiah chap8-gou7-hoe3 e5 bang7-lou7 jin5-khi3-bi2-siau3-lu2。
iau3-bat chham-ka A3-chiu-sio2-chia2 soan2-poat8，
ki5-sit8 i ka-keng2-be7-bai2，
put-ko3 lau7-bo2 koe3-sin-liau2-au7，
i heng5-ui5 khai-si2 oai-chhoah8，
siang7-lou7-boe2 kiann5-am3-lou7。
cheng-chhu2
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
ui7-tioh8 cheng-chhu2 hok8-chong chu7-chu2-koan5，
Tai5-lam5-li2-tiong chiunn7-chheng-ui7 hak8-seng toa7-chhoan3-lian5，
li7-iong7 seng-ki5-si5-kan chip8-the2 「thng3-khou3 khong3-gi7」！
hak8-hau7 li2-hak8-seng kong2，
eng2-koe3 ta-ke long2-chheng7-tioh8 the2-iok8-te2-khou3，
ti7-hau7-hng5-tiong chu7-iu5-chhut-jip8，
m7-ko3 tu2-chiu7-jim7-e5 kau3-koann，
soah-kong2 an2-ne-e5 chheng7-chhah ui5-hoan2-hau7-kui，
sou2-i2 in chip8-the2 thng3-tiau7 tng5-khou3，
piau2-tat8 in-e5 sim-siann。
toa7-tann2 chhat8-a2 koeh-lang-kha giap eng5-bou7 liong7-liong7 li7-khui bang7-ka
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
Tai5-pak-koan7 Sam-kiap keng2-hong，
tai7-pou2 chit8-mia5 toa7-tann2-e5 bang7-ka chhat8-a2，
i bo5-thau the2-chek-se3-e5 liu3-chhi2 ah-si7 khi2-poann5，
iah-si7 tit8-chiap thau-chau2 ek8-chenn-eng5-bou7，
chinn-be7-jip8 goa7-tho3，
giap-ti7 koeh-lang-kha，
tai7-tai7-hong-hong kiann5-chhut-khi3，
ho2-ka-chai3 tiam3-lai7-e5 kam3-si7-khi3 hip-loh8-choan5-teng5，
chiah-e7 sun7-li7 liah8-lang5。
siang7-toa7 soa-tin5-po7 Ma2-chou2 ki-tiunn5 kui-kang tiann7-khi3
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
le2-pai3-ji choan5-Tai5-oan5 e5 bin5-chiong3 chhut-mng5，
it-teng7 long2-e7 kam2-siu7-tioh8，
goa7-bin7-si7 eng-phu2-phu2 e5 chit8-phiann2，
Khi3-siong7-kiok8 kong2 chiah-si7 in-ui7，
siang7-kiong5-e5 Tiong-kok-soa-tin5-po7 lai5-sip8，
phu5-koan5 liap8-a2-e5 long5-tou7，
chhiau-koe3 peng5-siang5-e5 sann-chap8-si3 poe7！
sui-jian5 Tai5-oan5-e5 ki-tiunn5 pan-ki cheng3-siong5 khi2-kang3，
put-ko3 li7-to2 Ma2-chou2 e5 ki-tiunn5，
leng5-kian3-tou7 chin-chha，
kui-kang koainn-khi2-lai5。
the5-chhenn2 beh-che7 pan-ki-e5 bin5-chiong3，
tek8-piat8 chu3-i3 si5-kan-pio2！
thou5-hun2-po7 in2-hoat he-ku cha-pou he-ku hoat-chok si2-bong5
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
thou5-hun2-po7 e5 ui-lek8 chin-e5 put-kho2-hut-si7，
chit8-mia5 gou7-chap8-kau2-hoe3 e5 cha-pou ti7 ji7-chap8-it-ho7 tng-kang，
tui3 Tai5-pak loh8-lam5-kau3 Ka-gi7 chin3-hiunn，
kho2-leng5-si7 thou5-hun2-po7 in2-hoat sin-the2 be7-ho2-si3，

sui-jian5 koann2-kin2 sang3-i-kip-kiu3，
tan3 iau2-si7 soan-ko3 bo5-i 。
kiann-hiam2 ko-sok-kong-lou7 kiau7-chhia thah8-chai3 sann-tai5 kha-tah8-chhia
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
kha-tah8-chhia-chok8 lu2-lai5-lu2-choe7，
tan7-ai3-beh chah-tioh8 kha-tah8-chhia si3-ke3-chhit-tho5，
iau3-si7-tioh8 chu3-i3-an-choan5！
u7-bin5-chiong3 chhin-bak8-khoann3-tioh8，
chit8-tai5 khui-ti7 ko-sok-kong-lou7-teng2-e5 kiau7-chhia，
si5-sok chhiau-koe3 chit8-pah-kong-li2，
au7-chhia-siunn ka-chng-e5 kha-tah8-chhia-ke3-a2，
soah thah8-chai3-liau2 sann-tai5 kha-tah8-chhia，
ji5-chhiann2 kha-tah8-chhia lian2-a2 iau2-chhiau-chhut kiau7-chhia-chhia-sin，
boe2-au7 kiau7-chhia kiann-kah8 koann2-kin2 pian3-oann7 chhia-to7，
to-kiann kha-tah8-chhia ban7-it lak-loh8-lai5，
e7-bo5-soe3-ji7 pi7-ham2-tioh8。
gi7-oan5 cheng3-sit8 Tan5-ti3-tiong kho2-leng5-soan2 Cheng5-tin3 Sio2-kang2-khu gi7-oan5
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
Tan5-ti3-tiong u7-i3-goan7 seng5-chiap lau7-pe7-e5 hiunn-lou5，
ong2 cheng3-toann5 hoat-tian2，
goan5-pun2 hiong-chhin ai3-i tng2-chou2-chhu3 Koann-tian5 ui7-bin5-hok8-bu7，
put-ko3 kin-ki3 Sam-lip8-sin-bun5 chiang2-ak-e5 siau-sit，
Tan5-ti3-tiong choe3-kin7 tiann7-tiann7-ti7 Ko-hiong5 Cheng5-tin3 ham Sio2-kang2-khu，
si3-koe3 pai3-hoe7-tioh8 ki-chan5，
chin7-koan2 Tan5-ti3-tiong hui-siong5 ke7-tiau7，
piau2-si7 iau2-bo5-khak-teng7，
put-ko3 chai7-toe7 Bin5-chin3-tong2-chek8-gi7-oan5 cheng3-sit8，
Tan5-ti3-tiong i2-keng koat-teng7-eng7 bo5-tong2-chek8-sin-hun7，
sann-chenn Cheng5-tin3 ham Sio2-kang2-khu e5 chhi7-gi7-oan5。
Hai2-siang7-phou5-sat " Toa7-ou5 kun-lam7 " hoe-li2-lo5 lam7-tiunn2 chhoa7-peng li7-iann5 lim-chiu2
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
sou3-iu2 「 Hai2-siang7 phou5-sat 」 chi-chheng-e5 Hai2-kun-kiu3-lan7-toa7-tui7 Toa7-ou5-kun-lam7，
keng3-sann-lian5-soa3 phok8-hoat ui5-ki2-kian3-siau3-tai7！
Toa7-ou5 kun-lam7-e5 lam7-tiunn2 Phoan-bun5-khun，
kui2-jit8-cheng5 bat-choe7-pai2 ui5-hoan2 iann5-kui ，
i2-kip8 kun-hong-e5 chian3-pi7-koan2-che3 kui-teng7，
ti7 ian2-sip8-cheng5 chhoa7-koann-peng li7-iann5 lim-chiu2-choh-lok8，
Toa7-ou5-kun-lam7 e5 hu3-lam7-tiunn2 iau2-chhoan3-kai2 chin3-chhut-koan2-che3-piau2，
leng7-goa7-u7 su7-koann khip-tok8 cho-i5-sang3 kun-su7-hoat-teng5，
kui-e5 kiu3-lan7-lam7 ju5-ka2-ka2！
boe2-au7 ， lam7-tiunn2 Phoan-bun5-khun hu3-lam7-tiunn2 Iunn5-seng3-giau5，
hun-piat8 tiau3-li5-hian7-chit kap ki3-nng7-ki sio2-ko3 nng7-ki sin-kai3-chhu2-hun，
ki5-thann ui5-kui-jin5-oan5 chhu2-i2 sin-kai3！
chui2-am5-kong2 si-kang thap-hong kang-lang5 pi7-mau-thau5 tang7-siong bo5-i
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai

Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
sann-chap8-ho7 am3-si5 chit8-pah-goa7-ui7 Ka-gi7-tai7-hak8 im-gak8-he7 hak8-seng，

Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai
Sin-tek chit8-mia5 hu7-jin5，
i-e5 ai3-khian2 ti7-koe-teng2 pi7-chhia-chong7-siong，
beh-ai3 chah8-ke3-teng5-chhia soah-it-tit8 tu2-tioh8 ki7-choat，
put-tek-i2-hiang3 It-it-kiau2 hoah-kiu3-lang5，

ngou2-kok-e5 Lam5-tau5-ko-tiong 、 Tai5-tiong-koan7 Tai7-li2-ko-tiong、

ti7 Hun5-lim5-koan7 Tau2-lak8-chhi7 Tin3-lam5-lou7，
chit8-keng ga2-suh-hang5 chhng-khou3，

Toa7-peng2 sann-tou7 khip-tok8 pi7-liah8 che3-chok-jin5 kam2-khai3 chu7-kiu5-to-hok
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
Toa7-peng2 cheng5-nng7-pai2 khip-tok8-su7-kiann7，
tang7-siong ka-ki7 ian2-ge7-chi-lou7，
kau3-tann sann-tou7 pi7-liah8，
oan-na2-hou7 chin3-cheng5 pang-bang5 an-pai5 piau2-ian2 ki-hoe7，
chiat-bok8 che3-chok-jin5 Sim7-giok8-lim5 jim2-be7-tiau5 hainn3-thau5，

Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5

siat-ti3 gin5-kak-a2-koan ai3-sim-siunn，

choan5-Tai5-oan5 long2-chong2-u7 si3-chheng gou7-pah-goa7-e5-tiam2，

Ko-hiong5-chhi7 Sio2-kang2 keng2-hong，
pho3-hek8 chit8-e5 hoan3-tok8-chip8-thoan5，

khip-siu hak8-seng khip-tok8 ham hoan3-tok8，

khiam7-phok-e5 i-iau2-si7 u7-kian-chhi5，
Tan5-chhiu7-kiok a-ma2 koat-teng7-eng7 kui-seng-khu-teng2-e7 bo5-kau3 chit8-chheng-kho3 e5 chng-thann7，

koh-chai3 in2-hoat cheng-gi7！

siang-hong tang7-kha-tang7-chhiu2 ，

ui7-tioh8 cheng-toat8 bio7-san2 ，
nng7-lang5 m7-na7 hou7-ko3 ，

sim7-chi3 lian5 lah-sap-oe7 oan-na2 kong2-chhut-chhui3 。

ge5-chhe sann-tou7 ke3 eng5-bin5 gek8 ang-sai3 loh8-ioh8 toat8 chai5-san2
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
chit8-mia5 Tiong-kok lu2-chu2，
ke3-hou7 toa7-i si3-chap8-goa7-hoe3-e5 lau7-eng5-bin5，
kiat-hun chiah-sann-ni5，
lau7-eng5-bin5 to-hoat-seng tiong3-hong toa3-inn7 ，
ka-siok8 hiau-gi5 Tiong-kok-phoe3-ngou2 gek8-thai7 lau7-eng5-bin5，
siap8-hiam5 bou5-chai5-hai7-mia7，
hoat-inn7-phoann3-koat nng7-lang5 li7-hun teng7-gian7，
chit-mia5 Tiong-kok-phoe3-ngou2 chhut-bin7 hoah-oan。
tan7-si7 an-iong2-tiong-sim i-hou7-jin5-oan5 chhin-bak8 khoann3-koe3，
lau7-eng5-bin5 sin-khu-teng2 ou-chhenn chit8-toa7-te3，
iau2-u7-lang5 khoann3-tioh8 chit-ui7 Tiong-kok-phoe3-ngou2，
ti7 tham3-si7 koe3-teng5-tiong
chhe lau7-eng5-bin5-e5 am7-kun2，
hou7-li2-jin5-oan5 chiong hoat-inn7-phoann3-koat seng3-sou3-e5 kiat-ko2，
ko3-ti lau7-eng5-bin5 liau2-au7，
i cheng5-su7 kek-tong7，
iau2-lak-loh8 bak8-sai2。
toa7-khou hiat-ap-koan5 kiam2-the2-tang7 e7 kang3-hiat-ap
Chu7-iu5-si5-po3-po3-to7
cha-pou-gin2-a2 chap8-it-hoe3 to hiat-ap-koan5，
a-bu2 chin-hoan5-lo2；
put-ko3 sann-chap8-kau2-hoe3 e5 koe3-lai5-lang5 keng-giam7 hian2-si7，
hinn3-tiau7 pui5-bah，
hiat-ap to-u7-ki-hoe7 cheng3-siong5。
sim-chong7-lai7-kho i-seng oan-na2-kong2，
the2-tang7 koe3-tang7 ah-si7 pui5-sin-chia2 kiam2-tang7 chit8-kong-kun，
hiat-ap e7-kang3-ke7 chit8-ho5-bi2 hong2-tu7，
sim-chong7-ki-kim-hoe7 kin-a2-jit8 tiau3-khai ki3-chia2-hoe7，
hou-iok8 ka-tiunn2 kap siau3-lian5-lang5 ai3-chu7-kak，
ko-hiat-ap m7-si7 lau7-lang5-penn7，
siau3-lian5-lang5 ko-hiat-ap khoann3-liau2-khoann3，
bun7-toe5 chhut-ti7 pui5-sin siau3-lian5-hoa3。
ka3-su2 ui5-kui put-boan2 chhu2-te3 ham keng2-hong chha2-nau7
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
koh-chhut-hian7-liau2 keng2-bin5 tiau5-tui3-e5 tiunn5-bin7，
put-ko3 chit-pai2-si7 ui7-tioh8 nng7-tiunn hoat8-toann！
Ke-lang5 keng2-hong kam3-li2-cham7，
chou2-seng5 choan-an3-sio2-chou sit8-si lou7-kiam2，
chap8-ji7-ho7 chhim-ia7 chit8-mia5 chhia-chu2，
in-ui7 ki7-choat8-ti7 hoat8-toann chhiam-mia5，
kap oan5-keng2 ti7-koe-thau5 tiau5-tui3 chit8-tiam2-cheng，
chit-mia5 chhia-chu2 m7-tann-ham keng2-hong oan-ke，
sim7-chi3 iau2-khan-thoa chit8-pinn tan2-chhia-e5 bin5-chiong3。
oan5-keng2 chiu2-ka3 long3-si2-lang5 liu5-soan bian2-chit i5-sang3 hoat-pan7
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
Sin-tek chit8-mia5 keng2-chhat Lim5-chin3-hui，
choh8-jit8 chap8-sann-ho7 ti7-chip-khin5 si5-kan-lai7，
thau-chau2-khi3 lim-chiu2，
ji5-chhiann2 chiu2-au7 iau2-khui-chhia，
long3-si2 chit8-ui7 gou7-lak8-hoe3 khia5-ou-tou2-bai2-e5-lang5，
siong7-khok-heng5-e5-si7 i m7-na7 bo5-theng5-chhia，
iau2-ka-sok liu5-soan，
keng2-chhat an2-ne ti-hoat-hoan7-hoat，
si2-chia2 ka-siok8 piau2-si7 lan5-i2-chiap-siu7。
kun-hong ka7-tiann7 hiong-chhiu2 Kang-kok-kheng3 pi7-heng5-kiu5 keng-khau2-keng chhin3-chhai2 chheng
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
chit-si7 hoat-seng-ti7 it-kiu2-kiu2-liok8-ni5，
Khong-kun-chok-chian3-su-leng7-pou7 chit8-mia5 su7-peng，
khan-khap8 gou7-hoe3 lu2-tong5 cho-seng3-chhim sat-hai7-an3，
kun-hong tong-si5 sin3-sok chheng3-koat su7-peng Kang-kok-kheng3，
Kam3-chhat-inn7 choh8-jit8 tui3 Kok-hong5-pou7 theh8-chhut kiu3-cheng3-an3，
jin7-ui5 kun-hong heng5-kiu5 keng-khau2-keng chho3-sat Kang-kok-kheng3，
tng-si5-e5 Khong-kun-chok-chian3-su-leng7 Tan5-tiau7-bin2，
oan-na2-pi7-chi2-khong3 ui7-tioh8 i5-hou7 kun-hong bin7-chu2，
siap8-hiam5-tui3 Kang-kok-kheng3 chin3-heng5 bit8-sek keng-khau2-keng。
Bin5-chin3-tong2 lip8-hoat-ui2-oan5 Chhoa3-hong5-long5 thong3-phoe，
Hoan2-cheng5-po3-chong2-tui7 tam-jim7 kun-hong-e5 「Tang-chhiunn2 gim2-i-oe7」，
Kok-hong5-pou7 eng-kai poe5-choe7 hoe7-sit-le2，
pit-su-ui7 Kang-kok-kheng3 ka-siok8 chheng2-kiu5 kok-ka-poe5-siong5，
tui-kiu3 tng-si5 su-leng7 Tan5-tiau7-bin2 teng2-lang5-e5 chek-jim7。

Chu7-iu5-si5-po3-po3-to7
Tiong-kok tim5-chun5 in2-hoat Kim-mng5 hai2-hek8-e5 hai2-iunn5-sinn-thai3 chhiong-kek，
Kim-mng5-koan7 chui2-san2-chhi3-giam7-sou2 ui7-tioh8 kai2-koat gui5-ki，
kin-a2-jit8 cha2-khi2-ti7 Hong-siang7 hai2-hek8 pang3-lau5 ham-a2 、 ou-hia，
hi-bang7 me5-ni5 teng5-hian7 hai2-siang7 seng-ki。
Kim-mng5-koan7 chui2-san2-chhi3-giam7-sou2 piau2-si7，
Tiong-kok-e5 「 Chiat-tong7-ki it-ngou2-liok8-ho7 」 hoe3-chun5，
it-goeh8 chap8-chhit-ho7 ti7 Kim-mng5 Hong-siang7 goa7-hai2 kho3-ta-au7 tim5-chun5，
chun5-teng2 chai3-un7 si3-pah-peh-chap8-chhit-tong3 Pun2-it-hi sok-ka-goan5-liau7，
iau2-u7 sann-pah-peh-chap8-tong3 Ko-nia2-thou5 goa7-siap8，

tui3-i5 khoan5-po2 kap sinn-thai3-khoan5-keng2 cho7-seng5 giam5-tiong7-chhiong-kek，
ti3-su2 Kim-mng5-hai2-hek8 hi5-giap8-chu-goan5 kiong5-beh kou-ta5。
hoe2-sio-chhia Pat-koa3-soann-pong7-khang hong-pi3 that-chhia chit8-kong-li2
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
ji7-chap8-kau2-ho7 e5 am3-si5 gou7-tiam2-goa7，
Chiong-hoa3-koan7 ham Lam5-tau5-koan7 chi-kan-e5 Pat-koa3-soann-pong7-khang，
hoat-seng hoe2-sio-chhia-e5 kiann-hiam2 i3-goa7。
chit8-mia5 cha-pou ka3-su2-e5 sio2-hoe3-chhia，
tut8-jian5 tioh8-hoe2 hiann5-sio，
ho2-ka-chai3 keng2-hong koann2-kau3，
theh8 phah-hoe2-khi3 hu3-si5 phok-biat8，
chit-pai2-e5 hoe2-sio-chhia bo5-lang5-siong-bong5，

that-chhia tng5-tat8 chit8-kong-li2。

Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5

Tai7-pa3-khe koh-thoan5 poah8-loh8-chui2 chap8-gou7-hoe3 hak8-seng sang3-i chhiunn2-kiu3-tiong
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
Tai5-pak-koan7-e5 Sam-kiap-tin3 Tai7-pa3-khe ，
koh-thoan5-chhut poah8-loh8-chui2 su7-kiann7，
cha2-khi2 chap8-tiam2-goa7，
chit8-phang5 kok-tiong-seng kap chhu3-lai7-lang5 kau3 Tai7-pa3-khe hang-bah，
ki5-tiong chit8-mia5 kok-tiong-seng，
sng2-chui2 tong-tiong sit-kha poah8-loh8-chui2，

thau-theh8 ki-bit8-an3 Bi2-kok Hoa5-hu2 iau-kiu5 pang3-lang5 Tiong-kok Pak-kiann nge7-si5
Chu7-iu5-si5-po3-po3-to7
tui3-u5 Bi2-kok-cheng3-hu2 hou-iok8 ，
sek-hong3 Bi2-kok-chek8 toe7-chit-hak8-ka Sih-hong，
Tiong-kok-cheng3-hu2 piau2-si7，
put-iong5 goa7-kok-se3-lek8 kan-siap8 Tiong-kok-e5 su-hoat chu2-koan5。
nge7-si5 Bi2-kok-cheng3-hu2 e5 the5-gi5，
goa7-kok-mui5-the2-po3-to7，
Tiong-kok-cheng3-hu2 chi2-khong3 Sih-hong，
siap8-hiam5 thau-theh8 Tiong-kok-e5 kok-ka-ki-bit8，
ti7 chhit-goeh8-gou7-ho7 phoann3 i iu2-ki5-tou5-heng5 peh-ni5。
Sih-hong pi7-chi2-khong3 thau3-koe3 tiong-kan-lang5，
kou3-boe2 Tiong-kok-kok-eng5 chioh8-iu5-kong-si lai7-pou7 eng5-giap8-chu-liau7 sou3-ki3-khou3。
Tiong-kok-cheng3-hu2 jim7-ui5，
Sih-hong e5 heng5-ui5 si7 ui5-hoat sou-chip8-cheng5-po3，
iau2-u7 hui-hoat thau-theh8 Tiong-kok kok-ka-ki-bit8，
Bi2-kok chu3-Tiong-kok-e5 tai7-sai3-koan2 hoat-piau2-seng-beng5
tui3 Sih-hong pi7-phoann3-heng5 piau2-si7 put-boan2，
hou-iok8 Tiong-kok-cheng3-hu2 ki-i5 jin5-to7-lip8-tiunn5，
sui5-sek-hong3 Sih-hong hou7 i chhut-keng2。
Li2-oan2-thiat hong2-bun7 In3-tou7 chhut-sek8 A3-chiu Tai7-iunn5-chiu toe7-kiu5-kho-hak8 ni5-hoe7
Chu7-iu5-si5-po3-po3-to7
cheng5 Tiong-iang-gian2-kiu3-inn7-inn7-tiunn2 Li2-oan2-thiat，
i7-teng7 chhit-goeh8-chhit-ho7 ti2-tat8 In3-tou7 Hyderabad，
chham-ka Ji7-khong3-it-khong3-ni5 A3-chiu Tai7-iunn5-chiu toe7-kiu5-kho-hak8-hak8-hoe7 ni5-hoe7。
Li2-oan2-thiat i7-teng7 chhim-ia7 ti2-tat8 tong-toe7，
bin5-a2-chai3 e5-pou hoat-piau2 choan-toe5-ian2-kang2 「Geng5-hiong3 Ji7-chap8-it-se3-ki2 thiau-chian3」。
A3-chiu Tai7-iunn5-chiu toe7-kiu5-kho-hak8-hak8-hoe7 ni5-hoe7，
chhit-goeh8-gou7-ho7 kau3 kau2-ho7 ti7 Hyderabad tiau3-khai。
chap8-it-ui7 Tai5-oan5 ti-beng5-kho-hak8-ka，
i2-keng-ti7 teng2-jit8 kau3-te3 In3-tou7 chhut-sek8 ni5-hoe7，
pun2-kai3-e5 ni5-hoe7，
si7-lek8-lai5 siang7-che7 Tai5-oan5-kho-hak8-ka ti7 In3-tou7 chham-u2-e5 oah8-tang7。
u7-heng3-chhu3 e7-sai2 hong5-chi2 lau7-thoe7 Jit8-pun2 thian2-khui sann-ni5 tiau-cha
Chu7-iu5-si5-po3-po3-to7
Jit8-pun2-e5 chit8-sou2 tai7-hak8，
chiam-tui3 Ai3-ti-koan7 ko-leng5-chia2，
chin3-heng5 tng5-tat8 lak8-ni5-e5 tiau-cha-hian2-si7，
u7-ko3-jin5 heng3-chhu3 tai3-tioh8 lau7-lang5-lau7-thoe7-cheng3 e5 hong-hiam2，
si7-bou3 ka-ki7-heng3-chhu3 ni5-tiong2-chia2 e5 chit8-poann3-i2-ha7；
Jit8-pun2-e5 chap8-sou2 tai7-hak8 kap gian2-kiu3-ki-kou3，
tui3 chit-ko3-goeh8 thian2-khui sann-ni5 tiau-cha，
boeh-cho3 choan5-kok toa7-kui-bou5 khak-jin7，
u7 ko3-jin5-heng3-chhu3 ham hong5-chi2 lau7-thoe7-e5 koan-lian5-seng3。
thng5-jio7-penn7 peng3-hoat-cheng3 bak8-cheng3 khia7-thau5
Chu7-iu5-si5-po3-po3-to7
tai3-tioh8 thng5-jio7-penn7 kho2-leng5 peng3-hoat bak8-cheng3，
hek8-si7 ki-boe2-sun5-khoan5-put-liang5 e5 penn7-thiann3，
kin-ki3 i-seng piau2-si7，
cheng5-kau3-tann Tiong-iang-kian7-po2-kiok8 e5 thong2-ke3，
bak8-cheng3 kiam-se3 chiann5-choe3 thng5-jio7-penn7 peng3-hoat-cheng3 e5-thau5，
thng5-jio7-penn7 hoan7-chia2 siang7-ho2 teng7-ki3-kau3 gan2-kho kiam2-cha。
u7-hong5 bak8-chiu peng3-hoat-cheng3-e5 ok-hoa3，
tu5-liau2 chu3-i3 hiat-thng5-e5 khong3-che3，
iau2-eng3-kai teng7-ki3 chin3-heng5 si7-bang7-mouh8 kiam2-cha，
chiah-e7 chek-si5 pi7-bian2 in-ui7 thng5-jio7-penn7-e5 koan-he7，
cho7-seng5 si7-bang7-mouh8-penn7-pian3 iah-ti3-su2 si7-lek8 siu7-sun2。
chok-chian3 chi2-hui-koan5 i5-kau ian5-chhian5 Lam5-Han5 seng-beng5 chu7-chu2-soan2-tek8
Chu7-iu5-si5-po3-po3-to7
Lam5-Han5 chong2-thong2 Li2-beng5-phok kin-a2-jit8 piau2-si7，
sui-jian5 chiam7-oan7 chian3-si5 chok-chian3 chi2-hui-koan5 i5-kau-e5 koat-teng7，
chhim-hai7-liau2 Lam5-Han5-e5 kok-hong5 chu7-chu2-koan5，
chu7-an2-ne tu2-tioh8 phoe-pheng5，
tan7-chit-si7 kun-ku3 Lam5-Han5 ka-ki7-e5 su-kiu5，
cho3-chhut sit8-chit ji5-chhiann2 chu7-chu2-seng3-e5 soan2-tek8。
Lam5-Han5 「Lian5-hap8-sin-bun5-thong-sin3-sia7」 kin-a2-jit8 po3-to7，
Li2-beng5-phok thau3-koe3 「 Han5-kok-hong3-sang3-kong-sia7 」 teng2 kong2-po3-tian7-tai5、
i2-kip8 si7-sin3-bang7-cham7「You Tube」，
ti7-ian2-kang2-tiong cho3-chhut-liau2 chian5-sut8-e5 piau2-si7，
Li2-beng5-phok chi2-chhut，
Au-chiu u7-chin-choe7-e5 kiong5-kok，
ui7 Bi2-kun-su-leng7-koann sut-nia2-e5 Pak-toa7-se-iunn5-kong-iok-chou-chit，
iu5-goan5-si7 Au-chiu-toe7-khu an-choan5-e5 ki-chhou2，
Lam5-Han5-e5 chok-chian3 chi2-hui-koan5 i5-kau bun7-toe5，
oan5-a7-tiann7-tioh8 tui3 Tang-a kap se3-kai3 an-choan5-e5 kak-tou7-chin3-heng5 pheng5-kou2。
Tiong-kok sin3-iong7 chu2-koan5 pheng5-teng2-po3-ko3 kho2-sin3-tou7 pi7-chit-gi5
Chu7-iu5-si5-po3-po3-to7
Tiong-kok-e5 bin5-eng5 pheng5-kip ki-kou3 「Tai5-kong-kok-che3」，
chit-cham7-a2 hoat-pou3 kok-ka che3-koan5 sin3-iong7 hong-hiam2-po3-ko3，
Tiong-kok-e5 gin5-hang5 che3-koan5 chu2-koan5 sin3-iong7-teng2-kip，
koan5-u5 Bi2-kok 、Eng-kok teng2 se-hong chu2-iau3 keng-che3-toa7-kok。
goa7-kok keng-che3-hak8-ka chit-gi5 Tiong-kok-e5 pheng5-kip ki-kou3-e5 tong7-ki，
Bi2-kok-chi-im in2-iong7 Thoan5-thong2-ki-kim-hoe7 e5 koan-tiam2，
chit-hun7 po3-ko3 poe3-au7 khu7-iu2 cheng3-ti7-siang7-e5 i3-tou5，
Thoan5-thong2-ki-kim-hoe7 e5 Tiong-kok keng-che3-bun7-toe5 gian2-kiu3-oan5 Derek Scissors piau2-si7，
Tiong-kok tui3-u5 se-hong pheng5-kam3-ki-kou3 e5 pheng5-hek8-kiat-ko2 kam2-kak au3-nau2，
to-ka-ki7 hoat-pou3 an2-ne-e5 pheng5-kam3-po3-ko3，
chit-oan5-a7-eng3-kai sng3-si7-po3-hok8。
i-kong2 ：「 bo5-lun7-goa2 tui3-keng-che3 kap kim-iong5-e5 hong-bin7，
long2-bo5-hoat giam5-siok khoann3-thai7 Tiong-kok-e5 chit-hun7 po3-ko3-e5 chin-sit8-seng3，
Tiong-kok-e5 kui-e5 kim-iong5-the2-he7 si7 kian3-lip8-ti7 khi-phian3-chi-siang7，
Tiong-kok-e5 gin5-hang5 peng7-m7-hoat-pou3 chin-sit8-e5 phainn2-siau3 chu-liau7，
iah-si7-ka7 phainn2-siau3-chu-liau7 chhang3-ti7 ki5-thann lui7-piat8-lai7。」
Lam5-Han5 Bi2-kok ko-koann kiong7-tong5 tho2-lun7 tui3-eng3 Pak-Han5 cheng3-chhek
Chu7-iu5-si5-po3-po3-to7
Lam5-Han5 Goa7-kau-thong-siong-pou7 kin-a2-jit soan-pou3，
Lam5-Han5 ham Bi2-kok boeh-ti7 chhit-geh8 ji7-chap8-it-ho7 ti7 Siu2-ni2，
ku2-heng5 Goa7-kau-pou7 ham Kok-hong5-pou7 pou7-tiunn2 「Ji7-ka-Ji7 hoe7-gi7」，
chu2-iau3-si7 Thian-an-lam7 su7-kiann7 phok8-hoat-liau2-au7，
chiam-tui3 Pak-Han5 cheng3-chhek-hong-hiong3 chhim-jip8 kau-oann7-i3-kian3。
Lam5-Han5 「Lian5-hap8-sin-bun5-thong-sin3-sia7 」 chi2-chhut，
Lam5-Han5 、 Bi2-kok nng7-kok pou7-tiunn2-kip 「 Ji7-ka-Ji7 hoe7-gi7」，
chhut-sek8-e5 pau-koat Lam5-Han5 Goa7-kau-thong-siong-pou7 pou7-tiunn2、
Bi2-kok-kok-bu7-kheng Hillary，
iau2-u7 cheng5-Bi2-kok-chong2-thong2 Clinton kap Kok-hong5-pou7 pou7-tiunn2 Gates。
tu2-ho2 Han5-chian3 phok8-hoat Lak8-chap8-chiu-ni5，
chit-pai2 hoe7-gi7 pheng5-kou2 Lam5-Han5 ham Bi2-kok tong5-beng5-koan-he7 e5 seng5-ko2，

peng7-tho2-lun7 tui3-eng3 Pak-Han5 cheng3-chhek、

gu5-chiang-kou sin-ke3 chhia-gia5-khi2，

Tai5-gi2 hoai5-liam7-kim-khek ian2-chhiunn3-hoe7 tiong-seng-tai7 、 sin-seng-tai7 koa-chhiu2 chu7-che
Chu7-iu5-si5-po3-po3-to7
Kok-thai3-bun5-kau3-ki-kim-hoe7 boeh-ti7 chap8-chhit-ho7 e5-hng-si5，
ti7 Kok-thai3-kim-iong5-tiong-sim chhit-ho7-kong2-tiunn5 ki2-heng5「Tai5-gi2-hoai5-liam7-kim-khek ian2-chhiunn3-hoe7」，
Tai5-gi2-koa-toann5 e5 tiong-seng-tai7 、 sin-seng-tai7 koa-chhiu2 lan5-tit chu7-che5-it-tng5！
Kok-thai3-bun5-kau3-ki-kim-hoe7 iau-chhiann2-e5 koa-chhiu2 pau-koat-liau2，
Chhoa3-sio2-hou2 、 Si-bun5-pin teng2 sit8-lek8-phai3 chhiunn3-chiong3，
i2-kip8 ian2-chhut tian7-iann2 「Bang2-kah」 Thai3-chu2-pang e5 Peh8-kau5 Chhoa3-chhiong-hian3，

ti7 chhit-ho7 hoat-inn7 it-sim2 phoann3-i-bo5-choe7 liau2-au7。
keng7-soan2-e5 tui3-chhiu2 Tiunn-chhong-beng5 teng2-lang5，
ti7 Bin5-chin3-tong2 lip8-hoat-ui2-oan5 Chhoa3-tong5-eng5 poe5-tong5-ha7，

koan-chou7 chin3-hiunn-thoan5 oah8-tang7，

eng7 ui5-hoan2 Soan2-ki2-pa7-bian2-hoat choe7-mia5 khi2-sou3 Kan2-beng5-khim。

Bin5-chin3-tong2 Sin-pak-chhi7-hau7-soan2-jin5 Chhoa3-eng-bun5 kin-a2-jit piau2-si7，
i-e5 keng7-soan2-tui3-chhiu2 Tiong-kok-kok-bin5-tong2-chek8 Chu-lip8-lun5，
ka7-i-kong2-e5 chu2-to7-koan5 gi7-toe5 tiau5-kang hu7-bin7 kai2-thok8，
chiat8-un7-e5 keng-eng5-chu2-to7-koan5 bo5-tai7-piau2 tui3-khong3 、 chhiong-tut8；
chu2-to7-koan5 e7-sai2-si7 hap8-chok-seng3-chit-e5 chu2-to7-koan5。
chham-soan2 Sin-pak-chhi7-e5 Bin5-chin3-tong2 tong2-chu2-sek8 Chhoa3-eng-bun5 kong2，

chiu-pinn-lou7-soann3 hoat-tian2 kap cheng2-the2 siann5-chhi7-kui-oe7，
chit-ma2-si7 Tai5-pak-koan7-cheng3-hu2 e5 chit-chek，
bi7-lai5-e5 chu2-to7-koan5 tioh8-si7-ti7 Sin-pak-chhi7，

Chhoa3-eng-bun5 i-piau2-si7，
m7-thang-tui3 keng-eng5-koan5 cho3-hu7-bin7 kai2-thok8，
keng-eng5-e5 chu2-to7-koan5 si7-chit8-kiann7 ho2-tai7，

Tek-lam5 teng-siu thou2-toe7 hui2-hoai7 tiu7-chok Khun-pin-peh piau2-si7 : thinn-kong e7-koai3-choe7
Chu7-iu5-si5-po3-po3-to7
「lu-thou5-chhia keng2-jian5 lu-e7-loh8-khi3 ，
thinn-kong-peh e7-koai3-choe7」。
Bo5-bi2-lok8 chu2-kak Khun-pin-peh seng-oan7 Biau5-lek8-koan7 Toa7-pou choh-chhan5-lang5，
khong3-gi7 Biau5-lek8-koan7-cheng3-hu2 hui2-tiau7 tit-beh siu-seng5-e5 tiu7-a2。
Biau5-lek8-koan7 Tek-lam5-e5 Toa7-pou-chu7-kiu3-hoe7，
oan5-a7-ham koh-thoan5-the2 ti7 chap8-peh-ho7 am3-me5 siu2-ti7 Khai2-tat8-keh-lan5-tai7-to7，
Khun-pin-peh iau-kiu5 Biau5-lek8-koan7-cheng3-hu2 theng5-chi2 ui5-toe7-heng5-ui5。
Tek-lam5 Toa7-pou-chu7-kiu3-hoe7 teng2 choh-chhan5-lang5-thoan5-the2，
cha2-khi2-ti7 Lip8-hoat-inn7 ki2-heng5 ki3-chia2-hoe7 chi2-chhut，
Biau5-lek8-koan7-koan7-cheng3-hu2 phai3-chhut koai3-chhiu2 hui2-tiau7 chhan5-lai7-e5 tiu7-chok，
thou2-hian2 choan5-Tai5-oan5 kok-toe7 long5-chhoan pi7-hui2-biat8-e5 gui5-ki，
ti7-ki3-chia2-hoe7 tong-tiong，
Toa7-pou-chu7-kiu3-hoe7 pou3-hong3 koai3-chhiu2 hui2-hoai7 tiu7-chhan5 su7-kiann7 ki3-lok8-phinn3，
i2-kip8 Khun-pin-peh e5 choan-hong2。
Khun-pin-peh hun3-nou7-e5 piau2-si7：
「loan7-lai5 ！koan7-tiunn2 bo5-thinn-bo5-toe7，
lu-thou5-chhia keng2-jian5 lu-e7-loh8-khi3 ，
thinn-kong-peh it-teng7-e7 koai3-choe7-loh8-lai5」。
lian5-soa3 kai2-koat sann-chap8-ji7-ui7 to3-phah-chia2 Kok-hong5-chi3 chhong3-ki3-lok8
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-oan5 chhut-sin-e5 tau5-chhiu2 Kok-hong5-chi3，
chap8-peh-ho7 ti7-Bi2-kok chit-giap8-pang7-kiu5 tai7-lian5-beng5，
chhong3-ha7 te7-it-e5 siok8-i5 i-ka-ki7-e5 sin-ki3-lok8，
To7-ki5 kap Ang5-chhiok e5 te7-sann-tiunn5 pi2-sai3，
Kok-hong5-chi3 ti7 te7-chhit-kiok8 chiunn7-tiunn5 hou7-oan7，
i-m7-na7 i5-chhi5 leng5-sit-hun e5 piau2-hian7，
ji5-chhiann2-ti7 kai2-koat-tiau7 to3-phah-e5 Rasmus i2-au7，
chhong3-ha7 lian5-soa3-kai2-koat sann-chap8-ji7-mia5 to3-phah-chia2，
thang-kong2-si7 Tai7-lian5-beng5 e5 sin-ki3-lok8。
Jit8-pun2 Hu3-san-koan7 chhia-ho7 Tai5-oan5 iu5-kheh siu7-tioh8 sio2-siong
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Jit8-pun2-e5 kong-kiong7-tian7-si7-tai5 NHK po3-to7，
chit8-chiah chai3 si3-chap8-kau2-mia5 Tai5-oan5-koan-kong-kheh e5 iu5-lam2-chhia，
chap8-peh-ho7 am3-pou-a2-ti7 Hu3-san-koan7 hoat-seng chhia-ho7，
cho7-seng5 peh-mia5 Tai5-oan5-iu5-kheh koa3-chhai2，
leng7-goa7 nng7-mia5 Jip8-pun2-lang5 siu7-siong，
ho2-ka-chai3 long2-chi2-si7 sio2-siong。
chhia-ho7 hoat-seng-ti7 Tai5-oan5-si5-kan chap8-peh-ho7，
am3-pou-a2 lak8-tiam2 si3-chap8-gou7-hun，
tng-si5 chit-chiah iu5-lam2-chhia si7-iu5 Jip8-pun2-su-ki ka3-su2，
chai3-tioh8 si3-chap8-kau2-mia5 Tai5-oan5-siau3-lian5-hap8-chhiunn3-thoan5 thoan5-oan5 ham ka-siok8，
kiann5-ti7 Pun2-chiu Hu3-san-koan7 e5 Tang-hai2 Pak-liok8 kong-lou7-teng2，
i3-goa7 pi7 chit8-chiah lai5-chu7 tui3-hiong3 chhia-to7-e5 siunn-a2-chhia e-tioh8，
pau-koat gou7-chap8-kau2-hoe3 e5 Jip8-pun2-to7-iu5，
long2-chong2-u7 kau2-lang5 sio2-siong。
tui3-e-e5 siunn-a2-chhia su-ki-si7 heng-kham2 siu7-tioh8 tang7-siong，
chi3-i5 jia2-tai7-chi3-e5 goan5-in，
bok8-cheng5 iau2-ti7 tiau-cha tong-tiong。
jiat8-tai3 ke7-ap heng5-seng5 si7-m7-si7 cheng-kiong5-cho3 hong-thai le2-pai3-it koan-kian3
Sam-lip8-sin-bun5-tai5
koh-u7 hong-thai boeh-po3-to3-ah，
kin-a2-jit Khi3-siong7-kiok8 piau2-si7，
Heng5-chhun lam5-hong chhit-pah-goa7-kong-li2 e5 hai2-bin7-siang7，
heng5-seng5 chit8-e5 jiat8-tai3-seng3 ke7-khi3-ap，
Khi3-siong7-kiok8-kong2 na7-chun2 chui2-khi3-kau3-giah8，
tiau5-kiann7 sek-hap8-e5 cheng5-heng5-ha7，
u7-kho2-leng5 heng5-seng5 kin-ni5 te7-sann-ho7 hong-thai，
si7-m7-si7 cheng-kiong5-cho3 hong-thai，
au7-le2-pai3-it si7-koan-kian3。

siap8-hiam5 siu-siu7 Ho5-ti3-hui ou-se-e5 an3-kiann7，

chit8-ui7 senn3-Ong5 lu2-sek8-su7-seng，

seng5-pan7 an3-kiann7-e5 kiam2-chhat-koann Khu-bou7-eng5，
soah-i2 「thau-lai5-e5 chhia ，
bo5-kho2-leng5 ti7-bang7-lou7-siong7-boe7」 cho3-li2-iu5，
tui3 chhiap-to7-an3 hiam5-hoan7 cho3-chhut 「 bo5-khi2-sou3 」 chhu2-hun，
hou7 Ong5-sio2-chia2 siang-tong khi3-hun3 bo5-hoat-chiap-siu7。
theh8-tioh8 chit-hun7 「 bo5-khi2-sou3 chhu2-hun-su 」 e5 Ong5-sio2-chia2，
kong2-chhut i lai7-sim-e5 siunn7-hoat，
i ti7 choan-bun5 phah-boe7-e5 bang7-lou7-siong7，

boeh-khai-si2 chu-khian2 Tai5-oan5-hun-kong-si oan5-kang，

hi-bang7 e7-sai2 cho3-chit8-hiu-chit8 nia2-poann3-sin chhu2-tai7 iu-thoe3-e5 hong-an3，

in-ui7 khan-siap8-tioh8 kok-che3-hang5-soann3 in-sou3，

oa2 lak8-chap8-ni5 lek8-su2-e5 Jit8-pun2-hang5-khong chiu7-chhu2 oe7-loh8-ku3-tiam2，
kin-ni5 it-goeh8 soan-ko3-pho3-san2 liau2-au7 sin-chheng2 chai5-bu7-tiong7-cheng2，

Bi2-kok Lam5-han5 kun-su7-ian2-sip8 sit8-toann5 hoan2 tiam3-chui2-chun5 toa7-chhut-hi3
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Bi2-kok ham Lam5-han5 chit-chit8-pho lian5-hap8-kun-su7-ian2-sip8，
ji7-chap8-peh-ho7 chin3-jip8 siong7-boe2-kang，
Bi2-kok-kun-hong ham Lam5-han5-kun-hong ji7-chap8-chhit-ho7 ti7 Jit8-pun2-hai2，
chin3-heng5 te7-sann-kang e5 ian2-sip8，
chu2-iau3-si7-eng7 sit8-toann5 hoan2-tiam3-chui2-chun5 ian2-lian7 ui5-chu2。
sou2-u7 chham-ka ian2-sip8-e5 hai2-kun-lam7-theng2，
tui3-chun5-teng2 hoat-sia7 kok-sek phau3-toann5、
hoan2-tiam3-chui2-chun5 cha3-tan5 kap hi5-lui5，
kong-kek chit8-chiah chhiong-tong3 ka2-siong2-tek8 po3-hui3-e5 tiam3-chui2-chun5。

「heng5-tong7 ka-pi-chhia」 Chhoa3-eng-bun5 chhin-chu7 cho3-su-ki
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7

kin-a2-jit chhoa7-tioh8 i-e5 heng5-tong7-ka-pi-chhia lou7-bin7，

peh-goeh8 gou7-ho7 e5-hng-si5 toa3-hioh Tai5-tiong-chhi7 png7-tiam3 。
ti7 i kau3-ui7 chin3-cheng5 ，
u7 beh-oa2 pah-ui7 Kiu2-khong3-pat Tai5-oan5-kok seng5-oan5 ，
chu7-chip8 ti7 png7-tiam3 thau5-cheng5 beh-hiang3 Tiunn-beng5-chheng khong3-gi7 。

hou7-siang giu2-chhoah chhia-khoeh 。
khi3-hun beng5-beng5 i2-keng-kau3 hong-hoe2-toa7 ，

Tai5-oan5-e5 chhenn-me5-lang5 pang7-kiu5-tui7 「 Ang5-put-jiong7-tui7 」，

sui-jian5-i2 chit8-hun-chi-chha，
pai7-hou7 Bi2-kok ka-chiu-e5 Se-hai2-hoann7 Ou-kau2-tui7，

giam7-tiong7 eng2-hiang2 Ko-hiong5-koan7 A-lian-hiong e5 si-koe siu-seng5，

chit-ma2 chi2-chhun tai7-iok chit8-siann5，
goan5-pun2 liah8-cho3 si-koe san2-liang7-chio2 ke3-siau3 e7-khi2-ke3，

lian5 chhiann3-kang-lang5 chhai2-siu long2-bo5-kau3 seng2-pun2，

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-pak-chhi7 Pak-tau5-khu chit8-mia5 li2-seng3-e5 i-kiam2-su7，
choh8-jit8 chhim-ia7 tui3 siang7-pan-e5 Chin2-heng-penn7-inn7，
che7 tong5-su7-e5 ou-tou2-bai2 ha7-pan li5-khui-si5，
pi7 chit8-mia5 khia5-ou-tou2-bai2-e5 ian-tok8-hoan7，
tui3-boe2-au7 chhiunn2-toat8 i-e5 pau-pau，
pi7-hai7-jin5 lian5-siok8-jiok nng7-e5-lou7-khau2 liau2-au7，
hiam5-hoan7 iau3-si7 liu5-soan，
keng2-hong pi2-tui3 lou7-khau2 kam3-si7-khi3 oe7-bin7，
hoat-hian7 hiam5-hoan7 tioh8-si7 thong-chhip-tiong-e5 ian-tok8-hoan7，
kin-a2-jit8 thinn-beh-kng ti7 hiam5-hoan7 e5 chu7-chhu3，
ka7 i tai7-pou2 kau3-an3。
sui5 chhan-tiam2 sang3 chhit-tho5-mih8 gin2-a2 toa7-khou bun7-toe5-toa7
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
na7-chun2-mng7 sio2-peng5-iu2 sok-sit8-tiam3-lai7 u7-siann2-mih，
tu5-liau2 Bi2-kok-koah-pau 、 chu5-tiau5 、 kho2-lok8 chi-goa7，
it-teng7 iau2-e7 thiann-tioh8 sang3-chhit-tho5-mih8 chit-e5 tap-an3。

chit-ma2 pinn3-chiann5-liau2 A-thai3-toe7-khu siang7-boe2-mia5，

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Chu2-ke3-chhu3 kin-a2-jit kong-pou3 chhit-goeh8-hun7 e5 sit-giap8-lut8，
koh-chai3 pan-seng-kau3 pah-hun-chi gou7-tiam2-ji7-khong3，
sit-giap8-jin5-sou3 pi2 lak8-goeh8-hun7 cheng-ka peh-chheng-lang5。
sit-giap8-jin5-sou3 oan5-a7-tui3 gou7-chap8-chhit-ban7-lang5 khok-toa7-kau3 gou7-chap8-peh-ban7-lang5，

peh-goeh8 long2-tih-beh koe3-liau2-lou ，

khou2-hoann7 eng2-hiong2 sou2-kip8，
cho7-seng5 Ke-lang5 Sin-san-chui2-khou3 kap Ke-lang5-ho5 chui2-ui7 loh8-ke7，

chui2-te2-e5 hi5 long2-tih-beh khoa3-ta，

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Ko-hiong5-chhi7 hoat-seng chit8-chan5 khiong2-hat lek8-siok8-an3，
hian3-peng siau2-hau7 Ong5-eng5-kiat8 khioh-tioh8 chit8-mia5 li2-hak8-seng chhiu2-ki，
li7-iong7 chhiu2-ki-lai7 u7 su-bit8-siang3-phinn3 lek8-siok8 li2-hak8-seng gou7-ban7-kho3，
na7-bo5 boeh-ka7 siang3-phinn3 san3-pou3-ti7 bang7-lou7，
hiam5-hoan7 Ong5-eng5-kiat8 sim7-chi3-kap keng2-hong piann3-thau5-khak，
toa7-tann2 chi2-teng7-ti7 keng2-chhat-kiok8 hu7-kin7 kau-chinn5，
m7-kuh ， choe3-chiong iau2-si7-pi7 keng2-hong tai7-pou2。
ti7-ki3-chia2-hoe7-siang7 ，
hian3-peng Ji7-khong3-si3 Chi2-hui-pou7 Cheng3-chian3-chu2-jim7 chhut-bin7 kiok-kiong hoe7-sit-le2，

chai3-chhu3 tiong7-chho3 kok-kun-e5 heng5-siang7。

kau2-geh8 chhoe-it tu2-chiam3-khoat Hong7-soann hian3-peng-tui7 hun-tui7-tiunn2，
bo5-siunn7-tioh8 soah-chit8-si5 kui2-khan-khi3，
hoan7-ha7 khiong2-hat-chhu2-chai5，
i2-kip8 chhim-chiam3-ui5-sit-but8 teng2 choe7-mia5，
cho ki3-toa7-ko3 nng7-pai2，

Ma2-eng-kiu2 ham Lip8-hoat-inn7 tui-ka-phian-liat8 chit8-chheng chit8-pah lak8-chap8-ek keng-hui3，

i2-kip8 beh-khi2 pan7-kong-toa7-lau5。
lam5-pou7-koan7-chhi7 e5 chhia-lou7 pian3-seng5-liau2 chui2-lou7，
hong5-hong5-ke3-oe7 chip-heng5 koann2-be7-hu3 toa7-chui2-hoan3-lam7，
khah-hou7-lang5 khi3-kiat-e5-si7，

chun2-pi7-beh-theh8 it-tiam2-gou7-ek khi2「 khu-hek8-hong5-hong5 chi2-hui-tiong-sim」，

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
it-poann-lang5 chin-lan5-siong2-siong7 ，
ui7-tioh8 gian2-kiu3 koann5-jiat8-cheng3，
keng2-jian5-u7-lang5 kam-goan7-eng7 bah-sin chhi7-bang2，
hi-seng hong7-hian3 chhiau-koe3 lak8-chap8-ni5，
kin-ni5 te7-ji7-chap8-kai3 i-liau5-tek8-su5-hong7-hian3-chiang2，
pan-hou7 peh-chap8-sann-peh-hoe3 e5 「 Tai5-oan5-bang2-a2-lang5 」 Lian5-jit8-chheng phok-su7，
i-m7-na7 phah-pai7 Tai5-oan5-koann5-jiat8-cheng3，
hou7 Tai5-oan5-e5 koann5-jiat8-cheng3 tui3 Lian5-hap8-kok ti5-mia5，
iau2-ka7 Tai5-oan5-keng-giam7 chah-kau3 iu2-pang。
kin-ni5 peh-chap8-sann-peh-hoe3 e5 Lian5-jit8-chheng，
siau3-lian5-si5 kin-toe3 Jit8-pun2-hak8-chia2，
eng7-ka-ki7-e5 seng-khu chhi7-bang2-a2 ， gian2-kiu3 bang2-a2，
Lian5-jit8-chheng e5 piann3-khui3，
hou7 Tai5-oan5 ti7 it-kau2-gou7-ji7-ni5 choan5-bin7 siau-biat8 koann5-jiat8-cheng3，
Tai5-oan5 oan5-a7-chiann5-cho3 Lian5-hap8-kok-e5 「koann5-jiat8-cheng3 kun-tu5-kok」。
Tiong-kok 、 Jit8-pun2 tong7-chun5-su7-kiann7 Jit8-pun2 ku7-choat8 hoe7-sit-le2 、 poe5-siong5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
cho Jit8-pun2 khu-liu5 chap8-lak8-kang e5 Tiong-kok-hi5-chun5 chun5-tiunn2 Chiam-ki5-hiong5，

m7-ku2 Tiong-kok Pak-kiann cheng3-hu2 tui3-i5 Jit8-pun2 sou2-sek-hong3-e5 ho2-i3 peng7-m7-nia2-cheng5，
ji5-chhiann2 iau2-iau-kiu5 Jit8-pun2 hoe7-sit-le2 kap poe5-siong5，

oan5-a7-m7-goan7 koh-ke3-siok8 tui3 Tiong-kok the3-niu7，

chit-pai2 Tiong-kok-hi5-chun5 hong5-gai7-kong-bu7 chip-heng5，

chit-khoan2 bo5-phou2-e5 iau-kiu5 hou7-lang5 phainn2-chiap-siu7。
Li2-teng-hui siong-theng2 Sou-ka-choan5 toa7-siann-hoah 「 khi3-be2-po2-Tai5 」
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7

i-hou-iok8 chi-chhi5-chia2 ai3-keng7-sio-oa2，

iau2-hoah-chhut 「 khi3-be2-po2-Tai5 」 e5 khau2-ho7。

Tong5-bi2-hun5 sin-hi3 iau-chhiann2 pun2-thou2-kiok8 ian2-goan5 kheh-chhoan3
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tong5-bi2-hun5 koh-beh-thui-chhut sin-e5 koa-a2-hi3，
m7-ku2 hi3-kiok8-sio2-seng chit-pai2-u7 Tong5-bi2-hun5 sin-tut8-phoa3，
tioh8-si7 iau-chhiann2 pun2-thou2-hi3-kiok8 ian2-goan5 Png-hiong、
iau2-u7 Ko-i2-chin teng2-lang5 kheh-chhoan3-ian2-chhut Si3-sian-li2，
goan5-pun2 si3-lang5 heng3-chhih-chhih，
iau2-liah8-cho3 chhiunn3-koa-a2-hi3 chin-kan2-tan，

tak8-e5-lang5 long2-toa7-hoah chiah8-be7-siau，

beh-hou7 koan-chiong3 ni7-bak8-it-sin。
bi7-lai5 chit8-kou3-goeh8 e5 chip8-hun3，
hi3-kiok8 sio2-seng Tong5-bi2-hun5 tit-beh koh-tut8-phoa3，

m7-bian2 kiau2-hui3 hang7-bok8 penn7-inn7 keng3-jian5 toa7-chu2-i3-kai2 chu7-hui3
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
m7-chai-iann2 li2-u7-a2-bo5 hoat-hian7，
chit-ma2 kau3-penn7-inn7 khoann3-penn7，
chu7-hui3-e5 hang7-bok8 soah-lu2-lai5-lu2-choe7？
I-kai2-hoe7 tiau-cha liau2-au7 to-hoat-hian7，
pau-koat choan2-chhng5-hui3 kap boa5-ioh8-hui3 teng2，
u7-koa2 kui-teng7 m7-bian2 kiau2-hui3-e5 hang7-bok8，
keng3-jian5-u7 penn7-inn7 ka7-i-tong3-cho3 chu7-hui3-e5 hang7-bok8，
chiam3-khoan5 kai2-ui5 chu7-hui3 chia3-ki-hiang3 penn7-hoan7 ke-siu-chinn5。
chhin-chhiunn7 toa3-inn7 penn7-hoan7 iau-kiu5 choan2-chhng5，
to-ai3-kiau2 nng7-pah-kho3 choan2-chhng5-hui3 hou7 penn7-inn7，
m7-koh chit-pit hui3-iong7 cha2-tioh8 pau-ham5-ti7 kian7-po2-hui3 tong-tiong，
it-kiu2-kiu2-kiu2-ni5 Tiong-iang-kian7-po2-kiok8 i2-keng keng-kai2 kui-teng7 ，
penn7-inn7 put-tek eng7-chit-mia5-gi7 iau-kiu5 hoan7-chia2 chu7-hui3。
se3-ji7 kiong5-pho-khi3 kan-jiau2 so2-mng5 phainn2-tou5 jip8-chhia-lai7 thau-theh8
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
khui-chhia-chok8 chhiann2-se3-ji7-ah，
u7 put-siau3-phainn2-tou5 li7-iong7 「 kiong5-pho-khi3 」，
hoat-sia7 bo5-soann3-tian7-pho kan-jiau2 chhia-chu2-e5 iau5-khong3-khi3，
hou7 chhia-mng5 so2-be7-tiau5 liau2-au7，
hiam5-hoan7 chiah-tan2-ki-hoe7 bi7-jip8-khi3 chhia-lai7 thau-theh8 chai5-but8，
Tai5-tiong-chhi7-e5 keng2-hong keng-koe3 tng5-ki5-kam3-toe3，
tai7-pou2-liau2 siap8-an3-e5 senn3-Lim5 cha-pou。
chit-khoan2 chiang2-tiong-heng5 e5 kiong5-pho-khi3，
kho3-tioh8 nng7-ki te2-thian-soann3，
hoat-sia7-chhut bo5-soann3-tian7-pho，
tian7-pho chit8-oa2-kin7 khi3-chhia，
to-hou7 iau5-khong3-khi3 sui5-sit-khi3 kong-leng5 ，
chhia-chu2 chiu7-sng3 jih8-kau3 chhiu2-kiu3-kin，
chhia-mng5 to-si7 so2-be7-tiau5，
kiong5-pho-khi3 loh8-jip8 phainn2-tou5 chhiu2-tiong，
pinn3-chiann5 thau-theh8 chai5-but8-e5 put-hoat-pang-hiong。
kim-a2-ke3 pio-khi2 Kim-koe-chioh8 phok-but8-koan2 toa7-kim-chng se3-ji7 hong5-chhiap-an3
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
kok-che3 ng5-kim-ke3-siau3 put-toan7-pio-khi2，
Tai5-pak-koan7 Kim-koe-chioh8 ng5-kim-phok-but8-koan2 lai7-bin7-e5 toa7-kim-chng ，
ke3-tat8 tui3 lak8-ni5-cheng5 kau2-chheng-ban7，
i2-keng lai5-kau3 chit-ma2-e5 nng7-ek peh-chheng-goa7-ban7，
kou2-ke3 koh-bo5-loa7-ku2 beh-tut8-phoa3 sann-ek，
koan2-hong oan5-a7-ka-phai3 po2-choan5 kap keng2-oe7 lun5-liu5-chu7-siu2，
se3-ji7-e5 hong5-chhiap-an3，
iau2-tau5-po2-liau2 chhiap-to7-hiam2，
oan5-a7-in-ui7 ng5-kim ke3-siau3 pio-khi2-chi-su3，
lian5-tai3 po2-hiam2-hui3-iong7 long2-pian3-kui3-ah。
Kim-koe-chioh8 ng5-kim-phok-but8-koan2 lai7-bin7 kim-siak-siak，
kau2-hia7 、 chhau2-me2 、 mou-he7，
kok-sek-kok-iunn7 e5 ng5-kim-che3-phin2，
hou7-lang5 khoann3-kah8 phu2-bak8-gan2-hoe，
iu5-ki5-si7 chit-te3 kim-a2-chng，
chit-si7 ng5-kim-phok-but8-koan2 e5 tin3-koan2-chi-po2。
pian3-siong3 ia2-ke-chhia Kong-lou7-chong2-kiok8 toa7-chip-hoat
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
tiann7-tiann7-che7 kok-to7-kheh-un7 e5 bin5-chiong3，
kho2-leng5 long2-tu2-koe3 chit-khoan2 cheng5-heng5，
giap8-chia2 ka-ki7 cheng-siat choan2-un7-cham7 chai3-lang5-kheh，
tit8-tat8-chhia tian-to3 pian3-seng5-liau2 ia2-ke-chhia。
Kong-lou7-chong2-kiok8 tui3 chap8-goeh8-chhoe-it khi2 giam5-keh chhu2-te7，
tong5-si5 choan5-bin7 chheng-cha kheh-un7-giap8-chia2，
bo5-keng hek8-chun2 thau-chau2-e5 lou7-soann3，
chhin-chhiunn7 Ho5-him-kheh-un7 i2-keng theng5-sai2 Tai5-pak kau3 Ka-gi7 e5 pan-chhu3，
Thong2-lian5-kheh-un7 u7 ji7-chap8-chhit-e5 choan2-un7-cham7 siu7-tioh8 eng2-hiang2，
li2-kheh che7-chhia i2-cheng5 tioh8-seng mng7-chheng-chho2。
Ho5-him-kheh-un7 e5 Tai5-pak kau3 Ka-gi7 lou7-soann3，
chu7-pun2 to-bo5 hap8-hoat-sin-chheng2，
chit-ma2 kheh-un7-giap8-chia2 kin2-kip theng5-sai2，
i2-keng be2-phio3-e5 chit8-pah-goa7-ui7 li2-kheh choan5-giah8-thoe3-phio3。
Lam5-a-sok-ka toa7-hoe2 ian5-sio chap8-chhit-tiam2-cheng thinn-beh-kng phok-hoa
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Lam5-a-sok-ka Ka-gi7-chhiunn2 hoat-seng-toa7-hoe2，
phok8-hoat tiong7-tai7 kang-an-i3-goa7，
hoe2-si3 jian5-sio chap8-chhit-tiam2-cheng，
it-tit8-kau3 si3-ho7 thinn-beh-kng toa7-hoe2 chiah-phok-hoa。
ui7-ti7 Ka-gi7-koan7 Thai3-po2-hiong e5 Tai5-sok Lam5-a-sok-ka-chhiunn2 hoat-seng-hoe2-sio，
toa7-hoe2-chit8-sio put-kho2-siu-sip，
long2-chong2 chhut-tong7 gou7-chap8-tai5 chui2-leng5-chhia，
koh-ka-siang7 tit8-seng-ki tui3 khong-tiong phok-hoe2，
Ka-gi7-koan7-koan7-tiunn2 Tiunn-hoe-koan kin-a2-jit thau3-cha2 sui5-kau3 chhiunn2-khu koan-chhiat，
u7-ke3-ti7 si3-ho7 e5 cha2-khi2 beh-tiau3-khai ki3-chia2-hoe7，
tui3-goa7-kai3 soeh-beng5 koan7-cheng3-hu2 e5 chhu2-li2-cheng3-chhek，
leng7-goa7 Tai5-sok chong2-chhai5 Ong5-bun5-ian oan5-a7-e7 loh8-lam5 chhu2-li2。
A3-chiu hong-eng2-pan2 pi2-sai3 Phenn5-ou5 nau7-jiat8 chiunn7-tiunn5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Ji7-khong3-it-khong3-ni5 A3-chiu-poe hong-eng2-pan2 kim2-phiau-sai3，
thau5-pai2-ti7 Phenn5-ou5 ki2-heng5，
long2-chong2 khip-in2 chap8-e5 kok-ka chong2-kiong7 gou7-chap8-ui7 soan2-chhiu2 chhut-sai3，
ki5-tiong-u7 gou7-mia5 si7 O3-un7-kip e5 soan2-chhiu2，
lai7-bin7 siang7-siu7-chu3-bok8-e5-lang5，
si7-iong2-iu2 O3-un7 chu-keh-e5 Phenn5-ou5 chai7-toe7 soan2-chhiu2 Tiunn-ho3。
chit-pai2-e5 pi2-sai3 koan-he7 soan2-chhiu2 se3-kai3-pai5-mia5 kap chek-hun，
oan5-a7-chu7-an2-ne khip-in2 gou7-chap8-ui7 kok-ka-tai7-piau2-tui7 soan2-chhiu2 chhut-sai3，
ti7 si3-ho7 beh-u7 leng2-hong-bin7 koe3-keng2，
tan2-kau3 hong-se3 choan2-kiong5-liau2-au7 ，
hai2-siang7-keng7-ki oan5-a7-e7 lu2-lai5-lu2-cheng-chhai2，
pi2-sai3 liok8-siok8-e5 nau7-jiat8-chiunn7-tiunn5，
bin5-chiong3 bu5-hong5-kau3 Phenn5-ou5 Ma2-keng Koan-im-teng5，
him-siong2 cheng-chhai2-pi2-sai3 oan5-a7-the3 soan2-chhiu2 ka-iu5 chan7-siann-si3。
thau5-pai2 hong-bin7 po3-to3 pak-pou7 、 tang-poann3-pou7 u7-hou7
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
kin-ni5 jip8-chhiu-i2-au7，
te7-it-to7 leng2-hong-bin7 ti7 sann-ho7 po3-to3，
ti5-liau2 i2-keng-ui7 Tai5-oan5-e5 pak-pou7、
i2-kip8 tang-poann3-pou7 tai3-lai5 beng5-hian2-e5 loh8-hou7，
si3-ho7 khai-si2 khi3-un-ha7-kang3 khah-beng5-hian2，
pak-pou7 cha2-am3 ke7-un kho2-leng5 chi2-u7 ji7-chap8-tou7 teng2-e7。
thau3-cha2 khia7-ti7 chhi7-khu-koe-thau5，
ong2-thinn-teng2 khoah-koe3-khi3，
kui-phinn3 pang5-hoann2-hoann2 i2-goa7，
oan5-a7-toa3-tioh8 sio2-khoa2 bong5-bu7，
Khi3-siong7-kiok8 kong2 chit-pho-hong-bin7 khoai3-sok thong-koe3-i2-au7，
boe2-au7-e5 tang-pak-kui3-hong tauh8-tauh8-choan2-kiong5，
kin-a2-bin5-a2-chai3 nng7-kang long2-e7-siu7-eng2-hiang2，
chiah8-hong-bin7 e5 pak-pou7、
tang-poann3-pou7 e7-loh8-bak8-nih-hou7。
jiam2-tioh8 chhiau-kip-se3-khun2 giam5-tiong7 khiong2-tit pai7-hiat-cheng3
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
ti7 In3-tou7 cho-chheng3-kek to2-tng2 Tai5-oan5-e5 chiat-bok8 liap-iann2-su，
penn7-inn7 ti7 i-e5 the2-lai7 giam7-chhut chhiau-kip-se3-khun2，
bok8-cheng5 bo5-hoat-penn7 cheng3-thau5 sng3-si7 put-heng7-tiong-e5-toa7-heng7，
m7-kuh chit-khoan2 chhiau-kip-se3-khun2，
tau3-te2-si7 siann2-mih-khoan2-e5 penn7-khun2？
jiam2-tioh8-au7 e7-u7-siann2-mih cheng3-thau5？
i-seng piau2-si7 ti2-khong3-lek8-chha e5 gin2-a2 、 lau7-lang5，
bo5-toann hoat-sio 、 lau3-sai2 ai3-tek8-piat8-se3-ji7，
giam5-tiong7-si5 in2-hoat pai7-hiat-cheng3 kho2-leng5-ti3-si2 ！
choan-ka keng2-ko3 chhiau-kip-se3-khun2 cha2-ban7-e7 jip8-chhim Tai5-oan5，
in-ui7 i-hou7-jin5-oan5 khi2-chhou tiann7-tiann7 bo5-hoat-chhat-kak，
tu2-tioh8 chhiau-kip se3-khun2 jiam2-tioh8，
khong3-seng-sou3 eng2-eng2 oan5-a7-be7-hu3 chu3-sia7，
si2-bong5-lut8 to-e7 peh-koan5-kau3 gou7-siann5，
bin5-chiong3 pi7-bian2 bo5-su7 chhut-jip8 penn7-inn7 、 kut-lat8-se2-chhiu2，
chiann3-si7 cheng3-khak i7-hong5-chi-to。
ki2-tang7 tiong7-tin3 「 It-lok8-hng5 png7-tiam3 」 hoe2-sio chiau-pai5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-pak-chhi7 Se-mng5-teng e5 lau7-png7-tiam3，
ki2-tang7 tiong7-tin3 「 It-lok8-hng5 toa7-png7-tiam3 」 ，
ti7 gou7-ho7 am3-si5 peh-tiam2-goa7 thoan5-chhut hoe2-chai ，
tioh8-hoe2-sio goan5-in gi5-su7 png7-tiam3-e5 khan-pang2 tian7-soann3-chau2-hoe2，
sun3-kan hoe2-si3-kau3-toa7，
png7-tiam3 goa7-bin7 piah-tou2-e5 hui5-a2-chng hiau3-khi3 lak-kui-thou5-kha，
ho2-ka-chai3 hoe2-si3 ti7 poann3-tiam2-cheng-lai7 pi7-phah-hoa，
bo5-jim7-ho5-lang5 siong-bong5！
「 It-lok8-hng5 toa7-png7-tiam3 」 si7 poe5-iok8 ki2-tang7-soan2-chhiu2 e5 tai7-pun2-iann5 ，
ho2-ka-chai3 chit-tiunn5-toa7-hoe2 bo5-ka7 png7-tiam3 sio-hui2，
na7-bo5 hio7-ko2 put-kham-siat-siong2！
bin5-chiong3 hip-loh8 hoe2-chai-hian7-tiunn5 iann2-phinn3，
toa7-hoe2-chit8-sio tioh8-si7 chap8-goa7-hun-cheng，
hoe2-hu chhui3-phoe3-a2 lak-kui-thou5-kha，
tam-sim chan5-hoe2 ke3-siok8 ian5-sio，
siau-hong5-tui7 iu5-goan5 ke3-siok8 bu7-chui2-koan3-kiu3！
goa7-lo5 koan2-li2 bun7-toe5-choe7 moe2-ni5 liu5-soan chiunn7-ban7-lang5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Kok-to7-lak8-ho7 hoat-seng si-kang eng-ke3 to3-thap i3-goa7，
cho7-seng5 chit8-mia5 Tai5-oan5 nia2-pan si2-bong5，
iau2-u7 lak8-mia5 goa7-lo5 put-heng7 oah8-tai5-e5 pi-kiok8-liau2-au7，
kam3-chhat-ui2-goan5 tiau-cha hoat-hian7，
Tai5-oan5 goa7-lo5 koan2-li2-e5 bun7-toe5 siang-tong3 giam5-tiong7 ，
moe2-ni5 liu5-soan-e5 goa7-lo5 jin5-sou3，
keng2-jian5 to-tat8 chiunn7-ban7-lang5，
kam3-chhat-ui2-goan5 chit-gi5 I5-bin5-su2 sou-hut-chit-siu2，
ti5-liau2 chiam-tui3 tak8-e5 koan2-li2 goa7-lo5-e5 tan-ui7 ，
chin3-heng5 te7-ji7-pho7 e5 tiau-cha i2-goa7，
oan5-a7-bo5-pai5-ti5 tui3 I5-bin5-su2 theh8-chhut kiu3-cheng3。
Lam5-tau5-koan7 Kok-seng3-hiong e5 Pak-soann-chhoan ，
Pak-soann-kau-liu5-to sin-kian3-kang-teng5 e5 i3-goa7，
cho7-seng5-liau2 chhit-mia5 kang-lang5 chham2-gu7-oah8-tai5 si2-bong5。
Kok-to7-lak8-ho7 kang-teng5-i3-goa7 Tai5-oan5 nia2-pan goa7-lo5 si2-bong5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Kok-to7-lak8-ho7 kang-teng5 hoat-seng giam5-tiong7 i3-goa7-su7-kou3！
chit-pai2 hoat-seng kang-an-i3-goa7 e5 toe7-tiam2，
si7-ui7-ti7 Lam5-tau5-koan7 Kok-seng3-hiong e5 Pak-soann-chhoan，
chiann3-leh-chin3-heng5 Pak-soann-kau-liu5-to sin-kian3-kang-teng5，
chham2-gu7 oah8-tai5 si2-bong5-e5 chhit-mia5 kang-lang5 tong-tiong，
ki5-tiong-u7 lak8-lang5 si7 In3-ni5-chek8 e5 goa7-lo5，
kan-na7 nia2-pan Chng-eng2-ho5 si7 Tai5-oan5-lang5，
Chng-eng2-ho5 e5 chhu3-lai7-lang5 jim2-thiann3 chhu2-li2-hou7-su7，
chi3-i5 ki5-thann siu7-siong-e5 sann-mia5 Tai5-oan5-kang-lang5，
sin-khu-teng2 siong-se3 long2-bo5-giam5-tiong7，
chiok-sioh-hok ka-ki7 e7-sai2 chau2-koe3 si2-kiap。
ang-a2-bou2 ti7-chhu3 che3-tok8 seng5-phin2 khng3-peng-siunn
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Ko-pin5-te7-khu pho3-hek8 nng7-khi2 an-hui-tha-beng7 che3-tok8-an3，
chit8-kiann7 si7-ti7 Ko-hiong5-koan7 Jin5-bu2-hiong chit8-tong3 thau3-thinn-jin5-ke-chhu3 ，
keng3-jian5-u7 chit8-tui3 ang-a2-bou2，
to-ti7 gin2-a2 bin7-cheng5 che3-cho7 tok8-phin2，
iau2-ka7 an-hui-tha-beng7 tok8-phin2 kap peng-siunn sit8-but8 khng3-cho3-hoe2；
leng7-chit8-kiann7 si7-ti7 Pin5-tong-koan7 Heng5-chhun，
che3-tok8 chu2-hiam5-si7 li2-seng3。
ti7 Jin5-bu2-hiong chit-tui3 hiam5-hoan7 senn3-khoo2 ang-a2-bou2，
chhoa7-tioh8 sann-mia5 gin2-a2，
eng7-ka-ki7 khia7-ke cho3 te7-ha7-che3-cho7-kang-tiunn5，
ji7-lau5 che3-cho7 tok8-phin2，
sann-lau5 cho3-khia7-ke，
iau2-ka7 chhu3-lai7-eng7-e5 peng-siunn，
theh8-lai5 kiat-chenn an-hui-tha-beng7 tok8-phin2。
ki2-tang7 tiong7-tin3 「 It-lok8-hng5-png7-tiam3 」 hoe2-sio chiau-pai5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-pak-chhi7 Se-mng5-teng e5 lau7-png7-tiam3 ki2-tang7 tiong7-tin3 「 It-lok8-hng5-toa7-png7-tiam3 」 ，
ti7 gou7-ho7 am3-si5 peh-tiam2-goa7 thoan5-chhut hoe2-chai ，
tioh8-hoe2-sio goan5-in gi5-su7 png7-tiam3-e5 khan-pang2 tian7-soann3-chau2-hoe2，
sun3-kan hoe2-si3-kau3-toa7，

ho2-ka-chai3 hoe2-si3 ti7 poann3-tiam2-cheng-lai7 pi7-phah-hoa，

「 It-lok8-hng5-toa7-png7-tiam3 」 si7 poe5-iok8 ki2-tang7-soan2-chhiu2 e5 tai7-pun2-iann5 ，
ho2-ka-chai3 chit-tiunn5 toa7-hoe2 bo5-ka7 png7-tiam3 sio-hui2，
na7-bo5 hio7-ko2 put-kham-siat-siong2！
bin5-chiong3 hip-loh8 hoe2-chai-hian7-tiunn5 iann2-phinn3，
