tam-sim chan5-hoe2 ke3-siok8 ian5-sio，
siau-hong5-tui7 iu5-goan5 ke3-siok8 bu7-chui2-koan3-kiu3！
pin5-tong5 thau-chhit-tho5-mih8 toa7-be7-tiunn5 han5-tong sang3-un-loan2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Ko-hiong5-chhi7 chit8-mia5 peh-hoe3 cha-pou-gin2-a2，
ti7 toa7-be7-tiunn5 thau-liau2 pian3-heng5-kim-kong pi7-sang3-kau3 keng2-chhat-kiok8，
toa7-be7-tiunn5 su7-au7-tit-chai，
goan5-lai5 cha-pou-gin2-a2-e5 ka-keng2 siang-tong san3-chhiah，
kan-ta-u7 tan-chhin-lau7-bo2 kho3-tioh8 khioh-ji7-choa2，
tok8-lip8 iunn2-chhi7 si3-e5 gin2-a2，
chu7-an2-ne bo5-tui-kiu3 cha-pou-gin2-a2-e5 thau-theh8-heng5-ui5，
e5-pou iau2-kau3 cha-pou-gin2-a2 chhu3-lai7 ui3-bun7，
sang3-tioh8 seng-oah8-iong7-phin2 kap gin2-a2-chheh，
iau2-u7-i me5-jit8-siau3-liam7 e5 pian3-heng5-kim-kong。
tan-sun5-e5 cha-pou-gin2-a2 thau-theh8-an3，
kong2-chhut sia7-hoe7 pinn-a2-kak-e5 san3-chhiah-pi-koa，
m7-koh toa7-be7-tiunn5 e5 han5-tong sang3-un-loan2 ，
oan5-a7-hou7 ka-keng2 san3-chhiah-e5 cha-pou-gin2-a2 chit8-ke-khau2，
kam2-kak-tioh8 jin5-kan-u7-ai3。
iu5-ke3 khi2 chhit-kak gou7-kou3-goeh8 i2-lai5 sin-koan5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
siu7-tioh8 bi2-goan5 bo5-ke3，
kok-che3 iu5-ke3 ke3-siok8 pio-khi2-e5 eng2-hiang2，
Tai5-oan5-tiong-iu5 soan-pou3 tui3 le2-pai3-it thinn-beh-kng khai-si2，
tiau5-khi2 kok-lai7 khi3-iu5 、 chha5-iu5 ke3-siau3 mui2-kong-chin leng5-tiam2-chhit-kho3，
m7-na7-hou7 kiu2-ngou2 bo5-ian5-khi3-iu5 chai3-chhu3 khia7-chiunn7 sann-chap8-kho3 toa7-koan，
oan5-a7-si7 peh-goeh8-te2 i2-lai5 te7-gou7-pai2 khi2-ke3，
long2-chong2 tiau5-khi2-liau2 chit8-kho3-gou7-kak。
kin-a2-jit kui-e5-e5-pou，
ka-iu5-cham7 kang-chok-jin5-oan5 e5 chhiu2 bo5-theng5-koe3，
in-ui7 be7-chio2 bin5-chiong3、
un3-chiang3 chit8-thiann-tioh8 siau-sit，
tui3 le2-pai3-it iu5-ke3 koh-beh khi2-chhit-kak，
put-koan2 u7-su7-bo5-su7 long2-chau2-lai5 ka-iu5。
khia5-chhia-e5 gou7-chong5 goeh8-tai5 cho hoe2-chhia kauh-si2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-thih ui7-ti7 Tai5-lam5-koan7 Koann-tian5-hiong e5 Pat8-na5-chhia-cham7，
siok8-i5 bo5-lang5-khoann3-kou3-e5 kan2-i7-heng5-chhia-cham7，
choh8-jit8 soah-hoat-seng i3-goa7，
chit8-ui7 khia5-chhia-e5 gou7-chong5 bo5-siat chheh-noa5-e5 lu2-kheh chhut-jip8-khau2，
ou-tou2-bai2 chit8-lou7-khia5-chiunn7 goeh8-tai5 liau2-au7，
lian5-lang5-tai3-chhia poah8-loh8 thih-ki-a2-lou7，
pi7 hoe2-chhia tong-tiunn5 kauh-si2，
kau2-ho7 e5-pou senn3-Li2 bin5-chiong3，
khia5-tioh8 ou-tou2-bai2 gou7-chong5 Pat8-na5-hoe2-chhia-cham7 e5 lu2-kheh chhut-jip8-khau2，
lian5-lang5-tai3-chhia poah8-loh8 goeh8-tai5，
tu2-tioh8 chiunn7-pak-e5 Ki2-kong-ho7 liat8-chhia tong-tiunn5 kauh-si2。
Tai5-thih si7-m7-si7-u7 jin5-ui5-soe-sit ，
keng2-hong iau2-beh chin3-chit8-pou7 tiau-cha。
heng5-cheng3-bo5-tiong-lip8 Tan5-bu2-hiong5 hou7-lang5-ma7
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Long5-ui2-hoe7 e5 chu2-ui2 Tan5-bu2-hiong5，
kin-a2-jit pi7 Bin5-chin3-tong2-lip8-ui2 phau3-hong heng5-cheng3-bo5-tiong-lip8，
ti7 Long5-ui2-hoe7 chu2-pan7-e5 kok-che3 bok8-tiau cho7-tam5-hoe7-teng2，
Tan5-bu2-hiong5 tng-tioh8 chham-soan2 toa7-Tai5-tiong-chhi7-tiunn2 e5 Ou5-chi3-kiong5，
i2-kip8 chham-ka lai5-pin-e5 bin7-cheng5-kong2 「 i it-teng7-ai3 tong3-soan2 」，
chit8-peng5-e5 Ou5-chi3-kiong5 iau2-pi2-chhut pai3-thok chhiu2-se3 ，
toa7-siann-hoah keng-hui3 「 ka-poe7 」。
chap8-goeh8 kau2-ho7 tng-kang，
Tan5-bu2-hiong5 keng2-jian5 li7-iong7 Long5-ui2-hoe7 ku2-pan7-e5 oah8-tong7 ，
kong-khai-the3 Tiong-kok-kok-bin5-tong2 e5 Ou5-chi3-kiong5 chou7-soan2，
Bin5-chin3-tong2-lip8-ui2 phoe-pheng5 Tan5-bu2-hiong5 heng5-cheng3-bo5-tiong-lip8。
Tai5-tiong sin-chhi7-cheng3-tiong-sim lok8-seng5 chiunn7-ian2 「 khang-siann5」
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-tiong-chhi7-cheng3-hu2 e5 sin-chhi7-cheng3-tiong-sim，
chap8-ho7 tng-kang hong-kong-lok8-seng5，
m7-kuh soe3-pou7 kang-su7 long2-bo5-oan5-kang，
chhi7-hu2-jin5-oan5 chiau3-siong5-ti7 ku7-chhi7-hu2 pan7-kong，
hai7-kah8 bin5-chiong3 chau2-kau3 sin-chhi7-cheng3-tiong-sim soah-lau3-khang-kiann5，
Tai5-tiong-chhi7-gi7-oan5 khau-se2 eng3-kai-ka7 sin-toa7-lau5 kai2-mia5-cho3 「 hoe7-sit-le2-tiong-sim」，
hian7-tiunn5 kan-ta-u7 chhit-ui7 oan5-kang siang7-pan，
lok8-seng5-liau2-au7 soah-chiunn7-ian2 「 khang-siann5 」，
m7-koh kui-tong3-toa7-lau5 teng-hoe2-thong-beng5，
leng2-khi3 tian7-hui3 hou7 Tai5-tiong-chhi7-bin5 kiau2-soe3 hu3-siau3。
Bin5-chin3-tong2 toa7-Tai5-tiong-chhi7-tiunn2 chham-soan2-jin5 Sou-ka-choan5 chi2-chhut，
kann2-na7-si7 lok8-seng5-tian2-le2，
eng3-kai tioh8-si7 cheng3-sek-khe2-iong7，
sng2-lang7-hoe-ji7 bo5-i3-su3，
Ou5-chi3-kiong5 eng3-kai-hiong3 chhi7-bin5 kai2-soeh chheng-chho2。
siu7-khun3 lak8-chap8-kau2-kang khong3-kang tit-beh teng5-kian3-thian-jit8
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Ti3-li7 sann-chap8-sann-mia5 khong3-kang siu7-khun3 thou5-kha-te2 lak8-chap8-kau2-kang，
kin-a2-jit chong2-sng3-beh thian2-khui thoat-khun3 eng5-kiu3，
m7-koh ui7-tioh8 khak-po2 koe3-teng5 bo5-i3-goa7，
kiu3-lan7-jin5-oan5 chai3-sann-chin3-heng5 chhek-chhi3，
kiu3-seng-chhng chin3-jip8 khenn-toe2-e5 si5-kan，
oan5-a7-in-chhu2 ian5-chhian5-liau2 nng7-tiam2-cheng。
bok8-cheng5 chi2-theng3-hau7 i-hou7-sio2-chou seng-loh8-kau3 khenn-toe2，
hiap8-chou7 khong3-kang cho3-ho2-chun2-pi7 i2-au7，
te7-it-phoe sin-sim-chong7-hong2 siang7-ho2-e5 khong3-kang to-e7-sai2 giu2-khi2-lai5，
kui-e5 tiau3-kiu3-koe3-teng5，
peng5-kin chit8-e5-lang5 tai7-iok-ai3-khai chit8-tiam2-poann3-cheng，

ti7 chap8-kau2-ho7 e5 cha2-khi2 peh-tiam2，

in-ui7 cheng-chhek-tioh8 chhia-tong3-koh-iunn7，
cho7-seng5 chiat8-un7 theng5-sai2 chap8-goa7-hun-cheng，
oan5-a7-ian5-gou7-tioh8 au7-lai5-e5 hoat-chhia chin3-tou7，

long2-pi7-khah8-leh Tai5-pak-chhia-cham7 ，
that-piak-e5 jin5-tiau5 oan5-choan5 kheh-be7-chiunn7-chhia。
koann2-tioh8-beh kau2-tiam2 siang7-pan-e5 bin5-chiong3，
kip-kah8 piann3-mia7-tui3 chiat8-un7-chhia-siunn mng5-khau2-kheh，

chiu7-sng3 chiat8-un7-kong-si ka-khui kui2-na7-pan liat8-chhia，

tauh8-tauh8 thoan5-chhut him5 chhut-but8！ Jit8-pun2 bin5-chiong3 bun5-chi-sek-pian3
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-oan5-e5 bin5-chiong3 khi3-kau3 Jit8-pun2 Pak-hai2-to7 chhit-tho5，
heng3 kou3-be2 in3-tioh8 「 him5-chhut-but8 chu3-i3 」 ji7-iunn7 e5 ki3-liam7-phin2，
m7-koh chit-ma2 chit-ku3-oe7，
e7-sai2-kong2 hou7 Jit8-pun2-bin5-chiong3 bun5-chi-sek-pian3，
choe3-kin7 in-ui7 Jit8-pun2 Pak-hai2-to7 kok-te7，
long2-thoan5-chhut-u7 him5 si3-ke3-chhut-but8 e5 siau-sit。
Jit8-pun2 Tai7-pan2 e5 teng-san-iong7-phin2-tiam3，
choe3-kin7 be7-tit siang7-ho2-e5-si7 hong5-him5 leng5-liang-a2，
chap8-kau2-ho7 am3-si5 Hok-to2-koan7 chu7-theh8-khu e5 khi7-a2-chhiu7-teng2，
sann-chiah him5 tinn5-noa2-liau2 kau2-tiam2-cheng，
ka7 khi7-a2 chiah8-liau2-liau2 chiah sim-moa2-i3-chiok tng2-kau3 soann-teng2。
ki5-sit8 chia-e5 chhut-but8-ti7 chu7-theh8-khu e5 him5，
long2-si7 ui7-tioh8-beh chhoe7-chiah8，
ka-siang7 khi3-hau7-pian3-hoa3 koh-iu7，

pek-kah8 chia-e5 him5 chi2-ho2 chong5-jip8 chu7-theh8-khu 。
Tang-kang2-khe koh-liah8-tioh8 khok8-hi5 kha-khoan5 tui-lau5-hiong3
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Pin5-tong-koan7 e5 Tang-kang2-khe koh-u7 khok8-hi5 chhut-but8，
liah8-khok8-hi5 choan-ka A-lim5-a2 choh8-jit8 koh-liah8-tioh8 chit8-chiah toa7-khok8-hi5，
chit-i2-keng-si7 chit-le2-pai3 i2-lai5-e5 te7-ji7-chiah；
Long5-giap8-chhu3 jin5-oan5 e5-pou cha-khoann3 khok8-hi5 kha-khoan5，
tui-cha khok8-hi5 tui3-toh-chit8-e5 iang2-sit8-tiunn5 lau5-chhut；
tui3-i5 goa7-thoan5 Tang-kang2-khe kin7-lai5 chiok-choe7 khok8-hi5，
si7 iu5-thang5 po3-hok8 cha-chip-jin5-oan5 mai5-hok8 chiah-thau-pang3-e5，
tong-toe7 khok8-hi5-choan-ka soah-kong2 bo5-thiann-kong2-koe3。

hou7-tit Tam7-chui2-ho5 e5 chui2-ui7 chhiau-koe3 keng2-kai3-soann3，

m7-si7 chhi7-tiunn2 long2-e7-tang3 koan2-e7-tioh8 ，

Toa7-pheng5-oan thih-be2 iu5 khoann3 Sio2-liu5-kiu5 bi2-keng2 chiah8-hai2-san2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Pin5-tong-koan7 Toa7-pheng5-oan e5 thih-be2 choan-iong7-to7，
seh8-tioh8 seng-thai3-khoan5-keng2 hong-hu3-e5 lai7-hai2，
ti5-liau2 e7-tang3 khoann3-hai2 、 khoann3-ou5，
iau2-e7-tang3 khoann3-tioh8 kui-toa7-phinn3 e5 chui2-pit-a2 ang5-chhiu7-na5。
na7-chun2 khia5-kau3 pak-tou2-iau-ah，
e7-tang3-kau3 Hoa5-kiau5-chhi7-tiunn5 chiah8 sin-sian-hai2-san2。
chit-tah-ti7 e5-pou nng7-tiam2 i2-au7，
moa2-si3-ke3 toa7-phoe iu5-kheh kap chai7-toe7-lang5 iong2-jip8 ，
chau2-chhoe7 bi2-bi7-e5 sin-sian-hai2-san2 。
Toa7-pheng5-oan ti5-liau2 e7-tang3 khia5-thih-be2 、 chiah8-hai2-sian，
iau2-e7-ti7 hai2-pinn sng2-chui2 ah-si7 tio3-hi5
bang7-tioh8 hng7-hng7-e5 Sio2-liu5-kiu5 bi2-keng2，
him-siong2 am3-pou-a2-si5-chun7 e5 sai-chio3-jit8，
kim-iann3-iann3-e5 hun5-iann2 to3-chio3-iann2-ti7 lai7-hai2-teng2。
mou5-he7 、 kiunn-bo2-ah sio-leng2 chou-hap8 thng-thau5 chhenn-tinn
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
thinn-khi3 un5-un5-a2 tng2-liang5，
be7-chio2-lang5 e7-khai-si2 beh-ai3-chiah8 kiunn-bo2-ah，
Pin5-tong-koan7 Ka-tang-hiong u7-chit8-keng kiunn-bo2-ah-tiam3，
thau5-ke ui7-tioh8-ti7 khau2-bi7-siang7 u7 sin-tut8-phoa3，
ka7 mou5-he7 kap kiunn-bo2-ah cho3-he2 khong3，
thng-thau5 koh-khah chhenn-tinn ，
mou5-he7 、 kiunn-bo2-ah chit8-sio-chit8-leng2 e5 chiah8-pou2-chou-hap8，
be7-chio2 kou3-kheh tui3-hng7-te7 bun5-mia5-lai5-kau3。
lang5-kheh an3-chiau3 hi2-ai3 thiau-soan2 mou5-he7，
sui5-thai5-au7 tit8-chiap khng3-jip8 kiunn-bo2-ah thng-oe-a2-lai7 cho3-he2 khong3，
leng7-goa7 chit-to moa5-a2-phang bi2-hoeh，
si7-su2-iong7 sun5-moa5-iu5 ka7 bi2-hoeh chinn3-sou，
koh-iong7 soa-thng5 ham tau7-iu5 cho3-he2-chha2，
koh-tinn-koh-kiam5 e5 chu-bi7 chhim-siu7 lu2-seng kou3-kheh hi2-ai3。
hak8-hau7 kin2-kip-tian7-oe7 kiu3-hoe5 he-ku hak8-seng chit8-mia7
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
「 hau7-hng5 kin2-kip-tian7-oe7 ， iu2-pi7-bu5-hoan7 」，
Ko-hiong5-koan7 Chhiu7-tek-kho-ki-tai7-hak8 chin3-siu-pou7 e5 chit8-ui7 hak8-seng，
teng2-jit8 thinn-beh-kng chit8-tiam2-goa7 tut8-jian5 he-ku hoat-chok，
sui5-siunn7-tioh8 sin-seng-hun3-lian7-si5，
hak8-hau7 tui3 in the5-chhenn2-e5 kin2-kip-tian7-oe7 ，
i chin7-bo2-lat8 kha3-chhut tian7-oe7-ho7-be2 liau2-au7，
hau7-hong-e5 lau7-su sui5-lian5-lok8 kiu3-oan7，
ka7 chit-ui7 hak8-seng tui3 kui2-mng5-koan chhiunn2-kiu3 tng2-lai5。
tng-kang senn3-Un tong5-hak8 ti7 pang5-keng-lai7 chiunn7-bang7-lou7，
he-ku-pinn7 tut8-jian5 hoat-chok，
to2-phak-leh tian7-nau2-chu2-ki pinn-a2，
ti7 sit-khi3 i3-sek chin3-cheng5，
theh8-khi2 chhiu2-ki kha3 hak8-hau7-e5 kin2-kip-tian7-oe7 hoah-kiu3-lang5，
hau7-hong thong-po3 It-it-kiu2 chian5-ong2 chhiunn2-kiu3，
ho2-ka-chai3 tui3 kui2-mng5-koan cheng5 kiu3-tng2 senn3-Un hak8-seng chit8-mia7。
hou2-thau5-phang khi2-siu7 chhu3-chu2 m7-goan7 tiah-tu5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
it-poann tak8-ke tiann7-khoann3-tioh8-e5 hou2-thau5-phang-siu7，
goa7-heng5 long2-si7 pi2-kau3 phian-hiong3 chui2-tih heng5-chong7 ，
m7-koh ti7 Ka-gi7-koan7 Mui5-san-hiong u7 chit8-hou7 jin5-ke-chhu3 goa7-chhiunn5-a2，
hou2-thau5-phang-siu7 e5 heng5-chong7，
senn-kah8 chiok-chhiunn7 chit8-chiah-be2，
tng5-tou7 tai7-iok-u7 nng7-kong-chhioh，
sui-jian5 phang-siu7 goa7-khau2 put-si5-khoann3-tioh8 hou2-thau5-phang sin-iann2 ，
chhu3-chu2 oan5-a7-bo5 i3-goan7 tiah-tu5，
in jim7-ui5 chit-e5 han2-tit-e5 phang-siu7，
e7-sai2-ui7 in toa3-lai5 ho2-un7。
kun-ku3 Lim5-giap8-chhi3-giam7-sou2 hou2-thau5-phang choan-ka e5 kong2-hoat，
hou2-thau5-phang-siu7 kinn3-na7 siu7-tioh8 goa7-lek8 kiau2-chha2 ，
bo5-lun7-si7 jin5-lek8 ah-si7 chu7-jian5-lek8-liang7 pho3-hoai7，
hou2-thau5-phang to-e7 khu7-iu2 kong-kek-seng3。

Jit8-pun2-siu2-siong3 Naoto-Kan chu7-kin-ni5 lak8-goeh8 chiu7-jim7-au7，

i ti5-liau2 chhio3-khoe thiong3-tam5 kiann-chhoah ke-lai7 thoan5-gian5，

lip8-hoat-ui2-oan5 ti7 Lip8-hoat-inn7 chit-sun5 Lai7-cheng3-pou7-tiunn2，

lip8-hoat-ui2-oan5 thong3-phoe siunn-ham3-kou2，

koh-kau3-liau2 chhiu-tang liu2-teng toa7-chhut-si5-cheh，

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tho5-hng5-ki-tiunn5 iu7-koh-chiunn7-ian2 hui-an kiann-hun5-ki3，

chit8-tai5 tui3 Tiong-kok-Chheng-to2 poe-ong2 Tai5-oan5 Tho5-hng5-ki-tiunn5 e5 Hoa5-hang5-kheh-ki，
chun2-pi7 kang3-loh8-cheng5 chit8-hun-cheng，
chiah-pi7 thah-tai5 thong-ti 「 teng5-poe 」 ，
goan5-in-si7 ki-tiunn5-phau2-to7 chit8-tai5 Tiong2-eng5 hoe3-ki iau2-boe7 khi2-poe，

thah-tai5 chiah kin2-kip-thong-ti，
u7-chit8-tai5 Tiong2-eng5-hoe3-ki ti7-phau2-to7-teng2 iau2-boe7 khi2-poe，

hui-ki khi2-kang3 long2-oa2-kho3 koan2-che3-oan5 e5 chi2-hui，

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
phok8-hoat phainn2-chhui3 su7-kiann7 ti7 hoe7-sit-le2 liau2-au7，

Tai7-oe7-sin-bun5 kin-pun2 bo5-siu-tioh8 Liok8-ui2-hoe7 e5 thoan5-chin，

chi2-khong3 Tenn7-hong5-gi5 kong2-peh8-chhat8，
au7-lai5 hoat-hian7 Liok8-ui2-hoe7 kin-pun2 thoan5-m7-tioh8 ho7-ma2。
Tenn7-hong5-gi5 ti7 chiat-bok8-siang7 choan5-bin7-hoan2-kek，
Tai7-oe7-sin-bun5 u7-chun2-pi7 tong-su7-jin5 teng5-chheng choan-soann3，
Liok8-ui2-hoe7 ui7-siann2-mih8-mai3 call-in 。
Liok8-ui2-hoe7 theh8-chhut ti7 chhit-goeh8 lak8-ho7 e5 thoan5-chin ki3-lok8，
thoan5-chin-kau3 pat-chhit-kiu2-ji7 chhit-it-khong3-it e5 tian7-oe7 ho7-ma2，
put-ko3 cheng3-khak-e5 thoan5-chin-ho7-ma2 eng-kai-si7 pat-chhit-kiu2-ji7 chhit-it-khong3-chhit，
chha-chit8-e5 ho7-ma2 si7 chha-chiok-choe7-ne。
thoann-hoan3 gou7-ni5-lai5 pi7-khui nng7-chheng-goa7-tiunn hoat8-toann
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-pak-chhi7 chit8-mia5 liu5-tong7-thoann-hoan3，
gou7-ni5-lai5 ，
pi7 keng2-hong khui-liau2 nng7-chheng khong3 chhit-chap8-kau2 tiunn hoat8-toann，
i kiau2-kau pou7-hun7 hoat8-khoan2 i2-au7 to-bo5-koh-chhap，
soa3-au7 lui2-chek-e5 khiam3-khoan2 chinn5-giah8 koan5-kau3 sann-pah-ban7。
thoann-hoan3 Li2-sin-senn kong2，
keng2-chhat khui-hoat8-toann sit8-chai7 siunn-chiap8 ，
Li2-sin-senn ham khan-chhiu2 nng7-lang5 sak-tioh8 tann3-a2-chhia，
chhng-nng Tai5-pak-chhi7 tang-khu e5 toa7-ke-sio2-hang7，
to2-ui7 lang5-che7 to-ong2 to2-ui7-khi3，
keng2-hong ui2-chhiann2 Tai5-pak heng5-cheng3-chip-heng5-chhu3 chhui-tho2 hoat8-kim。
Li2-sin-senn theh8-chhut chit8-thah8 hoat8-toann to kau7-kau3 chap8-kong-hun，
long2-si7 i2-keng lap8-chinn5-e5 ng5-sek siu-ki3，
pai2-tann3-a2 be7-sann-khou3 e5 Li2-sin-senn，
gou7-ni5-lai5 i2-keng pi7-khui nng7-chheng-goa7-tiunn hoat8-toann，
khi3-kah8 toa7-ma7 Tai5-pak-chhi7-cheng3-hu2。
Khai2-tat8-keh-lan5-tai7-to7 tiu7-a2 siu-koah 「 thou2-toe7-cheng3-gi7 」 choh-chhan5-lang5 piau2-tat8 sim-siann
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
kin-ni5 chhit-goeh8 choan5-Tai5-oan5 choh-chhan5-lang5 chian5-ong2 Khai2-tat8-keh-lan5-tai7-to7，
khong3-gi7 thou2-toe7 teng-siu bo5-kong-to7，
tang-si5 cheng3-ti7 Khai2-tat8-keh-lan5-tai7-to7 e5 tiu7-a2 i2-keng ta-tiu2，
gou7-pah-ui7 choh-chhan5-lang5 tang5-che5 lai5-kau3 Ko-hiong5-koan7 Bi2-long5-tin3 siu-koah，
peng7-chhiann2-ti7 chhan5-tiong koah-chhut 「 thou2-toe7-cheng3-gi7 」 si3-e5 toa7-ji7，
to-si7 hi-bang7 Ma2-eng-kiu2 tong-kiok8 e7-ann3-hinn7-thiann in-e5 sim-siann，
na7-chun2 bo5-tit-tioh8 hoe5-eng3，
choh-chhan5-lang5 tai7-piau2 kong2 bo5-pai5-ti5 chai3-chhu3 chiunn7-pak khong3-cheng。
kim-ng5 pa2-jin5 ta-tiu2-e5 tiu7-sui7 soe7-loh8，
m7-koh siu-koah tiu7-a2-e5 choh-chhan5-lang5，
soah tak8-e5 thau5 pak8 khong3-gi7 cheng3-hu2 kiong5-nge7 teng-siu long5-te7-e5 pou3-liau5-a2 ，
hoainn5-pa3-e5 teng-siu gui5-hai7-tioh8 choh-chhan5-lang5-e5 seng-chun5-koan5，
chit8-pah ji7-chap8-kang cheng5 sang3-lai5 Bi2-long5-tin3 e5 「 Khai2-to7 tiu7-a2 」 ，
teng2-jit8 i2-keng ta-tiu2，
choh-chhan5-lang5 ti7-thou2-toe7-teng2 koah-chhut 「 thou2-toe7 cheng3-gi7 」 si3-e5 toa7-ji7，
beh the3 choan5-Tai5-oan5 choh-chhan5-lang5 kiong7-tong5 hoat-chhut siann-im。
jin5-som pou2-sin-the2 sim-hiat-kng2 penn7-hoan7 khi7-iong7
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
moe2-ni5 chhiu-tang si5-cheh，
chiann5-che7-lang5 long2-e7 chiah8 Tiong-ioh8-liau7-li2 lai5 pou2-sin-the2，
ki5-tiong 「 jin5-som 」 khah-pi7 khoann3-cho3 ko-kip pou2-phin2，
tiong-i chi2-chhut jin5-som sui-jian5-si7 un-pou2-e5 ioh8-but8，
m7-koh u7 sim-hiat-kng2 cheng3-thau5 i2-kip8 toa7-pinn7-tu2-ho2 e5 lang5，
chhian-ban7 be7-eng7 hok8-iong7 jin5-som ，
chi3-i5 sin-the2 hi-han5-chia2 siunn7-chiah8-pou2，
eng3-kai hok8-iong7 「 chhenn-phak8 」 e5 jin5-som，
kam2-mou7 hoat-sio ah-si7 io-chi2-pinn7 penn7-hoan7，
khah-si7 be7-eng7 jim7-i3 hok8-iong7 jin5-som，
ai3-beh cheng3-khak hok8-iong7 jin5-som pou2-sin-the2，
siang7-ho2 iau2-si7 chhoe7 hap8-keh-e5 tiong-i-su khui-ioh8-toann。
chhia-tui7 chiat-khau3 chhiunn2 lang5-kheh un3-chiang3 oan3-than3 cho-pak-siap
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
tng5-ki5-i2-lai5 Tai5-pak-te7-khu e5 ke3-teng5-chhia chhia-tui7，
long2-si7-iong7 ke3-siau3 phah-chiat cheng-chhu2 lang5-kheh，
m7-koh chiat-chinn5-e5 pou7-hun7，
ke3-teng5-chhia un3-chiang3 soah-pit-su ka-ki7 khip-siu，
hou7 un3-chiang3-in oan3-than3 kam2-kak ka-ki7 pi7-pak-siap，
choe3-kin7 Tai5-pak-chhi7 e5 ke3-teng5-chhia tong5-giap8-kong-hoe7，
to-iau-kiu5 sou2-u7 chhia-tui7 giap8-chia2，
cho3-hoe2 chhiam-su2 「 bo5-phah-chiat tong5-i3-su」，
hi-bang7 po2-chiong3 ke3-teng5-chhia un3-chiang3 koan5-ek，
be7-chiann5-cho3 chhia-tui7 ok-seng3 keng7-cheng-ha7-e5 hi-seng-phin2，
iau3-kia3-siann giap8-chia2 na7-si7 bo5-phoe3-hap8 e5 oe7，
to-beh chhoe7-lang5 koan3-pok8 kio3-chhia choan-soann3。
tui3 me5-ni5-e5 it-goeh8 khai-si2，
chhia-chu it-lut8 bo5-koh-phah-chiat，
u7-koa2 bin5-chiong3 piau2-si7-kong2 bo5-phah-chiat to-bo5-chhia-ah。
Kau3-iok8-pou7 bang7-cham7 thiat hak8-tai3 chu-liau7 lip8-hoat-ui2-goan5 phoe-pheng5 iu3-ti7
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
sin-chheng2 hak8-seng-tai3-khoan2 jin5-sou3 tau3-te2 u7-joa7-che7？
Bin5-chin3-tong2 choh8-jit8 khan-teng kong2-ko3，
chi2-chhut i2-keng-u7 peh-chap8-lak8-ban7 e5 hak8-seng，
pi2 Kau3-iok8-pou7 kong-ko3-e5 si3-chap8-ban7-lang5 ke-chhut nng7-poe7，
m7-koh chin-sit8 sou3-ki3 chit-ku2 oan5-a7 chha5-be7-tioh8-ah，
in-ui7 phah-khui Kau3-iok8-pou7 bang7-cham7，
hak8-tai3 jin5-sou3 siang-koan-e5 bang7-iah8 tut8-jian5 bo5-khi3-ah。
hak8-seng chit-ku2 tai3-khoan2 jin5-sou3 tau3-te2 u7-joa7-che7？
peh-goeh8-te2 e5 Tiong-kok-si5-po3 kong2 u7 peh-chap8-lak8-ban7 nng7-chheng-lang5，
Kau3-iok8-pou7 teng5-chheng kan-ta-u7 si3-chap8-ban7-lang5，
teng2-e7-hak8-ki5 long2-chong2 peh-chap8-ban7 jin5-chhu3，
iau2-u7 chin3-cheng5 pi7-thong3-phoe pou2-chou7 Tiong-kok-chek8 gian2-kiu3-seng，
lai5 Tai5-oan5 sia2-lun7-bun5 pou2-chou7 seng-oah8-hui3 e5 chu-liau7，
oan5-a7-tui3 Kau3-iok8-pou7 e5 bang7-cham7-teng2 siau-sit-ah，
cheng-gi7-seng3 e5 chu-liau7 long2-chong2-thiat-tiau7，
giam5-tiong7-e5 hak8-seng tai3-khoan2 bun7-te5 iau3-si7 bo5-kai2-koat。
sann-bio2-ka gou7-cho3 bak8-ioh8-chui2 chian2 bak8-ham kip-kiu3
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tho5-hng5-koan7 chit8-ui7 hoe3-thau5 beh-oa2 chhit-chap8-hoe3 e5 cheng-pio2-hang5 lau7-sai，
ti7 tiam2-bak8-ioh8-chui2 e5 si5-chun7，
in-ui7 chiann3-lui2 i2-keng chhenn-me5，
to3-lui2 si7-lek8 koh chin-bo5-ho2，
bo5-se3-ji7 ka7 sann-bio2-ka tong-cho3 bak8-ioh8-chui2 tiam2-jip8 bak8-chiu-lai7，
ho2-ka-chai3 sang3-i hu3-si5 ka7 bak8-ham chian2-khui，
ban2-kiu3-liau2 i-e5 bak8-chiu，
hou7 i e7-sai2 teng5-kian3-kong-beng5。
lau7-sian-senn e5 chiann3-lui2 pun2-lai5 in-ui7 phoa3-penn7 chhenn-me5，
chit-pai2 koh tiam2-m7-tioh8 bak8-ioh8-chui2，
i-seng the5-chhenn2 bin5-chiong3 eng3-kai chu3-i3，
chhu3-lai7 ioh8-but8 it-teng7-ai3 tho3-sian7 siu-ho2，

su2-iong7-cheng5 it-teng7-ai3 khoann3-chheng-chho2，
bian2-tit hoat-seng i3-goa7 hio7-ko2 put-kham-siat-siong2。
sia7-khu ki7-choat8 soan2-ki2 oah8-tang7 an-ui3 soan2-bin5 cho7-seng5 chhiong-tut8
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-tiong chhi7-tiunn2 hau7-soan2-jin5 Ou5-chi3-kiong5 an-ui3 chi-chhi5-chia2 Lim5-gi5-kun ，
hoat-seng-liau2 i3-goa7-e5 chhah-khek，
in-ui7 sia7-khu ki7-choat8 cheng3-ti7-oah8-tang7 chin3-jip8，
iau-kiu5 Tiong-kok-kok-bin5-tong2 hau7-soan2-jin5 Ou5-chi3-kiong5 kap Lim5-gi5-kun li7-khui sia7-khu lai7-tiann5，
tiunn5-bin7 siang-tong-e5 hun7-loan7，
koe3-teng5-tiong ki3-chia2 hip-siong3-ki gu7-tioh8 chhiunn2-chau2，
koan2-li2-oan5 iau-kiu5 soan2-ki2-jin5-oan5 li7-khui sia7-khu-lai7-tiann5，
pi7-kiam2-ki2 hoe2-soan2-e5 Lim5-gi5-kun ti7 hoe7-kheh-sek toa7-soe3-siann-khau3，

chi3-i5 sia7-khu ui7-ho5 kek-liat8 hoan2-eng3 ai3-mng7 tui3-hong，
su7-kiann7 hoat-seng-liau2-au7，
Bin5-chin3-tong2 gou7-toa7-tou hu3-soan2 chu2-ui2 Sia7-tiong5-teng5 oan5-a7-hoat-pou3 seng-beng5-ko2 chi2-chhut，

oan5-a7-bo5-chun-tiong7 sia7-khu-e5 kui-teng7，
kiat-ko2 cho7-seng5 khia7-hou7-e5 hoan2-kam2 ham kiu3-hun，
ti3-su2 chhiong-tut8 pho3-hoai7-liau2 sia7-khu-e5 ho5-hai5，
Ou5-chi3-kiong5 eng3-kai-hiang3 sia7-khu-e5 khia7-hou7 hoe7-sit-le2。
chhiu2-chi2 khah8-tiau5 chhiu2-chi2 giah8-koan5-chhiu2 khin-khin thui-loan2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
na7-chun2 chhiu2-chi2 khah8-tiau5 chhiu2-chng2-thau5，
ban2-be7-loh8-lai5 an-choann2-pan7？
be7-chio2-lang5 long2-e7 kiu5-chou7 siau-hong5-jin5-oan5，
ki3-a2 、 phoa3-hai7-chian2 teng2 kang-khu7 chong2-long2-chhut-tong7，
tiunn5-bin7-kiann-lang5 ham ai-au5-e5 chham2-kio3-siann，
chhiu2-chng2-thau5 ham-kah8 kap ian-chhiang5 kang7-khoan2，
siau-hong5-jin5-oan5 long2-tioh8 ho2-le2-a2 ki3-khui chhiu2-chi2，
koe3-teng5 kiann-hiam2-ban7-hun，
chit-ma2 chi2-iau3 ka7 chhiu2-giah8-koan5 chhiau-koe3 sim-chong7，
hiat-ek8 be7-cho7-seng5 chhiu2-chng2-thau5 ham-ham，
koh-phoe3-hap8 sa-la2-iu5 、 te5-khou-chui2 e5 jun7-kut8-ek8，
tui3-teng2-ong2-e7 un5-un5-a2 thui-loan2 chhiu2-chng2-thau5，
tai7-iok gou7-hun-cheng kau3 chap8-hun-cheng，
chhiu2-chi2 to-e7-thang sun7-li7 thoah-loh8，
ban7-it khah8-tiau5-e5 si5-kan chhiau-koe3 sann-chap8-hun-cheng，
chhiu2-chng2-thau5 lu2-lai5-lu2-ham iau2-tioh8-si7 koann2-kin2 sang3-i。
Sam-gi7 ku7-soann-soann3 chhut-mia5 hiu-eng5 thih-to7-chi-lu2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
keng-koe3 Biau5-lek8-koan7 Sam-gi7-hiong e5 ku7-soann-soann3 thih-to7，
chu7-chiong5 hoe2-chhia theng5-sai2 liau2-au7，
tian-to3 pinn3-cho3 li2-iu5-e5 sin-keng2-tiam2。
ti7 ku7-soann-soann3 hiu-eng5 long5-giap8-khu-lai7，
ian5-tioh8 thih-to7 siat-lip8-liau2 chiann5-che7 tek8-sek chhan-im2 kap bin5-siok，
tiam3-thau5 kiat-hap8-liau2 thih-to7-bun5-hoa3 kap kheh-ka-jin5-bun5 ，
teng5-hian7-liau2 hiu-eng5-li2-iu5 e5 sin-hong-mau7。
ku7-soann-soann3 oan5-cheng2 po2-chun5-liau2 jin5-bun5-su2-chek kap chu7-jian5-keng2-koan，
u7 pah-ni5-lek8-su2 e5 Tai5-thih-ku7-soann-soann3，
siang7-chhut-mia5 e5 si7 Leng5-theng5-tng7-kio5 kian3-tiok8-ge7-sut8，
iau2-u7 chha5-thau5 kian3-cho7-e5 Seng3-heng-hoe2-chhia-cham7。
kin-a2-jit8-e5 ku7-soann-soann3 hiu-eng5-long5-giap8-khu，
hong-hu3-e5 long5-chok tek8-san2 kiat-hap8 kheh-ka jin5-bun5-li2-iu5 tek8-sek，
hou7 iu5-kheh u7 khah to-goan5-e5 the2-giam3。
Iunn5-siok-kun su7-kiann7 Sou-cheng-chhiong phoe-pheng5 Ma2-eng-kiu2 nng2-chiann2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
A3-chiu-un7-tong7-hoe7 Iunn5-siok-kun ti7 Tai5-kun5-to7 pi2-sai3 sit-khi3 chu-keh su7-kiann7，
The2-ui2-hoe7 hu3-chu2-ui2 keng3-jian5-ai3 ta-ke thun-loh8 chit-khau2-khui3，
hou7 Bin5-chin3-tong2 Tai5-pak-chhi7-tiunn2 e5 hau7-soan2-jin5 Sou-cheng-chhiong oan5-a7 khoann3-be7-loh8-khi3，
chap8-peh-ho7 cha2-khi2 phau3-hong The2-ui2-hoe7 koann-oan5 sit-phin2-keh，
phoe-pheng5 Ma2-eng-kiu2 bo5-eng3-kai an2-ne nng2-chiann2 bo5-piau2-thai3，
it-tit8-kau3 tu2-tioh8 chit8-tui3 ai3-jin5-a2，
koe-teng2 iau-chhiann2 Sou-cheng-chhiong cho3 in-e5 cheng3-hun-jin5，
chiah chhiong-tam7 sio2-khoa2 khi3-hun3。
tng-kang Sou-cheng-chhiong teh-bo5-eng5 chau2-soan2-ki2，
chit-chit8-tui3 ang-a2-bou2 tut8-jian5 chhut-hian7，
kong2 hi-bang7-beh Sou-cheng-chhiong tau3-sann-kang7 cho3 cheng3-hun-jin5，
ti7-toa7-lou7-pinn cho3-tioh8 cheng3-hun-jin5，
Sou-cheng-chhiong kong2 chit-thang-kong2-si2 i jin5-seng thau5-chit8-pai2，
kiat-hun cheng3-su-siang7 cheng3-hun-jin5 ti5-liau2 Sou-cheng-chhiong，

sui-jian5 chit8-tui3 ai3-jin5-a2 chin-ke7-tiau7，
heng7-hok-e5 khi3-hun kam2-jiam2 chai7-tiunn5-e5 tak8-e5-lang5。
ke2-cho7 sin-hun7-cheng3 che3-chok chhiau-cheng-bit8 kiong5-beh phai2-pian7-sek
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Heng5-su7-keng2-chhat-kiok8 kin-a2-jit pho3-hek8 chit8-chan5 cha3-phian3 an3-kiann7，
hoan7-choe7 tit-chhiu2 kim-giah8 koan5-kau3 chiunn7-ek，
chit-e5 cha3-phian3-chip8-thoan5 choan-bun5 ke2-cho7 sin-hun7-cheng3，
hong2-cho7-e5 pou7-hun7 pau-koat an-choan5-soann3 、 phu5-chui2-in3 、
hong5-gui7 lui5-sia7-chiam-khang Tai5-oan5 tou5-an3 teng2，
cheng-bit8 theng5-tou7 na7-chun2 bo5-eng7 choan-giap8-gi5-khi3，
it-poann-bin5-chiong3 kiong5-beh bo5-hoat pian7-sek。
cha3-phian3-chip8-thoan5 ke2-cho7-e5 sin-hun7-cheng3，
an-choan5-soann3 bo5 lian5-cho3 chit8-tiau5-soann3，
phu5-chui2-in3 e5 iu5-bak8 sek-chhai2 khah8-chhian2，
siang7-lan5 hong2-e5 lui5-sia7 chiam-khang Tai5-oan5 tou5-an3，
ke2-cho7 sin-hun7-cheng3 e5 cheng-bit8-tou7 to-put-ju5 chin-e5，
sin-hun7-cheng3 chiann3-e7-kha-peng5 kng-chhai2 pian3-hoa3 poh8-mouh8，
in-ui7 hiam5-hoan7 bo5-pan7-hoat ke2-cho7，
chi2-e7-sai2 thiah-chin-e5 liam5-khi2-khi3。
soan2-ki2 cho7-se3-am3-hoe7 Iunn5-siok-kun lau7-pe7 hian7-sin tann2-khi3
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
ji7-chap8-ho7 Bin5-chin3-tong2 Sin-pak-chhi7-tiunn2 hau7-soan2-jin5 Chhoa3-eng-bun5 soan2-ki2-cho7-se3 am3-hoe7，
Iunn5-siok-kun e5 lau7-pe7 hian7-sin ti7-au7-tai5，
Chhoa3-eng-bun5 oan5-a7-chhoah-chit8-e7，
chin7-koan2 Iunn5-siok-kun lau7-pe7 bo5 chhin-chhui3-kong2 thiann7 Chhoa3-eng-bun5，
chhin-chu7 kau3-tiunn5 oan5-a7-hou7 Chhoa3-eng-bun5 tin7-iann5 su7-khi3 tai7-chin2。
Chhoa3-eng-bun5 chhin-chu7 khia7-chiunn7 soan-thoan5-chhia hiong3 bin5-chiong3 giu2-phio3，
soan-thoan5-chhia cha2-khi2 chau2-phian3 Sam-kiap-tin3 e5 toa7-koe-sio2-hang7-a2，
ian5-lou7 u7-lang5 bu2-lang7 ki5-a2 tann2-khi3，
u7-lang5 chu7-pi7 phau3-a2 nau7-jiat8 giann5-chih，

Chu5-che3-kong-tek-hoe7 khai-liau2 chap8-kui2-ek，
be2-tioh8 Toa7-ou5-kong-hng5 po2-hou7-khu chap8-lak8 kong-kheng2 thou2-te7，

khoan5-po2-thoan5-the2 、 hak8-chia2 kap sann-chap8-kui2-ui7 bin5-chiong3，
ti7 Tai5-pak-chhi7-cheng3-hu2 thau5-cheng5 khong3-gi7 Chu5-che3 e5 khai-hoat-an3。

ui7-ti7 Tai5-pak-chhi7 Toa7-ou5-kong-hng5 pinn-a2-e5 po2-hou7-khu，

po2-iok8 u7-seng5-ko2 la7-poe lai5-Tai5-oan5 chhong3-sin-koan5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-oan5-e5 la7-poe po2-iok8-kang-chok u7-seng5-ko2，
kin-ni5 i2-keng chhiau-koe3 chit8-chheng chit8-pah-chiah e5 la7-poe，

tak8-ni5 chiap-kin7 kau2-goeh8-boe2，

chun2-pi7 ngia5-chih chhian-li2-thiau5-thiau5 lai5-Tai5-oan5 koe3-tang-e5 la7-poe，
lai5-chu7 hng7-tau-e5 kiau-kheh to-ti7-chia hioh-hennh，
Tai5-lam5-koan7-cheng3-hu2 tek8-piat8 siat-lip8-liau2 siunn2-chiau2-pinn5。
tui3 kau2-goeh8 ji7-chap8-lak8-ho7 te7-it-chiah la7-poe po3-to3，

thoan5-thong2 「 chhun-a2-hoe 」 goa7-kok-lang5 choan-kang siu-chong5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
cha2-ki5 hun-ian3 hi2-kheng3-siong7 pan7-hi2-su7 e5 jin5-ke ，
hu7-lu2 thau5-teng2 chhah-tioh8 thau5-chhah 「 chhun-a2-hoe 」，
in-ui7 che3-chok hounn5-si5-hui3-kang chit-ku2 chin-chio2-lang5-cho3 ，

iau2-u7 goa7-kok-kang choan-kang chau2-lai5 be2-khi3 siu-chong5 。

oan5-a7-hou7 ta-ke liau2-kai2 liu2-teng e5 ho2-chhu3 。
si3-e5 hak8-seng ti7-ke-thau5 hoat-thoan5-toann ，
m7-si7-beh siau-siu5 san2-phin2 ，

tau3-te2 goan5-bok8-e5 ka-khu7 kai-an-choann2 hun-pian7 ？

Tiong-kok chinn5 poh8-khi3 ka-sok bin5-chiong3 seng-oah8 kan-lan5

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7

tai7-hak8-seng ui7-tioh8-chinn5 be7-bah cho3 ba5-a2 ，
kim-chinn5-chi3-siang7 e5 koan-liam7 chin-e5 hou7-lang5-iu-sim ！
Tho5-hng5-koan7 Tiong-lek8 keng2-hong choh8-jit8 pho3-hek8-liau2 chit8-e5 ba5-a2-keng ，
i2 senn3-Tann5 chu2-hiam5 cho3-thau5-e5 ki5-ha7 ba5-a2，

chia-e5 tai7-hak8-seng soah tai7-gian5-put-chhan5 ，
ka-ki7 bo5-thau-bo5-chhiunn2 kho3-lo5-lek8 than3-chinn5 iu2-ho5-put-kho2 ，
chit-khoan2 oai-chhoah8-e5 ke3-tat8-koan ，
hou7-lang5 chit-gi5 kau3-iok8 tau3-te2 ka3-siann2-mih 。

ki5-tiong iau2-chio2-khoeh gian2-kiu3-seng ，

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Ke-lang5-chhi7 e5 chhi7-lip8-iu5-eng2-ti5 ，
choe3-kin7 chiah-khai peh-pah-ban7 oan5-seng5 pou2-thak ，
bo5-siunn7-kau3 chun2-pi7 khai-hong3 khe2-iong7-si5 ，
soah-hoat-hian7 iu5-eng2-ti5 chhut-hian7 giam5-tiong7 lau7-chui2-e5 cheng5-hong2 ，
hou7-lang5-chit-gi5 the2-iok8-koan2 e5 pou2-thak si7 cho3-piau2-bian7 kang-hu ，
chui2-bo5-theng5-e5 tui3 iu5-eng2-ti5 pinn-a2 chui2-ha7 po-le5-thang lau7-chhut-lai5，
chit8-hun-cheng to-lau7-chhut poann3-thang2-chui2 e5 liang7 。
khai-liau2 peh-pah-ban7 ，
keng2-jian5 chi2-si7 cheng2-siu-liau2 goa7-chhiunn5 ham thian-pong5 ，
iu5-eng2-ti5 u7-bun7-te5 soah-bo5-hoat-hian7 ，
chit-ma2 iu5-eng2-ti5 e5 chui2 pit-su thiu-tiau7 ，
iu5-eng2-ti5 goan5-tiann7 chap8-li7-goeh8 beh-khai-hong3 ，
khiong2-kiann ai3-koh hong-pi3 lak8-ko3-goeh8 ，
chi3-i5 tui-ka-e5 u7-soan3 ，
chi2-ho2 cho3-che sng3-kau3 lap8-soe3-lang5 e5 thau5-teng2 。
ho5-chhoan hong-poe-soa senn-thai3-kang-hoat kiam2 thou5-hun2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
kin-ni5 tang-pak-kui3-hong the5-cha2 po3-to3 ，
ui7-tioh8 kai2-koat ak-chak-e5 hong-poe-soa bun7-te5 ，
Chui2-li7-su2 Te7-sann-ho5-chhoan-kiok8 lian5-siok8 nng7-ni5 ，
tau5-jip8 chit8-chheng-sann-pah-ban7 e5 keng-hui3 ，
un7-iong7 chah8-hong kap teng7-soa e5 khai3-liam7 ，
ti7 Tai7-an-khe 、 Tai7-kah-khe i2-kip8 Ou-khe ，
chhi3-pan7 chong-hap8-seng3 senn-thai3-kang-hoat ，
Tai5-tiong-koan7 Tai7-an-khe chhut-hai2-khau2 e5 hong-lek8-hoat-tian7 ，
kiong5-keng3 hong-se3-ha7 bo5-theng5-choan2-tong7 ，
ho5-chhng5-teng2 i2-keng khoann3-be7-chhut hong-poe-soa e5 hian7-siong7 ，
chit-nng7-ni5 Chui2-li7-su2 Te7-sann-ho5-chhoan-kiok8 chiu7-te7-chhu2-chai5 ，
li7-iong7 te7-heng5 ti7 Tai7-an-khe ho5-chhng5-teng2 khui-ou2 sio2-chui2-to7 ，
hou7-tit sit8-but8 kham3 goan5-iu2-e5 phu5-lun3 ，
ho5-chhng5-teng2 chia-e5 lek8-sek-e5 sin-lam3-a2-te7 ，
toa7-toa7-kang3-ke7 thou5-hun2 bun7-te5 ，
khong-khi3-tiong phu5-koan5 iu3-liap8-a2 kang3-ke7 chiok-choe7 ，
koe3-khi3 kng-ko7-ko7 kui-phiann2-e5 ho5-chhoan-te7 ，
chit-ma2 chiann5-cho3 sin-e5 senn-thai3-tek8-khu ，
oan5-a7-hou7 chiu-pinn-e5 chng-thau5 bian2-i5 hong-poe-soa e5 khun3-jiau2 。
li2-lai5-chin-ho2 goa2-chin-ku2 bo5-kong2 Tai5-gi2 ah
Chu7-iu5-si5-po3 ki3-chia2 Ngo5-ui5-kiong Chiong-hoa3-po3-to7
Tai5-oan5-ki-tok-tiunn2-lo2-kau3-hoe7 Chiong-hoa3-ki-tok-kau3-penn7-inn7 eng5-u7-inn7-tiunn2 Lan5-tai7-pit8 ，
chu7-se3-han3 khoann3-tioh8 pe7-bu2 hoat-hong3 gu5-ni-hun2 hou7 kan-khou2-ka-teng5 ，
tui3 kan-khou2-lang5 bian2-chinn5 khoann3-penn7，
i oan-na2-hoat-goan7 oh8-i-hak8 ，
chhu2-tit Eng-kok Lun5-tun-tai7-hak8 i-hak8-phok-su7 liau2-au7 ，
chu7-chiong5 it-kiu2-gou7-ji7-ni5 khai-si2 ，
tam-jim7 Chiong-hoa3-ki-tok-kau3-penn7-inn7 inn7-tiunn2 ji7-chap8-peh-ni5 ，
si7 Tai5-oan5 nau2-sin5-keng-i-hak8 e5 koan5-ui ，
it-tit8-kau3 it-kiu2-pat-khong3-ni5 chiah-thoe3-hiu tng2-khi3 Eng-kok ，
ki7-choat8 Chiong-hoa3-ki-tok-kau3-penn7-inn7 hoat-hong3-e5 thoe3-hiu-kim ，
in-ui7 Eng-kok u7 lau7-lang5-ni5-kim ，
i-piáu-sī kau3-giah8 i eng7 ah 。
Lan5-tai7-pit8 sann-goeh8 chhe-ji7 ti7 Eng-kok ，
in-ui7 to-tiong7 khi3-koan-kham5-kheh8 koe3-ong2 siau-sit thoan5-hoe5 Chiong-Ki i2-au7，
Chiong-ki-e5-lang5 siang-tong ai-tong7 。
Chiong-hoa3-ki-tok-kau3-penn7-inn7 i-liau5-the2-he7 e5 Oan5-seng-penn7-inn7 inn7-tiunn2 Tan5-siu2-tong3 piau2-si7 ，
ku7-ni5 i chian5-ong2 Lun5-tun tham3-si7 ，
Lan5-tai7-pit8 chin-hoann-hi2-e5 kong2 ：
「li2-lai5-chin-ho2 ， goa2-chin-ku2 bo5-kong2 Tai5-gi2 ah ！ 」
Chiong-hoa3-ki-tok-kau3-penn7-inn7 hu3-inn7-tiunn2 Chiu-hian5-chiong kong2 ，
ku7-ni5 kau2-goeh8 Lan5-tai7-pit8 in-ui7 poah8-to2 toa3-inn7 khui-to ti7-liau5 ，
chap8-goeh8 in kau3 Eng-kok tham3-si7 ，
Lan5-tai7-pit8 mng5-khau2 khoa3-tioh8 「 Lan5-u2 FORMOSA 」 mng5-pai5 ，
in sun5-bun7 tai3-u7 lau7-lang5-chhi-tai e5 Lan5-tai7-pit8 ，
siunn7-beh sia2-phoe hou7-siann2 ，
i sia2-loh8 「 Tai5-oan5 」 nng7-ji7 ，
oan-na2-chiann5-choe3 siang7-boe2-e5 ji7-jiah 。
Lan5-tai7-pit8 nia2-iunn2-liau2 sann-mia5 Eng-kok-chek8 kiann2-ji5 ，
i-e5 kiann2-ji5 thau3-koe3 tian7-oe7 hiong3 Chiu-hian5-chiong piau2-si7 ，
Lan5-tai7-pit8 mi5-liu5-tong-si5 ，
kong2-liau2 chit8-koa2-a2 i-hou7-jin5-oan5 thiann-bo5-e5-oe7 ，
bat Tai5-gi2-e5 toa7-hau7-senn chit8-thiann chiah-chai-iann2 ，
Lan5-tai7-pit8 i eng7 Tai5-gi2 kong2-tioh8 hoai5-liam7 koe3-sin-e5 khan-chhiu2 ，
koa3-liam7 Tai5-oan5-e5 peng5-iu2 ，
iau2-hoan2-hok8-kong2 ： 「 ai3-chiau3-kou3 kan-khou2-lang5 。 」
Lan5-tai7-pit8 bat-ti7 it-kiu2-kiu2-liok8-ni5 eng5-hek8 i-liau5-hong7-hian3-chiang2 ，
iau2-u7 cheng5-chong2-thong2 Li2-teng-hui pan-chan7 Chi2-sek Toa7-siu7-keng2-chhinn-hun-chiong 。

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Biau5-lek8-koan7 ji7-chap8-sann-ho7 u7-chit8-ui7 siau3-lian5-lu2-chu2 ，
khioh-tioh8 chap8-ban7-kho3 sang3-kau3 keng2-chhat-kiok8 ，
kam2-tong7 chiok-choe7 Tai5-tiong 、 Biau5-lek8 e5 khi3-giap8-chu2 ，
goan7-i3 the5-kiong chiu7-giap8-ki-hoe7 hou7-i 。
khioh-tioh8-chinn5 choan5-sou3-hong7-hoan5 sian7-iu2-sian7-po3 ，
thai7-giap8-tiong e5 Li2-nga2-bun5 ，
ma2-siang7 chiap-tioh8 sann-keng kong-si thong-ti i chun2-pi7 bin7-chhi3 。
Li2-nga2-bun5 sui-jian5 hak8-lek8 bo5-koan5 m7-koh bo5-tham-sim ，
pau-koat Tai5-tiong 、 Sin-tek kap Biau5-lek8 e5 kong-koan-heng5-siau kong-si ，
thau5-ke khoann3-kah-i3 i-e5 seng5-sit8 chhiunn2-leh-ai3 ，
long2-u7 i3-goan7 hou7-i kang-chok 。

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
it-goeh8 to-si7 cheng5-chong2-thong2 Li2-teng-hui kau2-chap8-hoe3 toa7-siu7 ah ，
ji7-chap8-lak8-ho7 am3-si5 Li2-teng-hui-hak8-hau7 hau7-iu2-hoe7 choan-kang pang i loan2-siu7 ，
iau2-tiann7-liau2 sann-chan3 toa7-ke-nng7-ko kheng3-chiok ，
lau7-si7-toa7 pi7-lang7-kah chhiau-hoann-hi2 ，
it-tit8-kong2 ka-ki7 lang5-lau7-sim-bo5-lau7 ，
A-hui-peh kin-ni5 kau2-chap8-hoe3 ah ，

hou7 lau7-si7-toa7 chhio3-kah chhui3-a2-lih8-sai-sai ，
a-hui-peh kou2-khiat8-e5 hoat-gian5 ，
lang7-kah kheng3-seng-hoe7 hian7-tiunn5-e5 lai5-pin chhio3-kah-lau7-chhai-chhai ，
lang5-lau7 sim-bo5-lau7 e5 A-hui-peh ，
siau3-lian5-lang5 chit-ma2 siang7-si5-kiann5 e5 sia7-kun5-bang7-cham7 ，
i oan5-a7 chin-jiat8-phut-phut hak8-sip8 liau2-kai2 。

beh-oa2 lak8-chap8-ji7-ban7-lang5 chi-chhi5，
hou7 Loa7-chheng-tek teng-siang7 sin-cheng3-ti7 ko-hong ，

tui3-cheng3-ha7-ioh8 tiau5-li2-ho2 Tai5-lam5 the2-chit ki-chhou2 ，

hou7 toa7-Tai5-lam5 chiann5-cho3 lek8-leng5-siann5-chhi7 ，

Jun7-thai3 thun-kou3 Lam5-san-jin5-siu7 Phoan-beng7-an chit-gi5 u7-loe7-cheng5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Lam5-san-jin5-siu7 ji7-tou7 phiau-siu5-an3 tit-beh kiat-hiau2 ，
goa7-thoan5 Jun7-thai3-chip8-thoan5 e5 chhut-soann3 ki-hoe7 siang7-koan5 ，
lip8-hoat-ui2-oan5 Phoan-beng7-an thiau3-chhut-lai5 chit-gi5 u7-loe7-cheng5 ，
jim7-ui5 Jun7-thai3-chip8-thoan5 e5 tai3-khoan2 koe3-koan5 ，
chu-san2 ham hu7-che3 bo5-hu5-hap8 pi-le7-goan5-chek 。
Lam5-san-jin5-siu7 bok8-cheng5 hou-siann siang7-koan5-e5 be2-chu2 ，
thoan5-chhut-si7 Jun7-thai3-chip8-thoan5 kap Po2-seng5-kang-giap8 chou2-seng5-e5 Jun7-seng5-kong-si ，
beh-eng7 sann-chap8-ek bi2-kim e5 ke3-siau3 seng5-chiap Lam5-san-jin5-siu7 e5 kou2-koan5 ，
put-ko3 ji7-chap8-chhit-ho7 Phoan-beng7-an lip8-ui2 koh-chai3 phok8-liau7 ，
chu-liau7 hian2-si7 Jun7-thai3-chip8-thoan5 ki5-ha7 che3-tai5-ko-tiok8 ，
hiau-gi5 kui-e5 thun-kou3-an3 kin-pun2-si7 be2-khang-be7-khang 。
Jun7-seng5-kong-si sit8-kau3 chu-pun2-giah8 kan-ta-u7 gou7-pah-ban7 ，
e7-thang pio-tit Lam5-san-jin5-siu7 e5 koe3-teng5 chhiong-boan2 ou-siunn-chok-giap8 ，

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
thinn-khi3 lu2-lai5-lu2-leng2 ，
u7-lang5 sip8-koan3 noa7-ti7 mou5-than2-lai7 khoann3-tian7-si7 ，
chi2-si7 tak8-ke soan2-kou3 mou5-than2 e5 si5-chun7 ，
ai3-chu3-i3 teng2-chin-khoann3 san2-phin2 phiau-chhiam ，
kin-ki3 Siau-ki-hoe7 thiu-cha soann3-be7 mou5-than2 ，
kiat-ko2 hoat-hian7 choan5-pou7 phiau-si7 bo5-chheng-chho2 ，
ki5-tiong iau2-u7 nng7-kiann7 seng5-hun kap phiau-si7 bo5-hu5-hap8 ，
chi2-si7 beh-an2-choann2 be2-tioh8 an-choan5 koh po2-loan2-e5 mou5-than2 ，
chit-ma7-si7 ai3-u7 「 phiat-pou7 」 ，
Siau-ki-hoe7 thiu-cha-e5 chap8-ji7-kiann7 soann3-be7 mou5-than2，
choan5-pou7 phiau-si7 bo5-oan5-choan5 ，
u7 nng7-kiann7 beng5-beng5-si7 chu7-chi2-chhiam-ui5 ，
soah-tiau5-kang sia2-tioh8 a7-khu2-lih chhai2-liau7 che3-cho7 ，
hut-si7 siau-hui3-chia2 e5 koan5-ek 。
Siau-ki-hoe7 iau-kiu5 siang-koan-tan-ui7 ka-kiong5 kam3-tok chhiunn2-siong ，
ma7-the5-chhenn2 bin5-chiong3 ai3-iang2-seng5 sip8-koan3 ，
ki7-choat8 kou3-be2 ki3-chai3 bo5-chheng-chho2 e5 san2-phin2 。
liok8-kun tek8-chiong2-peng cheng-pou2-siong2 Tai5-tiong kong-thiann-hoe7 jiat8-liat8
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
chiam-tui3 liok8-kun te7-it-tek8-chiong2-peng sin-hong7 e5 pou2-siong2 ，
lip8-ui2 Chhoa3-tong5-eng5 the5-chhut tek8-piat8 tiau5-le7 chhau2-an3 ，
i2-keng hek8-tit chhiau-koe3 si3-chap8-ui7 lip8-ui2 lian5-su7 ，
ui7-tioh8-the3 gou7-chap8-lak8-ban7-lang5 han7-oe7 koan5-ek ，
kong-thiann-hoe7 ti7 chap8-ji7-goeh8 ji7-chap8-chhit-ho7 lai5-kau3 Tai5-tiong-chhi7 ，
chiann5-che7 the3-ngou2-peng long2 jiat8-cheng5-chham-u2 ，
chhin-chu7 khia7-chhut-lai5 ui7-ka-ki7 cheng-chhu2 pou2-siong2 koan5-ek 。
oah8-tong7-hoe7-tiunn5 jin5-tiau5 choe7-kau3 boan2-chhut-lai5 ，
Tai5-tiong-te7-khu chia-e5 liok8-kun te7-it-tek8-chiong2 the3-ngou2-peng ，
lian5-su7 iau-kiu5 Lip8-hoat-inn7 chin7-sok thong-koe3 liok8-it-tek8 chhau2-an3 ，
tng-chhoe Kok-hong5-pou7 kan-ta-eng7 heng5-cheng3-beng7-leng7 ，
hou7 gou7-chap8-lak8-ban7-lang5 ke-cho3-liau2 chit8-ni5-peng i2-keng ui5-hoat ，
lip8-hoat-ui2-oan5 Chhoa3-tong5-eng5 ki2-pan7 chit-tiunn5 kong-thiann-hoe7 ，
the3-ngou2-peng kap bin5-chiong3 ma7 kang5-khoan2-si7 hun-hun-hiang2-eng3 ，

na7-chun2 bo5-tit-tioh8 boan2-i3 hoe5-eng3 beh-kiann5-chiunn7 ke-thau5 。
Bi2-long5-tin3-kong-sou2 khioh-chinn5-iu2-to7 eng5-i5 it tiam2-ji7-ek
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
chan-keng chek-khiam3 oan5-kang si3-kou3-goeh8 sin-sui2 ，
hu7-che3 chiunn7-ek-e5 Ko-hiong5-koan7 Bi2-long5-tin3-kong-sou2 ，
ti7 koan7-chhi7-hap8-peng3 liau2-au7 ，
kau-liau2 chit8-tiunn kong-eng5-e5 chai5-cheng3 seng5-chek-toann ，
keng-koe3 khai-goan5-chiat-liu5 chhit-ni5-goa7 ，
m7-na7 heng5-chheng-liau2 hu7-che3 ，
iau2-u7 eng5-i5 chit8-ek nng7-chheng-goa7-ban7 kiau2-khou3 ，
in-si7 an2-choann2 pan7-kau3-e5 ？
Bi2-long5-tin3-kong-sou2 e5 iann2-in3-choa2 ，
su2-iong7-e5 si7 chai3-seng-choann2 ，
siang-bin7 iong7-kau3 be7-iong7-tit chiah-e7 hoe5-siu ，
to-lian5-tong5 pian7-sou2 phiau-gi2 ma7 the5-chhenn2 chui2-leng5-thau5 khui-chit8-poann3 to-ho2 ，

hou7 Bi2-long5-tin3-kong-sou2 kau-liau2 sui2-khui3-e5 seng5-chek-toann 。
Tai5-tiong-chhi7 ti7-an-chha ok-soah ke-teng2 phut bah-phio3
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-tiong-chhi7 ji7-chap8-peh-ho7 koh-chai3 thoan5-chhut jit8-si5 chheng3-hiang2 ，
nng7-mia5 ok-soah chhiong-jip8 chit8-keng bah-phin2 leng2-tong3-chhiunn2 ，
kiong5-heng5-chiang thau5-ke lou2 chiunn7-chhia ，
pi7-hai7-jin5 it-to2 kap hiam5-hoan7 giu2-phah ，
nng7-lang5 chit8-lou7 tui3 chhia-lai7 phah-kau3 chhia-goa7 ，
pang2-hui2 eng7 Jip8-pun2-bu2-su7 cham7-thau5 heng5-heng5 chu-se3 ，
ke-teng2 phut-siong pi7-hai7-jin5 thau5-khak ，
chit8-pinn bak8-kek-e5 bin5-chiong3 kiann-kau3 kiong5-beh phoa3-tann2 ，
toa7-hiu Tai5-tiong chit-ma2-si7 bo5-cheng3-hu2 chong7-thai3 m7 ？
pi7-hai7-jin5 hu7-siong pe5-chhut chhia-goa7 toa7-siann-hoah-kiu3-lang5 ，
senn3-Ng5 hiam5-hoan7 bo5-pang3-i-soah iau2-loh8-chhia tui-sat ，

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
kun-hong ti7 Tai5-lam5 Chiang-kun pe2-tiunn5 chin3-heng5 sit8-toann5 sia7-kek-hun3-lian7 ，
bo5-siunn7-tioh8 eng-kai ong2-chiann3-chian5-hong sia7-kek-e5 phau3-toann5 ，
phian-liau2 hong-hiang3 poann5-koe3 soann-thau5 ，

gin5-hoat-chok8 khia7-ke kiong5-tiau7 seng-oah8-ki-leng5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
toe3-tioh hian7-tai7 sia7-hoe7-e5 ko-leng5-hoa3 ，
gin5-hoat-chok8 jit8-siong5 seng-oah8-siang7 e5 sou2-su ，
oan-na2-lu2-lai5-lu2 siu7-tioh8 khoann3-tang7 ，
in-chhu2 giap8-chia2 to-eng7 gin5-hoat-chok8 cho3 be2-chhu3 tui3-siong7 ，

m7-kuh ma7 long2-gu7-siang7 giap8-chek koan-thau5 bun7-te5 ，
Keng-che3-pou7 tiong-sio2-khi3-giap8-chhu3 hu2-to7 giap8-chia2 ，
chioh-tioh bang7-lou7-heng5-siau hou7 hiu-eng5-san2-giap8 koh-seng-kip ，

tau5-jip8 chu-kim khui ka-pi-thiann ham bin5-siok ，

hau7-hng5 thoan5-chhut put-tong3-koan2-ka3 ，

u7 ka-tiunn2 tau5-oe7 hak8-hau7 senn3-Ng5 hun3-to7-chu2-jim7 ，
su2-iong7 「 lang5-bin7 kau2-nau2-koai3 」 ，
heng5-iong5 kau-ong2-tiong e5 lam5-li2 tong5-hak8 ，
iau3-chhu2-hoat8 hak8-seng ti7 hau7-mng5-khau2 cho3 pa3-io-kian7-sin ，
kau3-iok8-tan-ui7 i2-keng chiam-tui3 tau5-oe7 loe7-iong5 liau2-kai2 。
ki5-sit8 chit-chit8-keng kok-tiong ，
seng-hak8-lut8 siang-tong be7-bai2，

u7 hak8-seng in-ui7 ui5-ki2 ，
pi7-chhu2-hoat8 ti7 lang5-lai5-lang5-khi3 e5 hau7-mng5-khau2 pa3-io-kian7-sin 。
kin-ki3 ka-tiunn2-e5 kong2-hoat ，
chhu2-hoat8 hak8-seng-e5 si7 senn3-Ng5 hun3-to7-chu2-jim7 。
cha-pou-hak8-seng thau5-mou bo5 thi3-cho3 penn5-thau5-a2 ，

si7 lang5-bin7 kau2-thau5-nau2 e5 「 lang5-bin7 kau2-nau2-koai3 」 。

cheng-chhu2 Bi2-kok-i5-bin5 phoe3-giah8 seng5-kong moa2 ji7-chap8-kau2-chiu-ni5

ti7 it-kiu2-chhit-kiu2-ni5 Bi2-kok kap Tai5-oan5-cheng3-hu2 toan7-kau-au7 ，

ku7-ni5 chap8-it-goeh8-te2 ，
chhoan-su7-pou7 hoat-ham5 hou7 the3-hiu kong-kau3-jin5-oan5 ，

Li2-teng-hui siu7-ian3 phoann7-chhiu2-le2 「 phe-Ma2 」 kong-tiap8
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
cheng5-chong2-thong2 Li2-teng-hui sann-ho7 am3-si5 koe3 kau2-chap8-hòe toa7-siu7 ，
goa7-kai3 long2 chu3-chiau-ti7 Li2-cheng5-chong2-thong2 ham Song3-chho2-gu5 e5 hou7-tong7 ，
in-ui7 nng7-lang5 koe3-khi3 ia7-bat cheng5-tong5-hu7-chu2 ，
au7-lai5 koh-in-ui7 tong3-seng2 chu7-an2-ne pinn3-bin7 ，
chit-tiunn5 siu7-ian3 e5 phoann7-chhiu2-le2 ，
si7 Li2-teng-hui cheng5-chong2-thong2 chiap-siu7 tian7-si7 choan-hong2-e5 「 phe-Ma2 」 kong-tiap8 ，
i2-cha2 pou7-siok8 ham choan5-tiunn5 pin-kheh hiang3 Li2-cheng5-chong2-thong2 ti3-i3 ，
Chhin-bin5-tong2 chu2-sek8 Song3-chho2-gu5 ma7-lai5 pho3-peng ，
Khou2-chui2-tek sun7-se3 ai3-beh-the3 nng7-lang5 giu2-kin7 koan-he7 ，
Li2-teng-hui 、 Song3-chho2-gu5 bok8-cheng5-si7 khia7-ti7 kang7-tin7-soann3 ，
long2-tui3 Ma2-eng-kiu2 chip-cheng3 put-boan2 ，
siu7-ian3 phoann7-chhiu2-le2 sang3-e5 iau3-si7 「 phe-Ma2 」 kong-tiap8 ，
loe7-iong5 si7 phe-pheng5 Ma2-eng-kiu2 ，
ti7 liong2-gan7-cheng3-chhek ka7 Tai5-oan5 khi3-chu2-koan5-hoa3 ，
i2-kip8 piau2-tat8 hoan2-tui3 ECFA cheng3-chhek tau3-te2 ，
chit-tiunn5 siu7-ian3 ma7-u7 jiu5-cheng5-e5 chit8-bin7 ，
giam5-siok-e5 Li2-cheng5-chong2-thong2 lan5-tit-tui3 hu-jin5 Chan-bun5-hui7 kong2 goa2-ai3-li2 。
Cho2-iann5 ku7-seng5 seng5-hong5 chhut-sun5 ngia5-chhiann2 sian-hong-koann
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
i2-keng chhiau-koe3 sann-pah-ni5 lek8-su2-e5 Cho2-iann5 ku7-seng5 seng5-hong5-bio7 ，
si3-ho7 khai-si2 sann-lian5-soa3 lak8-kang ，
beh ki2-heng5 sann-ni5 chit8-pai2-e5 seh8-keng2-chhut-sun5，
kin-ni5 thau3-koe3 poah8-poe ，
si7 Cho2-iann5 Lai7-ui5 chheng-hun5-kiong e5 Po2-seng-tai7-te3 tam-jim7 sian-hong-koann ，
bio7-hong jin5-oan5 ti7 it-ho7 choan-kang chian5-ong2 ngia5-chhiann2 ，
ma7 tai7-piau2 seng5-hong5-ia5 chhut-sun5 tit-beh thian2-khui 。

bio7-hong tai7-piau2 poah8-poe liau2-au7 ，

Bin5-si7 sin-bun5 po3-to7

koan3-ga2-suh kek-khi3-phok8 koe3-ban7 ke-a2 chiann5 「 sio-ke 」
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7

teng2-jit8 soah-i3-goa7 hoat-seng toa7-hoe2 ，
goan5-in-si7 in-ui7 ga2-suh-giap8-chia2 ，

kam2-liam7 kong3-hian3-che7 goa7-chek8 thoan5-kau2-su7 tek8-tian2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
ui7-tioh8 kam2-liam7 cha2-ki5 goa7-kok-chek8 e5 thoan5-kau2-su7 ，

ke3-siau3 tai7-iok khi2-liau2 it-tiam2-peh-poe7 。
kok-che3 chhi7-tiunn5-siang7 gin5 e5 khi2-hok chhiau-koe3 ng5-kim ，
chiann5-cho3 tau5-chu phiah-hiam2-e5 kang-khu7 。

Ke-lang5 hoat-seng pe7-bo2 chu7-sat pi-kiok8 hou7-lang5-phinn7-thau5-sng ，
sia7-hok-tan-ui7 kong2 ku7-lek8-ni5-cheng5 ni5-koan beh-oa2 ，

tiong-ke7-siu-jip8-hou7 ah-si7 te2-ki5 kiu3-chou7-kim ，

hi-bang7-ti7 ni5-boe2-han5-tong e5 siang7-boe2 ，
chhiong-soann3-chhut chit8-pho giap8-chek ，
hou7 kin-ni5-e5 ni5-boe2-chiong2-kim e7-sai2 ke-thah8-ke3 。

O3-chiu toa7-chui2 siong-hai7 thiok-bok8-giap8 gu5-ke3 pio-khi2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
siu7-tioh8 O3-chiu cho3-toa7-chui2 eng2-hiang2 ，
ta-ke tong-tong-chiah8-e5 O3-chiu gu5-bah ke3-siau3 ，
ma7-soa3-loh8 ngiauh8-ngiauh8-tang7 ！
kap ku7-ni5 sio-pi2 ，
O3-chiu gu5-bah ke3-siau3 i2-keng kui3-liau2 nng7-siann5 cho2-iu7 ，
siu7-tioh8 tong-te7 cho3-toa7-chui2 e5 eng2-hiang2 ，
chhi7-tiunn5-e5 O3-chiu gu5-bah i2-keng tiam7-tiam7-a2 khi2-ke3-ah ，
O3-chiu gu5-bah moe2-kong-kin si3-pah-kho3 ，
pi2 ku7-ni5 tong5-ki5 sann-pah sann-chap8-kho3 tiong3-koainn5 nng7-siann5-goa7 ，
O3-chiu gu5-bah-e5 chin3-khau2-liang7 i2-keng pi7-pek kiam2-liang7 pah-hun-chi-gou7 ，

lu2-chiap-kin7 koe3-ni5 ke3-siau3 iau2-beh koh-khi2 。
ti5-liau2 gu5-bah khi2-ke3 chi-goa7 ，
in-ui7 O3-chiu si7 choan5-kiu5 te7-si3-toa7 beh8-a2 chhut-khau2-kok ，
bi7-lai5 beh8-a2 、 ian3-beh8-a2 、

su3-khun3-tai7-khoan2 kiam2-chio2 lo5-kang-thoan5-the2 phoe-pheng5 bo5-kou3 lo5-kang
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
lo5-kang su3-khun3-tai7-khoan2 chi2-chhun siang7-boe2-chit8-kang ，
koe3-ni5 su-iau3 chu-kim-e5 lo5-kang peng5-iu2 ai3-pa2-ak si5-kan ，

kin-pun2 chioh-be7-tioh8-chinn5 ，

hou7 i ap-lek8 khah-toa7-ah 。
chi2-si7 tai7-khoan2-e5 lai5-goan5 si7 lo5-kang-e5 the3-hiu-ki-kim ，
soah-ai3 siu-li7-sek kap ui5-iok-kim ，

Tiong-kok ke2-bak8-chiu-mng5 mou7-chhiong Han5-kok-hoe3 khiong2 siong-gan2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
chit-ma2-e5 li2-seng3 chin-ai3 koa3 ke2-bak8-chiu-mng5 ，
m7-kuh-ai3 chu3-i3-ah ！
Ka-gi7-chhi7 tiau-cha-cham7 cha-hek8 put-siau3-giap8-chia2 siap8-hiam5 ，
ka7 Tiong-kok-che3 e5 ke2-bak8-chiu-mng5 ke2-mou7-cho3 Han5-kok-hoe3，
be2-hou7 bi2-iong5-inn7 kap lian5-so2-bi2-chng-tiam3 ，
m7-koh soah-in-ui7 phin2-chit-chha ，
tu2-tioh8 siau-hui3-chia2 that-pok8 。
chit-phe mou7-chhiong Han5-kok-hoe3 e5 Tiong-kok-che3-cho7 ke2-bak8-chiu-mng5 ，
i2-keng liu5-thong tiong-lam5-pou7 e5 bi2-chng-tiam3 ，
eng7 chit8-tui3 chap8-ji7-kho3 hoan3-be7 ，
pi2-khi2 cheng3-thong2 Han5-kok-hoe3 sioh8-liau2 gou7-poe7 ，
i-su piau2-si7 siau-hui3-chia2 na7-chun2 siau2-phi2-gian2 ，
phoe3-koa3 loat8-chit-e5 ke2-bak8-chiu-mng5 ，

na7-bo5 ui7-tioh8 seng2-chinn5 soah siong-liau2 siang-gan2 。
thau-chhai2 teng2-kip gu5-chiang-kou chhi7-ke3 chhin-chhiunn7 ng5-kim
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
chap8-si3-ho7 thau3-cha2 chit8-tiam2 ，
Tai5-tang som-lim5-keng2-chhat-tui7 ti7 Li7-ka-lim5-to7 cha-hek8 gou7-mia5 hiam5-hoan7 ，
chiann3-leh thau-chhai2 ke3-tat8-kui3-kui3 e5 gu5-chiang-kou ，
keng2-hong tong-tiunn5 cha-hek8 si3-chap8-it-tiam2-peh-niu2 e5 gu5-chiang-kou ，

thong-se3-kai3 kan-na7 Tai5-oan5 u7 gu5-chiunn-chhiu7 ，

toh-teng2 chit-lok-a2 e5 gu5-chiunn-chhiu7 ，
ka-khi2-lai5 chhi7-ke3 beh-oa2 pah-ban7 。
tok8-phai3 pan7-boe2-ge5 Lip8-hoat-inn7 goa7-bin7 chiah8-chu7-chou7-chhan
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
chit-chun7 tak8-e5 toa7-khi3-giap8 long2-khai-si2 pan7-boe2-ge5 ，
chap8-lak8-ho7 am3-si5 u7-chit8-tiunn5 boe2-ge5 chiok-tek8-piat8 ，
ti7 chiah-ni2-leng2 e5 thinn-khi3 ，
soah-soan2-ti7 Lip8-hoat-inn7 goa7-bin7 chiah8-chu7-chou7-chhan ，
goan5-lai5 Tai5-oan5 pun2-thou2-sia7-thoan5 ho7-tiau3 chi-chhi5-chia2 ，
lai5-chia kap tok8-phai3-toa7-lo2 Su2-beng5 chiah8-boe2-ge5 ，
ma7-hou7 ti7 Lip8-hoat-inn7 cheng7-cho7 khong3-gi7-e5 Kong-tau5-hou7-tai5-oan5-lian5-beng5 ，
khah-che7-e5 chi-chhi5 kap kou2-le7 ，
phiau-lok-tioh8 bang-bang-hou7 thinn-khi3 leng2-kau3 tong3-be7-tiau5 ，
m7-koh ti7 Lip8-hoat-inn7 goa7-bin7 ，
soah-u7 chit8-tin7-lang5 pai5-tui7 chiah8-chu7-chou7-chhan ，
in-si7 beh-lai5 kap Tok8-tai5-hoe7 chhong3-pan7-jin5 Su2-beng5 chiah8-boe2-ge5 ，
ma7-hou7 ti7 Lip8-hoat-inn7 cheng7-cho7 peh-pah-chap8-gou7-kang e5 sia7-thoan5 chi-chhi5 ，
iu2-tiau-chit8-jit8 oan5-seng5 kong-tau5 kian3-kok-e5 sim-goan7 。
cheng5 heng5-cheng3-inn7 pi3-su-tiunn2 Li2-eng3-goan5 ，
iau2-u7 Tou5-seng2-tiat 、 Iau5-bun5-ti3 ma7-lai5 thau5-tin7-lau7-jiat8 ，
hian7-tiunn5 kau2-chap8-sann-hoe3 e5 Su2-beng5 bo5-kiann-han5-hong chiunn7-tai5 ian2-kang2 。
phau3-mi7 kng2 pian3 tit8 chhiunn2-kong chhi7-tiunn5 chhi7-chiam3-lut8
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-oan5-e5 phau3-mi7 chhi7-tiunn5 koan5-kau3 chiunn7-pah-ek ，
ui7-tioh8 kap ki5-thann siong-phin2 cho3-chhut khu-keh ，
u7 giap8-chia2 ka7 thau5-khak tong7-kau3 mi7-tiau5 heng5-chong7-siang7 ，
ka7 thoan5-thong2-e5 kng2-mi7-tiau5 kai2-seng5 tit8-e5 ，
hi-bang7 ti7 keng7-cheng kek-liat8-e5 chhi7-tiunn5-tiong ，
cheng-ka nng7 kau3 sann-siann5 e5 chhi7-chiam3-lut8 。
chhiunn7-an2-ne ka7 phau3-mi7 tou3-tioh8 sio-thng3-thng3 sio-chui2 ，
koh-tan2 sann-hun-cheng ，
chha-put-to tak8-e5-lang5 long2-chiah8-koe3-e5 phau3-mi7 ，
mi7-tiau5 heng5-chong7 keng2-jian5-si7 tit8-e5 ，
ui7-tioh8 kap pat8-e5-lang5 cho3-chhut khu-keh ，
khoann3-tioh8 Jit8-pun2 ti7 ji7-khong3-khong3-liok8-ni5 chhiunn2-thau5-cheng5 thui-chhut-au7 ，
tit8-tiau5-e5 phau3-mi7 be2-tioh8 iau2-be7-bai2 ，
Tai5-oan5 chhiunn2-siong ma7-tau5-jip8 nng7-ni5 ，
khai-si2 gian2-hoat tit8-tiau5 phau3-mi7 e5 thng-thau5 ，
giap8-chia2 ka7 chian3-soann3 giu2-kau3 mi7-tiau5 goa7-heng5-siang7 ，
hi-bang7 chhiunn2-kong-loh8 chhi7-tiunn5 。
put-boan2 chap8-peh pha chhit-chap8-chhit-hoe3 a-peh koa3-chiau-pai5 to3-khau
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
the3-hiu kong-bu7-oan5 chap8-peh pha iu-chun5-li7-lut8 cheng-gi7-put-toan7 ，
ti7 Ko-hiong5 chhut-hian7 be2 giok8-lan5-hoe e5 chhit-chap8-chhit-hoe3 a-peh ，
to-ti7 kong2-ko3 chiau-pai5 sia2-tioh8 ，
「goa2-bo5 chap8-peh pha ，
chi2-ho2 be2 giok8-lan5-hoe koe3-jit8 」 ，
kho3-tioh8 chit-tiunn kong2-ko3-pai5 ，
piau2-si7 giok8-lan5-hoe a-peh e5 put-boan2 ，
lou7-thau5-e5 tiam3-thau5 chit8-mng7 ，
sio2-chhi7-bin5 kang5-khoan2 ma7-si7 jim2-be7-tiau5 ，
hoat-chhut lai7-sim lou7-hoe2 。
a-peh e5 am7-kng2 kong2-ko3 phiau-gi2 sia2-tioh8 ，
「 goa2 kin-ni5 chhit-chap8-chhit-hoe3 ，
goa2-bo5 chap8-peh pha ，
chi2-ho2 be2 giok8-lan5-hoe 」 ，
be2-liau2 gou7-ni5 giok8-lan5-hoe e5 Chhoa3-a-peh ，
to-si7 put-boan2 kong-bu7-oan5 thang-hiang2-siu7 chap8-peh pha iu-hui7-li7-lut8 ，
tit8-chiap ka7 khau-se2 chap8-peh pha kong2-ko3-su5 koa3-sin-khu-teng2 ，
ti5-liau2 the3 i khip-in2 be7-chio2 siau-hui3-chia2 e5 bak8-kng ，
ma7-chia3-chhu2 hoat-siap8 lai7-sim-e5 put-boan2 。
toa7-beng5-he5 hai2-sian-ko chha2 「 jiat8 」 tong-kui3 iu5 Phenn5-ou5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Phenn5-ou5 kin-ni5-e5 koann5-thinn tek8-piat8-leng2 ，
in-eng3 chit-pho li2-iu5 sio2-goeh8 ，
giap8-chia2 thui-chhut toa7-beng5-he5 cho3 chu2-kak-e5 hai2-sian-hoe2-ko ，
phoe3-siang7 kan-poe3 、 hia-a2 、
iau2-u7 o5-a2 、 la5-a2 teng2 sin-sian sit8-chai5 ，
to-si7 beh-eng7 sio-ho-ho e5 hai2-sian-ko ，
khip-in2 iu5-kheh lai5-kau3 Phenn5-ou5 。
hai2-sian-hoe2-ko e5 chu2-kak si7 chit-chiah toa7-beng5-he5 ，
au5-un7 chhenn-tinn chhenn-chhui3 、 bah-chit pa2-jin5 ，
hia-a2 、 sio2-kng2 kap kan-poe3 ，
tong-jian5 iau2-u7 sin-sian-e5 o5-a2 、 la5-a2 ，
koh-ka-siang7 chhenn2-chhui3 chhenn-chhai3 thap-te2 ，
sio-kun2-kun2 e5 toa7-beng5-he5 hai2-sian-ko to-e7-sai2 chiunn7-toh-ah ，
thng-thau5 chheng-tam7 koh chiong-hian2 goan5 bi7 ，
li2-iu5-giap8-chia2 hi-bang7 toa7-beng5-he5 hai2-sian-ko ，
e7-thang ka7 iu5-kheh khip-in2-kau3 Phenn5-ou5 。
Ko-hiong5-chhi7 cha-hut8 ni5-hoe3 toa7-be7-tiunn5 chap8-kiann7 bo5-hap8-keh
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Ko-hiong5-chhi7-cheng3-hu2 cha-hut8 Sam-hong7-tiong-ke kap toa7-be7-tiunn5 e5 ni5-hoe3 ，
thiu-giam7 chit8-pah kau2-chap8-ji7 kiann7 ni5-cheh siang-koan siong-phin2 ，
hoat-hian7-liau2 chap8-kiann7 put-hu5-kui-teng7 ，
ki5-tiong kiam5-sng-tinn bo5-hap8-keh e5 cheng5-heng5 siang7-che7 ，
toa7-to-si7 san2-phin2 thinn-ka-liau2 chhiau-koe3-e5 thng5-cheng kap tinn-cheng ，
sit8-iong7 koe3-liang7 e7-siong-hai7 ui7-tng5 ，
teng2-le2-pai3-gou7 Siau-po2-koann chhoa7-tioh8 Oe7-seng-kiok8 jin5-oan5 ，
chian5-ong2 Ko-hiong5-chhi7 e5 Sam-hong7-tiong-ke kap toa7-be7-tiunn5 kiam2-cha ，
tong-tiunn5 hoat-hian7 sio2-be7 sit8-phin2-e5 phiau-si7 u7-bun7-te5 ，
chah-tng2 thiu-giam7 e5 chit8-pah kau2-chap8-ji7 kiann7 ni5-cheh-sit8-phin2 ，
lai7-te2 hoat-hian7 u7 chap8-kiann7 bo5-hap8-keh ，
ki5-tiong kiam5-sng-tinn u7 lak8-kiann7 bo5-hap8-keh ，
ti5-liau2 thng5-cheng kap tinn-cheng e7-gui5-hai7 jin5-the2 ui7-tng5 ，

Tai5-thih pai5-kut-pian7-tong keng3-bo5 pai5-kut
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7

an2-ne-e5 ou-liong5 ，
hou7 be2-tioh8 pian7-tong e5 bin5-chiong3 chin-sit-bang7 ，
hip-siang3 PO chiunn7-bang7，

tam-sim Tiong-iu5 kho2-leng5 pi7-thoa-to2 ，

bok8-cheng5 phian3-pou3 Tai5-oan5 、 Bi2-kok 、 Ma2-lai5-se-a 、

oan5-kang-e5 lang5-sou3 chhiau-koe3 chit8-chheng-lang5 ，

kin7-lai5 Tiong-kok kiam5-sng-tinn toa7-liang7 kheng-siau ，
kim-cho2 siau-siu5-liang7 chit8-ni5-pi2-chit8-ni5 chha ，
san2-te7-e5 ke3-siau3 mui2-kong-kin kan-na7 chap8-khou-gin5 ，

long2-si7-eng7 Gi5-lan5 kim-cho2 cho3 sit8-chai5 ，

ma7-thang ham kim-cho2 cho3 khiau2-biau7-e5 kiat-hap8 。
bong5-lau7-long5 「 bong-sa 」 cheng3-choh iunn2-chhi7 kui-chhu3-lang5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-tiong-chhi7 u7-chit8-ui7 chhit-chap8-hoe3 e5 lau7-long5-hu ，
ji7-chap8-ni5-cheng5 siang-gan2 chhenn-me5 ，
i kho3-tioh8 「 bong-sa 」 cheng3 nng7-hun-chhan5 ，
choan5-long2 kho3-ka-ki7 iunn2-chhi7 kui-chhu3-lang5 ，
kau3-tann iu5-goan5 kiann5-na2-chhiunn7-poe ，
ki3-chia2 chhin-sin the2-giam3 ma7-hoat-hian7 ，
chhenn-me5-e5 ou-am3 kin-pun2 lou7 long2-bo5-hoat-tou7 kiann5 ，
koh-khah mai3-kong2 beh-ai3 cheng3-choh ，
lau7-long5-hu chin-e5 iong2-kam2 lok8-koan hou7-lang5-poe7-hok8 ！
i pun2-lai5-si7 ti-hoan3-a2 ，
chhenn-me5 liau2-au7 chiah-khai-si2 bong-sa-leh cheng3-choh ，
cheng3-choh cheng3-liau2 ji7-chap8-ni5 ，
siang7-khun3-jiau2 i-e5 m7-si7 keng-choh ，
iah-si7 i pi7-ku7-choat8 ka-jip8 long5-hoe7-e5 Long5-po2 。
Long5-po2-hoat te7-sann-chap8-lak8-tiau5 ，
si7-chiong3-chia2 to pi7-jim7-ui5 be7-sai2-cho3 long5-hu ，
chi2-thang-kong2 chit-e5 kui-teng7 chin-e5 pi2 lau7-long5-hu khah-chhenn-me5 。
ki-pun2-kang-chu beh tiau5-khi2 khi3-giap8-chu2 hoah-khou2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Lo5-ui2-hoe7 ti7 choh8-jit8 sin-chhun ki3-chia2-hoe7-siang7 ，
hoah-chhut-liau2 keng2-khi3 tng2-ho2 ，
ki-pun2-kang-chu bo5-pai5-tu5 koh-tiau5-khi2 ，
oe7-chit8-chhut sui5 in2-khi2 tiong-sio2-khi3-giap8 hoan2-toann7 ，
u7 khi3-giap8-chu2 to-piau2-si7 keng2-khi3 kin-pun2 bo5-khi2-sek ，
Ma2-eng-kiu2-cheng3-hu2 sui5-pian7 hoah-khi2-to-khi2 ，
kin-pun2 bo5-kho2-li7-tioh8 tiong-sio2-khi3-giap8 kam2-siu7 ，
ji5-chhiann2 tiau5-khi2 lo5-kang ki-pun2-kang-chu ，
sit8-che3 siu7-hui7-chia2 chha-put-to long2-si7 goa7-lo5 。
khi3-giap8-chu2 hoah-khou2 i2-goa7 e7 chiah-ni2 put-boan2 ，
in-ui7 Lo5-ui2-hoe7 kin-pun2 bo5-kou3 in-e5 kam2-siu7 ，
leng7-goa7 goa7-lo5 bi7-lai5 ti7 Tai5-oan5-e5 kang-chok ni5-han7 ，
kho2-leng5 tui3 kau2-ni5 ian5-tng5-kau3 chap8-ji7-ni5 ，
ki-pun2-kang-chu siunn7-beh tiau5-khi2 ，

khiong2-kiann chiu7-giap8 khong-kan i2-keng seng pi7-ap-siok-tioh8 。
Chhong3-se3 ke-iu2 boe2-ge5 sek8-khui nng7-chheng-gou7-pah-toh
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Chhong3-se3-ki-kim-hoe7 ki2-pan7 chit8-ni5-chit8-tou7 e5 ke-iu2 boe2-ge5-ian3 ，
ti7 choan5-Tai5-oan5 pan7-liau2 nng7-chheng gou7-pah toh ，
long2-chong2 chiau-thai7 nng7-ban7 gou7-chheng-lang5 chiah8-boe2-ge5 ，
chin7-koan2 Ma2-eng-kiu2-cheng3-hu2 it-chai3-kong2 keng2-khi3 tng2-ho2 ，
m7-koh Chhong3-se3-ki-kim-hoe7 thong2-ke3 ，
ke-iu2 lang5-sou3 pan-seng-kau3 chhit-chap8-peh-ban7-lang5 ，
pi2 teng2-ni5 cheng-ka-liau2 oa2-beh chit8-poe7 ，
sim7-chi3-u7 lu2-lai5-lu2 siau3-lian5-hoa3 e5 chhu-si3 ，
Jin5-an 、 Chhong3-se3-ki-kim-hoe7 e5 ke-iu2 boe2-ge5-ian3 ，
ka7 Siong-san-ian-chhiunn2 kheh-kah8 moa2-moa2-moa2 ，
chit-ui7 sann-chap8-it-hoe3 e5 Chhoa3-sin-senn ，
chan-keng-si7 goeh8-jip8 oa2-beh gou7-chap8-ban7 e5 se2-chhia-tiam3 thau5-ke ，
soah-in-ui7 bo5-keng2-khi3 lun5-ui5 ke-iu2 。
Chhong3-se3-ki-kim-hoe7 thong2-ke3 ke-iu2 lang5-sou3 ，
tui3 nng7-ni5-cheng5 e5 sann-chap8-kau2-ban7 ，
chit8-lou7 pan-seng-kau3 chhit-chap8-peh-ban7-lang5 ，

ng3-bang7 sin-e5-chit8-ni5 u7 un2-teng7-e5 khang-khoe3 ，
e7-thang chiah8-ka-ki7 。
ang5-chau bi2-chiu2 liau7-li2 iang2-seng koh bi2-bi7 ！

sio-tui3-i5 ki5-thann iong2-iu2 chap8-ji7-senn-siunn3 e5 kok-ka ，

koh-thoan5-chhut chhia-cham7 po-le5 phoa3-liat8 su7-kiann7 ！
thau3-koe3 oe7-bin7 e7-tang3 khoann3-kinn3 ，
Ko-hiong5-chiat-un7 Bi2-le7-to2-cham7 e5 chhit-ho7 、 peh-ho7 chhut-khau2 ，
tioh-khi2 tng5-tng5-e5 hong-so2-soann3 ，
chhia-cham7-e5 po-le5 chhut-hian7 ti-tu-bang7 heng5-chong7 chhui3-liat8 ；
gi5-su7 chheng3-khang e5 sio2-khang ，
m7-chai-si7 tu2-ho2 iau2-si7 jia2-khang ，
chiann3-tioh8 sun5-lo5-siunn chiann3-au7-piah 。

keng2-hong m7-kann2-tai7-i3 ，

chiang2-ak kho2-gi5 chhia-liong2 i2-kip8 hiam5-hoan7 cheng-pan7-tiong 。

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
kin-ni5-si7 thou3-a2-ni5 ，
chiann5-che7 ke-thau5-ge7-sut8-ka thui-chhut kah-keng2-e5 thou3-a2 chok-phin2 ，
u7 chioh8-tiau chhong3-chok-chia2 ，
tiau-khek-chhut bo5-kang5-bin7-bou5 e5 thou3-a2-enn pai5-sek ，

chhiu2-kang au2-chhut he7-liat8-e5 thou3-a2 tiau3-sek kap sek-phin2 ，
hou7 bin5-chiong3 siu-chong5 ah-si7 cho3 phoann7-chhiu2-le2 。
chioh8-tiau chhong3-chok-chia2 se3-li7 thiau-soan2 sek-hap8-e5 chioh8-thau5 ，
sio2-sio2-a2 chioh8-thau5 ti7 boa5-to-ha7 u7-liau2 khiau2-biau7-e5 pian3-hoa3 ，
goan5-pun2 phou2-thong-e5 chioh8-thau5 tiau-chhut-liau2 tng5-tng5-e5 hinn7-a2 ，
bak8-chiu kap chhui3 ，
siang7-boe2 pian3-seng5 thou3-a2 pai5-sek ，
eng7 kheng-thih-soann3 ma7-e7-sai2 u7-bu5-han7 pian3-hoa3 ，
kim-sek-e5 kheng-thih-soann3 seng-giu2-chhut tng5-hinn7-a2 ，
soa3-loh8 na7-chun2 ka-siang7 chhek-a2 ，
to-si7 inn5-kun3-kun3 e5 hok-khi3-thou3-a2 ，

peng7-chhiann2 tui-cha si7-m7-si7 u7-ki5-thann kan3-tiap8 。

iau-kiu5 Kok-hong5-pou7 chin7-sok khiu2-chhut ki5-thann kan3-tiap8 ，
khah hou7-lang5 tam-sim-e5 si7 ，

ti7 Ka-gi7-koan7 Sin-kang2 e5 Hong7-thian-kiong ，

moe2-ni5-e5 sin-chiann ，

ti7 sin-chiann-e5 si5-chun7 ，

che7-chhia pak8 an-choan5-toa3 ，
gu7-tioh8 hiong5-lat8 cheng ma7-e7 chhut-bun7-te5 。
Ka-gi7 chit8-tui3 ang-a2-bou2 khui-chhia kap ou-tou2-bai2 sio-cheng ，
khia5-ou-tou2-bai2 e5 lang5 kap ka3-su2 chi2-si7 khin-siong，
m7-koh cheng5-cho7 ka3-su2-e5 khan-chhiu2 ，
soah-in-ui7 ki7-tai7 cheng-lat8 ，
pin2-a2-kut pi7 an-choan5-toa3 au2-tng7-au7 ，
pin2-a2-kut koh chhak8-thang3-kau3 hi3 ，
cho7-seng5 lai7-chhut-hoeh bo5-i-si2-bong5 。
chhia-ho7 hian7-tiunn5 ti7 Ka-gi7-koan7 e5 Ka-kau2-soann3 soann3-to7 ，

khi3-kau3 Ka-gi7 Tang-chioh8 hai2-pinn tio3-hi5 ，
tiong-tau3 hoe5-thau5-e5 lou7-teng2 ，

an-choan5-toa3 ma7-cho7-seng5 hu7-lu2 song3-beng7 。
kok-sann sio2-ma-ma tioh8-kiann khi3-eng keng2-hong pho3-an3
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Sin-pak-chhi7 Thou2-siann5 teng2-kang kiann-thoan5 khi3-eng an3-kiann7 ，
kin-a2-jit8 keng2-hong soan-pou3 cheng-phoa3 ，
hiong-chhiu2 keng2-jian5-si7 li2-enn e5 bu2-chhin ，
ji5-chhiann2-si7 chit8-mia5 kan-ta chap8-si3-hoe3 ，
iau2-ti7 chiu7-thok8 kok-sann soah bi7-hun u7-sin-e5 sio2-ma-ma ，
kin-ki3 liau2-kai2 siau3-li2 in-ui7 tam-sim u7-sin pi7 pe7-bu2 chek-me7 ，
chiah-e7 ka7 cha2-san2 li2-enn tui3 ji7-lau5 khia7-ke ong2 lau5-kha hiat-kak8 ，
su7-au7 tui3 ka-ki7-e5 heng5-ui5 kam2-kak siang-tong hio7-hoe2 。
siau3-li2 ham tong5-hak8 hoat-seng seng3-koan-he7 u7-sin ，
pak-tou2 chit8-kang chit8-kang pian3-toa7 ，
soah-eng7 khui-to be7-ho2-si3 tiunn3-khi3 moa5-koe3 pe7-bu2 ，
it-tit8-kau3 seng-san2-au7 hiat-kak8 ang5-enn-a2 ，
chin-siong3 chiah-phok8-kng ，
hak8-hau7 ma7-kam2-kak hui-siong5 kiann-gi5 。
bok8-cheng5 chit-mia5 siau3-li2 iau2-ti7 penn7-inn7 ti7-liau5 ，
keng2-hong an3-chiau3 pang3-sak-choe7 ka7 i i5-sang3-hoat-pan7 ，
tong5-si5 ma7-e7 chin3-heng5 sim-li2-hu2-to7 。
chong2-thong2 loh8-tai5 bin5-chiong3 hoan-hou
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
lek8-si5 chap8-peh-kang e5 Ia-kip8 hoan2-cheng3-hu2 si7-ui ，
chong2-sng3 khui-hoe-kiat-ko2 ！
kin-a2-jit8 chap8-ji7-ho7 thinn-beh-kng ，
chong2-thong2 Mubarak thau3-koe3 hu3-chong2-thong2 Suleiman hoat-piau2 seng-beng5 ，
cheng3-sek loh8-tai5 kiat-sok sann-chap8-ni5 e5 kiong5-jin5-thong2-ti7 。
siau-sit chit8-thoan5-chhut ，
Ia-kip8-lang5 long2-iong2-kau3 ke-thau5 kheng3-chiok ，
Kai2-hong3-kong2-tiunn5 e5 bin5-chiong3 toa7-siann-hoah 「 Ia-kip8 kai2-hong3-ah 」 ！
sann-chap8-ni5 cheng3-koan5 tong3-be7-tiau5 bin5-chiong3 chap8-peh-kang e5 hou-hau2 ，
Ia-kip8 kiong5-jin5 Mubarak thoe3-bo5-kho2-thoe3 ，
chong2-sng3 koat-teng7 loh8-tai5 ，
hoan2-cheng3-hu2 si7-ui seng3-te7 e5 Kai2-hong3-kong2-tiunn5 pok8-chhut hoan-hou 。
bin5-chiong3 lang7-kha-lang7-chhiu2，
hui-bu2-tioh8 Ia-kip8 kok-ki5 ，
peng7-chhiann2 toa7-siann-hoah kam2-sia7 A-la2 ，
ke-thau5 khi3-chhia beng5-tat8 、 pang3-ian-hoe2 ，
tiunn5-bin7-seng7-tai7 si7 sou3-chap8-ni5-lai5 han2-kian3 。
jin5-bin5 lau5-bak8-sai2 hou7-siang sio-lam2 ，
sim7-chi3 kui7-te7 ki5-to2 ，
kun-hong ma7-seng5-lok8 e7-chun-tiong7 jin5-bin5 i3-chi3 ，
ki2-heng5 kong-cheng3-e5 soan2-ki2 ，
tong5-si5 kai2-ti5 sit8-si-liau2 sann-chap8-ni5 e5 Kin2-kip-hoat 。

cheng-chhu2 eng3-iu2-e5 pou2-siong2 ，

in un3-jiong3 sann-goeh8 to-beh kiann5-chiunn7-ke-thau5 。

tong-ni5 bo5-ian5-bo5-kou3 ke-cho3 chit8-ni5-peng ，
chit-ma2 beh the3-ka-ki7 tho2-kong-to7 ，

chit-ma2 in beh-thoan5-kiat ，
han7-oe7 ka-ki7-e5 koan5-ek 。
Tai5-oan5 ut-kim-hiong choan5-kiu5 siang7-cha2 toa7-khui phin2-cheng2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
ti7 Tho5-hng5-koan7 hok8-heng-hiong u7-chit8-e5 sou2-chai7 ，
mui2-kau3 chiu-boat8 long2-khip-in2 toa7-phe bin5-chiong3 chian5-lai5 siunn2-hoe ，
hia5 m7-na7 chhiong-boan2 kok-sek hoe-chhau2 ，
khah tek8-piat8-e5 si3 chit-liah chai-cheng3-e5 ut-kim-hiong ，
si7 thong-se3-kai3 siang7-cha2 khui-hoe-e5 phin2-cheng2 。
hoe-phou2 toa7-khui-e5 hoe-lui2 ang5-iam7-ngou2-chhai2 ，
mui2-kau3 ka3-jit8 to-u7 bin5-chiong3 lai5-chit-liah siunn2-hoe ，

i2-kip8 se-iunn5 cheng5-jin5-cheh ，

kok-sek toa7-khui-e5 ut-kim-hiong ，

choe3-kin7 tioh8-thang pa2-ak ki-hoe7 。
han5-liu5 tian2-ui Hap8-hoan-soann chek-seh si3-chap8-kong-hun
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
han5-liu5 tian2-ui Hap8-hoan-soann kap Giok8-san hun-hun loh8-toa7-seh ，

Bu2-nia2 ham Siong-soat-lau5 hu3-kin7 ，
chek-seh i2-keng tat8-kau3 si3-chap8-kong-hun ，
leng7-goa7 Giok8-san loh8-seh ma7-chhiau-koe3 peh-kong-hun 。
Chhui3-hong-phai3-chhut-sou2 piau2-si7 ，
chap8-sann-ho7 Hap8-hoan-soann am3-thau5-a2 kan3-hioh-seng3 e5 loh8-seh ，
jip8-me5-au7 loh8-seh cheng5-se3 ka-toa7 ，
Tai5-chap8-si3 kah-soann3 ji7-chap8-lak8-kong-li2 hu3-kin7 ，
La7-hioh8-hong teng2-thau5 to-u7 chek-seh ，
chhia-liong2 pit-su ka-koa3 soat-lian7 chiah-e7-sai2 thong-heng5 ，
hai2-poat8 sann-chheng chhit-pah ji7-chap8-gou7-kong-chhioh e5 Bu2-nia2 ，
i2-kip8 Siong-soat-lau5 e5 chek-seh ，
khah chhiau-koe3 si3-chap8-kong-hun i2-siang7 。

Sin-sia7 soann-pho-te7 lam7-khun2 pinn-a2-kia7 thou5-chioh8 lo7-lou7
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-tiong-chhi7-gi7-oan5 Ong5-gak8-pin tham3-kham3 Sin-sia7 lam2-chhia lou7-soann3 ，
i3-goa7 hoat-hian7 Sin-sia7 Thau5-kho-soann san2-giap8-to7-lou7 ，
tu2-tioh8 kun-hong eng7 hong-pian7 chhut-jip8 cho3-li2-iu5 ，
lam7-khun2-lam7-hoat8 nng7-peng5-e5 soann-pho-te7 ti3-su2 thou5-chioh8 lo7-lou7 ，
sou-hong5 am5-kau long2 pi7-thun7-penn5 ，
ban7-it hou7-kui3 lai5-lim5 ，

cheng3-sit8 soann-pho-te7 lam7-khun2 si7 kok-kun sou2-ui5 。
khu-kong-sou2 、 Chui2-po2-kiok8 、 Long5-giap8-kiok8 ，

chhng5-kin soe5-kang3 siak-si2 ka-siok8 iau-kiu5 kok-poe5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
chit8-mia5 pi7-kiong5-che3 an-ti3-ti7 penn7-inn7-e5 be7-sin siau3-lu2 ，
ni5-tau chhoe-ji7 ui7-tioh8 siunn7-tng2-khi3 Pin5-tong e5 chhu3 ，

kiat-ko2 oah8-oah8 siak-si2 ，

poe5-tong5 ka-siok8 tiau3-khai ki3-chia2-hoe7 e5 gi7-oan5 Khu-li7-li7 ，
phe-pheng5 Tai5-lam5-chhi7 Sia7-hoe7-kiok8 bo5-kin2-sin7 soan2-teng7 an-ti3 tiunn5-sou2 ，

Phenn5-ou5 kheng3-goan5-siau bu2-kio7 piann3-tiunn5 nau7-jiat8-hui-hoan5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Phenn5-ou5 e5 goan5-siau-cheh he7-liat8-oah8-tang7 Chui2-hoann7 bu2-kio7 seh8-keng2 ，
chap8-gou7-ho7 am3-si5 chiunn7-tiunn5 ，
sann-chap8-si3 teng2 siam2-sih-tioh8 ngou2-chhai2-teng-kng ，
siann-kng hau7-ko2 chap8-chiok-e5 tian7-chu2-bu2-kio7 ti7 ke-thau5 piann3-tiunn5 ，
siang-tong-choe7 bin5-chiong3 ian5-ke jiat8-cheng5 ui5-koan 。
oa2-ni5-lai5 Phenn5-ou5 hoat-tian2 koan-kong bun5-hoa3 tek8-sek-e5 tian7-chu2-bu2-kio7 ，
sann-chap8-si3 teng2 bu2-kio7 kok-iu2-tek8-sek ，
to-ti7 ke-thau5 su-iann5 nau7-jiat8-hui-hoan5 ，
chit-teng2 bu2-kio7 chng-siang7-liau2 liap-iann2-ki kap ek8-chenn-tian7-si7 ，
hian7-tiunn5 oe7-bin7 khoann3-hian7-hian7 ，
bu2-kio7 si7 siok8-i5 bu2-chiong3 ah-si7 ong5-ia5 chhut-sun5-si5 che7 e5 kio7 ，
kio7 boe2-au7 long2-u7 chhah gou7-iann5-ki5 。
chit-pai2 seh8-keng2-tiong ma7-u7 Ma2-chou2 che7-bu2-kio7 ，
kng-kio7-e5 long2-si7 peng5-kin lak8-chap8-hoe3 e5 hu7-li2 ，
chin3-cheng5-e5 bu2-kio7 piann3-tiunn5 ，
ia7-bat phok8-hoat piann3-kak-thau5 e5 ki-the2 chhiong-tut8 ，

hou7 sann-tiam2-cheng e5 seh8-keng2 oah8-tang7 peng5-an soah-hi3 。
soa-thng5 ke3-siau3 pio-khi2 nng7-ni5 khi2-peh-siann5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
but8-ke3 lian5-soa3-khi2 ki5-tiong thng5-ke3 khi2-kah8 siang7-ham3-kou2 ，
nng7-ni5-lai5 pio-khi2-liau2 peh-siann5 ，
hou7 iong7-liong7 siong7-che7-e5 mi7-pong7-tiam3 khou2-put-kham-gian5 ，
chit8-ni5 cheng-ka lak8-ban7-kho3 chi-chhut ，
m7-na7 mi7-pong7 iong7-tioh8 soa-thng5 ，
ke-nng7-ko 、 piann2 、 thng5-a2 long2-ai3 toa7-liong7 su2-iong7 soa-thng5 ，
m7-kuh soa-thng5 ke3-siau3 nng7-ni5-lai5 khi2-liau2 peh-siann5 ，
chit8-te7 ji7-chap8-gou7-kong-kin e5 ke3-siau3 ，
tui3 si3-pah sann-chap8-chhit-kho3 kau3-chit-ma2 chhit-pah peh-chap8-kho3 ，
kan-na7-si7 soa-thng5 chit8-khoan2 ，
to-hou7 mi7-pong7-tiam3 chiah8-be7-siau ，
iau2-bo5-pau-koat mi7-hun2 kap gu5-leng-iu5 e5 seng5-pun2 ap-lek8 。
lian5-so2 mi7-pong7-tiam3 i2-keng tiau5-khi2 mi7-pong7 ke3-siau3 nng7-siann5 ，
m7-kuh lau7-tiam3 kong2-siann2-mih long2-m7-kann2 kong2 khi2-ke3 ，
kiann chhin3-chhai2 khi2-ke3 kiann-chau2 lang5-kheh ，
it-poann peh8-soa-thng5 iong7-ti7 ko-piann2 kap ka-pi tiau5-bi7 ，
bin5-chiong3 chhu3-lai7 ai3-iong7-e5 ji7-soa-thng5 ，
iong7-ti7 chu2-tinn-thng chiam3-to-sou3，
choe3-kin7 siu7-tioh8 ke3-siau3 pho-tong7 hun-hun toa7-hok tiau5-khi2 。
kok-tiong-seng tou5-su-koan2 sng2-pai5-a2 gi5-su7 chu7-tou2
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Ka-gi7-koan7 chit8-sou2 kok-tiong-e5 sann-ui7 tong5-oh8 ，
chap8-si3-ho7 khai-hak8 tng-kang ，
ti7 Ka-gi7-koan7 koan7-lip8 tou5-su-koan2 toa7-thiann ，
chhut-hian7 「 gi5-su7 」 kong-khai chu7-tou2-e5 heng5-ui5 ，
iu5-i5 tng-kang tou5-su-koan2 hiu5-koan2 ，
kan-na7 toa7-thiann kap chu7-siu-sek khai-hong3 ，
koan2-hong kang-chok jin5-oan5 bo5-choe7 ，
sann-ui7 kok-tiong-seng pi7 hip-loh8-e5 kiann3-thau5 ，
sng2-pai5-a2 e5 ki5-tiong chit8-ui7 to2-than2-khi-ti7 phong3-i2-teng2 ，
toh-teng2 ti5-liau2 phok-khek-pai5 chi-goa7 ，
iau2-u7 chhin-chhiunn7 cho3 pi5-ji2 e5 gin5-kak-a2 。
sann-ui7 tong5-oh8 si7 kang7-chit8-sou2 kok-tiong-e5 hak8-seng ，
in seng5-jin7 ti7 tou5-su-koan2-lai7 phah-pai5 ，
m7-kuh hou2-jim7-si7 poah8-kiau2 ，
in kai2-soeh toh-teng2 e5 gin5-kak-a2 si7 beh-be2 im2-liau7-e5 ，
chi2-si7 tioh8-sng3-si7 phah-pai5 ，
ti7 tou5-su-koan2-lai7 ma7-bo5-sek-hap8 。
kok-che3 ka-pi-tau7 pio-khi2 giap8-chia2 khou2-ha-ha
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
kok-che3 ka-pi-tau7 ke3-siau3 chhong3-ha7 chap8-sann-ni5 e5 sin-koan5 ，
Ko-lun5-pi2-a kap Jip8-pun2 chit-nng7-e5 te7-khu-e5 ka-pi-tau7，
poann3-ni5-lai7 to-khi2-liau2 nng7-siann5-gou7 kau3 sann-siann5 ，
tiong3-hok siang7-toa7 phe-hoat-ke3 ma7-pian3-kui3 ，
ha7-iu5-giap8-chia2 khou2-ha-ha ，
m7-na7-si7 Jip8-pun2 ka-pi-tau7 ，
Ko-lun5-pi2-a ka-pi-tau7 khi2-khah-hiong ，
chit8-pong7 tui3 sann-pah si3-chap8-kho3 khi2-kau3 si3-pah gou7-chap8-kho3 ，
poann3-ni5-lai7 ke3-siau3 khi2-liau2 sann-siann5-goa7 ，
ki5-thann-e5 chhin-chhiunn7 Tiong-lam5-bi2-chiu Pa-se 、
Kheng2-a teng2-teng2 e5 ka-pi-tau7 ，
ma7-long2-u7 nng7-siann5 put-teng2-e5 tiong3-hok 。
ha7-iu5-giap8-chia2 ko5-ko5 khou2-ha-ha ，
nge7-tioh8 thau5-phoe5 tu3-tioh8 ，
choan5-kiu5-e5 thinn-si5 bo5-un2-teng7 ，
koh ka-siang7 In3-tou7 、 Tiong-kok teng2 sin-heng-kok-ka ，
ka-pi su-kiu5-liang7 toa7-cheng ，
ka-pi-tau7 kok-che3-chhi7-tiunn5 e5 ke3-siau3 ，
chhong3-ha7 chap8-sann-ni5 i2-lai5-e5 siang7-koan5 。
siau-hong5-oan5 thou2-chhoe5 sou-lau7 hiann-moe7 sang3-mia7
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Sin-tek chap8-lak8-ho7 thau3-cha2 thoan5-chhut it-iong5-hoa3-thoann3 tiong3-tok8-i3-goa7 ，
siau-hong5-oan5 hek8-po3 koann2-kau3 bin5-theh8 ，
ka7 hun7-to2-e5 chhu3-chu2 、 toa7-cha-bou2-kiann2 sang3-i ，
it-tit8-kau3 toa7-cha-bou2-kiann2 chhenn2-lai5 bo5-hoat-hian7 a-hiann kap sio2-moe7 ，
chiah koh-thong-ti siau-hong5-oan5 tng2-khi3 kiu3-lang5 ，
m7-koh i2-keng boan2-liau2 chit8-tiam2-cheng ，
sio2-moe7 hiau5-heng7 chau2-koe3-chit8-kiap ，
m7-koh a-hiann khip-jip8 koe3-to it-iong5-hoa3-thoann3 sin-bong5 。
chap8-lak8-ho7 thau3-cha2 si3-tiam2-goa7 ，
senn3-Tan5 chhu3-chu2 se2-sin-khu si5-chun7 ，
iang5-tai5 jiat8-chui2-khi3 ga2-suh jian5-sio bo5-oan5-choan5 ，

siann2-le tun2-chek thng5 tiong-poann5-siong hoah-oan

na7-chun2 iu2-koan-tan-ui7 chin-e5 beh-cha ，

si7-siann2-le tun2-hoe3 an2-choann2-e7 cha-be7-tioh8 ！

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7

ti7 poann-un7 chng-u7 「 Sam-liok8-hoa3-lin5 」 e5 thang2-a2 put-sin7 goa7-siap8，
chiap-chhiok khong-khi3 ma2-siong7 tioh8-hoe2-sio ，

bo5 jin5-oan5 siong-bong5 。

Hun5-lim5 Kou2-khenn soann-khu ji7-chap8-ji7-ho7 chhim-ia7 ，

Tan5-hun5-lim5 kau3-ui7 Ko-thih-cham7 nng7-phai3 hou7-chhiang3
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7

thau5-pai2 hoah8-koe3-liau2 Lo5-chui2-khe ，

nng7-phai3 jin5-ma2 long2-tong7-oan5 bin5-chiong3 kau3-tiunn5 ，

tiunn5-bin7 chap8-hun7-hun7-loan7 ，

koh-chiam3-chit8-peng5 hou7-siang tui3-chhiang3 ，
keng2-hong khia7-cho3 jin5-chhiunn5 ，
tong3-ti7 nng7-peng5 bin5-chiong3-e5 thau5-cheng5 。

Tai5-oan5-phai3 jin5-su7 sui5 chhiong-chin3-cheng5 khi3-chhiang3-siann ，

tui-su Ji7-ji7-pat ka-siok8 phe Ma2-eng-kiu2 sng2 nng7-bin7-chhiu2-hoat
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Ko-hiong5-chhi7 kin-a2-jit ki2-heng5 Ji7-ji7-pat ho5-peng5 ki3-liam7 tui-su-gi5-sek ，
siu7-lan7-chia2 ka-siok8 chai3-chhu3 phau3-tann2 Ma2-eng-kiu2 ，
m7-na7-bo5 hoan5-goan5 lek8-su2 chin-siong3 ，
iau2-ka7 goan5-hiong Chiunn2-kai3-chioh8 bi2-hoa3-cho3 「 tit8-su7-e5 i5-hou7-chia2 」 ，
kin-pun2-si7 ti7 sng2 nng7-bin7-chhiu2-hoat 。
Ko-hiong5-chhi7 kok-kai3 tui-su Ji7-ji7-pat-toa7-tou2-sat-su7-kiann7 ，
chhi7-tiunn2 Tan5-kiok kap siu7-lan7-chia2 ka-siok8 ti7 bek8-ai chit8-hun-cheng-au7 ，
cheng7-chiauh-chiauh choe7-ni5-e5 siong-thiann3 chai3-tou7 in2-pok8 lou7-hoe2 ，
siu7-lan7-chia2 ka-siok8 phe-phoann3 teng5-sin khai-hong3-e5 Tai5-pak Ji7-ji7-pat-ki3-liam7-koan2 ，
Ma2-eng-kiu2 long2-si7 khia7-ti7 Tiong-kok-kok-bin5-tong2 e5 lip8-tiunn5 ，
bi2-hoa3 goan5-hiong Chiunn2-kai3-chioh8 e5 lek8-su2 teng7-ui7 。
siu7-lan7-chia2 ka-siok8 beh-ke3-siok8 tui-kiu3 lek8-su2 chin-siong3 ，
iau-kiu5 choan2-heng5 cheng3-gi7 ，
chit-ui7 Ng5-chhun-lan5 li2-su7 ti7 gou7-chap8-lak8-ni5 i2-au7 ，
ti7 Tong3-an3-koan2-li2-kiok8 chhoe7-tioh8 lau7-pe7 e5 gou7-hong ui5-su ，
chin7-koan2 Ko-hiong5-chhi7-cheng3-hu2 an-pai5-liau2 heng5-tong7-kiok8 ，
tiong7-hian7 Ji7-ji7-pat-su7-kiann7 e5 koe3-teng5 ，
ma7-eng7 tai7-piau2 ho5-peng5-e5 peh-hap8-hoe ，
chhi3-tou5 an-hu2 siu7-lan7-chia2 ka-siok8-e5 sim-leng5 ，
m7-koh Ma2-eng-kiu2 tui3 lek8-su2-e5 kai2-sek ，
soah-chhiunn7 ia7-liau2 chit8-pe2 iam5 ti7 ka-siok8-e5 siong-chhui3-teng2 。
chhiu7-leng khiam3-hoe3 pio-khi2 siu-e5-a2 bo5-te2 thang-oann7
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
but8-ke3 toa7-khi2 chhut-hian7 「 u7-chinn5 ma7-be2-be7-tioh8 」 e5 hian7-siong7 ，
chit-ma2 siunn7-khi3 oann7 lun5-thai ah-si7 siu-e5-a2-te2 ，
e5-a2-tiam3 bo5 chai5-liau7 oann7 hou7-li2 ，
in-ui7 kok-che3 chhiu7-leng ke3-siau3 pio-khi2-e5 koan-he7 ，
kin-pun2 be2-be7-tioh8 oann7 e5-a2-te2 e5 sok-ka-phoe5 ah-si7 lun5-thai ，
sai-hu7 kong2 m7-bat kinn3-koe3 an2-ne-e5 cheng5-hong2 。

bo5-te2 thang-oann7 ，
siu-e5-a2 sai-hu7 long2-m7-chai kai-an-choann2-pan7 ？
chhiu7-leng su-kiu5-chio2 e5 siu-e5-a2-tiam3 kio3-be7-tioh8 hoe3 ，
ho5-hong3-si7 eng7-liang7-toa7 e5 lun5-thai-tiam3 。

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7

tai5-phio3-seng but8-ke3-khi2 siau-ki-hoe7 hou-iok8 tiau-cha
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
bin5-seng-but8-chu khi2-ke3 khi2-kah8 hap8-li2-m7 ？
siau-ki-hoe7 e5 tiau-cha hoat-hian7 ，
iu5-phin2 、 gu5-ni-hun2 、 oe7-seng-choa2 long2-khi2-ah ，
ki5-tiong im2-liau7 khi2-hok oa2-beh pah-hun-chi ji7-chap8-si3 siang7-koan5 。
sui-jian5 kok-che3 goan5-but8-liau7 e5 ke3-siau3 khi2-che7-loh8-chio2 ，
m7-koh sin-tai5-phio3 tui2-oann7 bi2-kim ，
sann-ni5-lai5 siang7-koan5 seng-tat8-liau2 pah-hun-chi chap8-it ，
hoe5-lut8 chha-ke3 soah-bo5 hoan2-eng3-ti7 but8-ke3-teng2 ，
hou7 bin5-chiong3 kam2-kak chin-bo5-hap8-li2 。
siau-ki-hoe7 e5 tiau-cha ，
kan-na7 sah-su7 ji7-goeh8 e5 ke3-siau3 ，
to-pi2 it-goeh8 kui3-liau2 oa2-beh pah-hun-chi ji7-chap8-si3 ，
sa-la2-iu5 kap gu5-ni-hun2 peng5-kin khi2-hok si7 pah-hun-chi chap8-ji7 ，
oe7-seng-choa2 e5 khi2-hok si7 pah-hun-chi peh ，
siann2-mih mih8-kiann7 long2-ti7-khi2 ，

Jip8-pun2 toa7-te7-tang7 「 chin3 」 kiann Tai5-oan5-san2-giap8
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Jip8-pun2 tang-pak hoat-seng kiong5-liat8 te7-tang7 ，
ti7-tong-te7 siat-chhiunn2 e5 Lian5-tian7 、
Jit8-goat8-kng kap Iu2-tat8 ma7-siu7-tioh8 eng2-hiang2 ，

hou7 Chhoa3-eng-bun5 chhim-chhim kam2-siu7-tioh8 。
kok-ka kong-kiong7-kian3-siat an-choan5-e5 tiong7-iau3-seng3 。

Chhoa3-eng-bun5 jim7-ui5 hut8-tian7 eng3-kai-ai3 choan5-bin7 kiam2-tho2 。
thau3-koe3 chit-choa7 heng5-teng5 。
hiang3 Pat-tian5-u2-it tang5-chhiang7 hian3-hoe ti3-keng3 。

ma7-hi-bang7 hoan3-chhenn2 Tai5-Jip8-chi-kan khah-kau7-e5 kam2-cheng5 。

「 Hok-to2 cheng-sin5 」 Tan5-tong5-san bian2-le7 chit8-peng5-chit8-kok
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
「chit8-peng5 chit8-kok 」 lian5-soann3 ti7 ji7-chap8-ji7-ho7 cha2-khi2 ，
ki2-heng5 lip8-ui2-chham-soan2-jin5 e5 thui-chian3-tai7-hoe7 ，
lian5-soann3-e5 eng5-u7 chong2-tiau3-chip8-jin5 Tan5-tong5-san ，
the5-chhut eng7 Jip8-pun2 Hok-to2 iong2-khi3-e5 cheng-sin5 ，
bian2-le7 lian5-soann3-e5 chap8-ji7-ui7 chham-soan2-jin5 ，
the3 Bin5-chin3-tong2 ti7 kan-khun3 soan2-khu khai-kiang-pit8-thou2 ，
lip8-ui2 Ko-chi3-pheng5 chia3-ki-hoe7 hiang3 tong2-tiong-iang hoah-siann ，
ai3-tiong7-si7 in-e5 siann-im ，
chiah-si7 iann5-tioh8 lip8-ui2 kap chong2-thong2-tai7-soan2 e5 put-ji7-liang5-hong ，
ti7 Bin5-chin3-tong2 chin3-heng5 lip8-ui2 the5-mia5 chhou-soan2 chin3-cheng5 ，
「 chit8-peng5-chit8-kok 」 lian5-soann3 toa7-tong7-chok tiau3-khai ki3-chia2-hoe7 ，
hou-iok8 soan2-bin5 chi-chhi5 in thui-chian3-e5 chham-soan2-jin5 ，
Tan5-tong5-san eng7 Jip8-pun2 Hok-to2 gou7-chap8-iong2-su7 lai5-bian2-le7 chham-soan2-jin5 ，
beh-chham-soan2 Sin-pak-chhi7 Sam-tiong5-khu e5 Ko-chi3-pheng5 ，
hiang3 Bin5-chin3-tong2 tong2-tiong-iang hoah-siann ai3-tiong7-si7 。
「 chit8-peng5-chit8-kok 」 lian5-soann3 ti7 teng2-pai2-e5 gou7-tou gi7-oan5 soan2-ki2 ，
the5-mia5 si3-chap8-gou7-sek8 ，
soan2-tiau5 sann-chap8-sann-sek8 ，
thang-kong2-si7 seng5-chek hiann2-bak8 ，
「 chit8-peng5-chit8-kok 」 lian5-soann3 cheng2-kun ，
ti7 Bin5-chin3-tong2 lip8-ui2-chhou-soan2 tau5-jip8 sin-e5 chhiong-kek 。
Gi5-lan5 Lek8-sek-phok-lam2-hoe7 chiunn7-tiunn5 tann2-cho7 ke7-thoann3 ka-hng5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Gi5-lan5-koan7 chit8-ni5-chit8-tou7 Lek8-sek-phok-lam2-hoe7 ，
sann-goeh8-te2 tit-beh chiunn7-tiunn5 ，
kin-ni5 kai2-eng7 tek-a2-phinn3 、 chui2-lau5-chha5 kap tiu7-chhau2 teng2-teng2 ，
chia-e5 thang-hoe5-siu koh-li7-iong7 e5 sou3-chai5 ，

soan2-tek8 chiah8-mih8 tau3-te2-si7 khoann3-thau5 pi2-kau3 tiong7-iau3 ，

Tai5-tiong-chhi7 chit8-sou2 kok-sio2 ，

Sin-pak-chhi7 Chhiu7-na5 chit8-mia5 lak8-hoe3 cha-pou-gin2-a2 ，

thoan5-seng5 chap8-gou7-tai7 Iap8-si7 ka-chok8 che3-chou2 chheng-lang5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
kin-a2-jit8 si7 chheng-beng5-cheh ，

ki2-pan7 bo5-kang7-khoan2 e5 che3-chou2 oah8-tang7 ，

u7-e5-lang5 hng7-tui3 Bi2-kok ，

moe2-chit8-ni5 chheng-beng5-cheh e5 chit-kang ，

long2-e7 chu7-chip8 cho3-hoe2 che3-pai3 chou2-sian 。

Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-oan5 pin5-hu3-chha-ki7 tau3-te2 u7-goa7-toa7 ？
Chai5-cheng3-pou7 siong7-sin thong2-ke3 liong2-chia2 siang-chha ji7-chap8-peh-poe7 ，
ji5-chhiann2 chit-chap8-ni5-lai5 ，
siang7-pan-chok8 sin-sui2 tan-tan cheng-ka chit8-pah sann-chap8-ji7-kho3 ，
iau2-u7 khah-ham3-kou2 e5 cheng5-heng5 ，
u7-lang5 ni5-sin nng7-chheng-ban7 ，
m7-na7 m7-bian2 pou2-kiau2 soe3-kim ，
ji5-chhiann2 iau2-e7-thang the3-soe3 ，
an2-ne-e5 siau-sit thiann-ti7 bin5-chiong3 hi7-lai7 ，
chin-e5 chin-ge2-se2 ，
hoat-long5 oan5-kang tui3 cha2-khi2 kau2-tiam2 siang7-pan ，
kang-chok-kau3 am3-si5 chhit-tiam2 ，
chap8-ni5-lai5 goeh8-kip long2-kan-na7 nng7-ban7-goa7 ，
m7-koh kau2-ui7 ni5-sou2-tek chhiau-koe3 gou7-pah-ban7 e5 u7-chinn5-lang5 ，
chia-e5-lang5 m7-bian2 pou2-soe3 iau2-e7-sai2 the3-soe3 ，
koe3-ke3-su kong2 chit-si7 u7-chinn5-lang5 phiah-soe3-iu2-to7 ，
u7-chinn5-lang5 chiat-soe3 hong-sek chiok-choe7 ，
li7-iong7 koan-khoan2 、 i-liau5-hui3-iong7 sin-po3 、
po2-hiam2 ah-si7 chhu3-theh8 tai3-khoan2 chi-chhut ，
moe2-ni5 siu-jip8 nng7-chheng-ban7 soah-e7-sai2 the3-soe3 ，
it-poann siang7-pan-chok8 moe2-than3 chit8-pah-kho3 ，
to-u7 chap8-si3-kho3 ai3-kiau2-soe3 ，
sio2-peh-sinn3 sim-lai7 chin-e5 chin-m7-si7 chu-bi7 。
Jip8-pun2 Sam-it-it kiong5-chin2 moa2-goeh8 ki2-kok bek8-ai
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
chit8-kou3-goeh8-cheng5 e5 kin-a2-jit ，
Jip8-pun2 hoat-seng-liau2 su2-siang7 siang7-toa7-e5 kau2-tiam2-leng5 kiong5-chin2 ，
Tai5-oan5-si5-kan e5 e5-pou chit8-tiam2 si3-chap8-lak8-hun ，
chit-ma7-si7 Jip8-pun2 toa7-te7-tang7 hoat-seng-e5 kang5-chit8-si5-khek ，
Jip8-pun2 kok-te7 kin-a2-jit ki2-heng5-liau2 bek8-ai-gi5-sek 。
choan5-kok kok-te7 keng3-le5-siann hiang2-khi2 ，
tai7-piau2-tioh8 Sam-it-it hit-chit8-kang te7-tang7 si5-khek lai5-kau3 ，
sou2-u7 bin5-chiong3 pang3-loh8 chhiu2-pinn-e5 tai7-chi3 ，
ki2-kok ann3-thau5 tiau3-liam7 li5-lan7-chia2 ，
siang7-sin khak-teng7-e5 si2-bong5 jin5-sou3 chit8-ban7 sann-chheng chit8-pah chap8-lak8 lang5 ，
bok8-cheng5 iau2-u7 chit8-ban7 si2-chheng sann-pah chhit-chap8-chhit lang5 sit-chong ，
liong2-chia2 ke-khi2-lai5 tut8-phoa3 nng7-ban7 chhit-chheng lang5 。
ti7 te7-tang7 tu2-ho2 moa2-goeh8 si5-khek ，
ka-hng5 tiong5-kian3-e5 lou7 chiah-tu2-beh khai-si2 ，
Jip8-pun2 kok-chai-khu e5 chou-hap8-chhu3 tu2-ti7 ka-kin2 koann2-kang ，
ui7-tioh8 kai2-koat chai-bin5 toa3-e5 bun7-te5 ，
Jip8-pun2-siu2-siong3 ma7-ti7 chap8-ho7 sann-tou7 si7-chhat chai-khu ，
seng5-lok8 e7-khi2 chhit-ban7-tong3 e5 chou-hap8-chhu3 hou7 chai-bin5 toa3 。
chap8-ji7-hoe3 siau3-lian5 thau ou-tou2-bai2 khui-so2 lau7-pe7 ka3-e5
Bin5-si7-sin-bun5-po3-to7
Tai5-tiong-chhi7 chit8-mia5 goa7-ho7 「 ang5-ku 」 e5 chap8-ji7-hoe3 senn3-Ang5 cha-pou-gin2-a2 ，
hoe2-tong5 goa7-ho7 「 Liau7-thiam-teng 」 e5 senn3-Iu5 siau3-lian5 ，
teng2-jit8 thau-theh8 nng7-tai5 ou-tou2-bai2 ，
khia5-ou-tou2-bai2 khi3 hoe7-kian3 li2-bang7-iu2 si5 cho keng2-hong tai7-pou2 ，
senn3-Ang5 cha-pou-gin2-a2 hiong3 keng2-hong kiong-chheng ，
thau ou-tou2-bai2 ki-sut8 si7 lau7-pe7 loh8-kann chin3-cheng5 ka3-i-e5 ，
hou7 keng2-hong siang-tong kiann-gi5 ，
cheng-sin3 i2-au7 an3-chiau3 chhiat-to7-choe7 ，
ka7 in i5-sang3 siau3-lian5-hoat-teng5 sim2-li2 。
「 Ang5-ku 」 kap 「 Liau7-thiam-teng 」 khi3-tioh8 thau-lai5-e5 ou-tou2-bai2 ，
chit8-lou7 tui3 Tai7-kah chau2-kau3 Thai3-peng5 khi3-chhoe7 bang7-iu2 ，
m7-koh 「 Ang5-ku 」 e5 han3-chhau2 sit8-chai7 siunn-se3 ，
khi3-tioh8 gou7-chap8 CC e5 ou-tou2-bai2 iau2-tioh8 neh-tioh8 kha-boe2 ，
in2-khi2 keng2-hong-e5 chu3-i3 。
keng2-hong hoat-hian7 chit-nng7-e5 siau3-lian5 ，

Chiong-hoa3 Lam5-iau5-kiong Ma2-chou2 hoe5-loan5 ，
kau3 Ka-gi7-koan7 Pun7-kang2 sann-kang-nng7-me5 e5 chin3-hiunn seh8-ke ，
chap8-chhit-ho7 cha2-khi2 sann-e5 Ma2-chou2-hun-hoe7 ，
hun nng7-tiau5 lou7-soann3 lai5-kau3 Hoe-toann5 chip8-hap8 ，
ian5-tou5 siu7-tioh8 sin3-chiong3 khian5-seng5 mouh-pai3 ，
toe3-boe2 ti7 Chiong-hoa3 chhi7-khu ，
tian2-khui an-cho7-tai7-tian2 chin3-cheng5-e5 seng7-tai7 seh8-ke 。
kio7-pan iau2-be7 kau3-ui7 phau3-a2-siann seng-hiang2-khi2 ，
Chhian-li2-gan2 、 Sun7-hong-ni2 khai-lou7 hou7-hoat ，
in2-chhoa7 Lau2-ji7-ma2-hoe7 e5 loan5-kio7 tin7-thau5 ，
leng7-goa7 chit8-lou7 e5 Heng-ji7-ma2 kap Lau2-gou5-ma2-hoe7 ，
ma7-lai5-kau3 Chiong-hoa3 Hoe-toann5 theng3-hau7 Lam5-iau5-kiong Ma2-chou2 ，
tiong-pou7 si3-koan7-chhi7 u7-chhiau-koe3 chap8-gou5-ban7 sin3-tou5 ，

lang3 chap8-ji7-ni5 chit8-pai2-e5 「 oann7-leng5-pau5 」 oah8-tang7 。
kin-ni5 tu2-ho2-si7 Lau2-ji7-ma2-hoe7 ki2-pan7 ，
phoe3-hap8 Heng-ji7-ma2 kap Lau2-gou5-ma2-hoe7 e5 chham-u2 ，

kiann5-thau3 Ka-gi7-koan7 Pun7-kang2 、 Sin-kang2 ，
